English Sentences: Adam, Sheth, Enosh,
Wolaitta Sentences: Addaamee Seeta yeliis; Seeti Heenoosa yeliis; Heenoosi Qainaana yeliis;

English Sentences: Kenan, Mahalaleel, Jered,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qainaani Malaali7eela yeliis; Malaali7eeli Yaareeda yeliis;

English Sentences: Henoch, Methuselah, Lamech,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaareedi Heenooka yeliis; Heenooki Maatusaala yeliis; Maatusaali Laameeka yeliis;

English Sentences: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laameeki Noha yeliis. Nohee Seema, Kaamanne Yaafeeta yeliis.

English Sentences: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaafeeta attuma naati Goomera, Maagooga, Maadaaya, Yaawaana, Tubaala, Meshekanne Tiiraasa.

English Sentences: And the sons of Gomer; Ashchenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Goomera attuma naati Ashkkanaaza, Riifaatanne Togarmma.

English Sentences: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaawaana attuma naati Eliisha, Tarsseesa, Kitiimanne Rooda.

English Sentences: The sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kaama attuma naati Kuusha, Mixiraima, Puuxanne Kanaana.

English Sentences: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kuusha attuma naati Saaba, Hawiila, Saabita, Raa7imanne Sabttaka. Raa7ima attuma naati Saabanne Dadaana.

English Sentences: Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be mighty upon the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Kuushi Naamiruuda yeliis. Naamiruudi sa7an wolqqaama olanchcha gidiis.

English Sentences: Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,
Wolaitta Sentences: Mixiraimi Ludeta, Anaameta, Lahaabeta, Nafttuuheta,

English Sentences: Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (of whom came the Philistines,) and Caphthorim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Patiroosata, Kaasiluuhetanne Pilisxxeema zareta yelida Kafttooreta yeliis.

English Sentences: Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,
Wolaitta Sentences: Kanaanee baira na7aa Sidoonanne a kaaluwaa Heeta yeliis;

English Sentences: The Jebusite also, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi Kanaanee Yaabuusata, Amooreta, Gerggeeseta,

English Sentences: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiiweta, Arqqeta, Siinata,

English Sentences: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ariwaadeta, Xamaaretanne Hamaatata yeliis.

English Sentences: The sons of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.
Wolaitta Sentences: Seema attuma naati Elaama, Asoora, Arifaakisaada, Luuda, Araama, Uuxa, Huula, Geteeranne Mesheka.

English Sentences: And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.
Wolaitta Sentences: Arifaakisaadi SHelaaha yeliis; SHelaahi Eboora yeliis.

English Sentences: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg; because in his days the earth was divided: and his brother's name was Joktan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eboori naa77u naata yeliis; issoi yelettido wode sa7ai shaahettido gishshau, a sunttai Peeleega geetettiis; a ishaa sunttai Yoqixaana.

English Sentences: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoqixaani Almmodaada, SHeleefa, Haxarmmaaweta, Yeraaha,

English Sentences: Hadoram also, and Uzal, and Diklah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hadoraama, Uzaala, Diiqila,

English Sentences: And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eebaala, Abimaa7eela, Saaba,

English Sentences: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ofiira, Hawiilanne Yobaaba yeliis. Hageeti ubbati Yoqixaana zareta.

English Sentences: Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Seemappe biidi, Abrahaama gakkanaassi de7iya yeletai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaagaa: Seema, Arifaakisaada, SHelaaha,

English Sentences: Eber, Peleg, Reu,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eboora, Peeleega, Raa7a,

English Sentences: Serug, Nahor, Terah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Saruuga, Naakoora, Taaranne

English Sentences: Abram; the same is Abraham.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaama geetettidi xeesettiya Abraama.

English Sentences: The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and Ishmael.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaama attuma naati Yisaaqanne Isimaa7eela.

English Sentences: These are their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta yeletai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettiis. Isimaa7eela bairai Nabaayoota; hegaappe simmin Qeedaaree, Adibi7eeli, Mibssaami,

English Sentences: Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,
Wolaitta Sentences: Mishimaa7i, Duumi, Maasi, Hadaadi, Teemi,

English Sentences: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yixuri, Naafiishinne Qeedimi yelettidosona. Hageeti Isimaa7eela naata.

English Sentences: Now the sons of Keturah, Abraham's concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaama kaadumatee Qaxuri attuma naati Ziimiraana, Yoqishaana, Madaana, Midiyaama, Yishibaaqanne SHuha. Yoqishaana attuma naati Saabanne Dadaana.

English Sentences: And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Henoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these are the sons of Keturah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Midiyaama attuma naati Eefa, Efeera, Hanooka, Abiidaa7anne Elddaa7a. Hageeti ubbati Qaxuri zareta.

English Sentences: And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac; Esau and Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaami Yisaaqa yeliis. Yisaaqa attuma naati Eesawanne Israa7eela.

English Sentences: sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eesawa attuma naati Elifaaza, Ra7u7eela, Yi7uusha, Yaa7ilaamanne Qoraaha.

English Sentences: The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.
Wolaitta Sentences: Elifaaza attuma naati Temaana, Omaara, Xafa, Ga7itaama, Qanaaza, Timinaa7anne Amaaleeqa.

English Sentences: The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ra7u7eela attuma naati Nahaata, Zaraaha, SHammanne Miiza.

English Sentences: And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezar, and Dishan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eedooman koiro de7ida Se7iira attuma naati Loxaana, SHobaala, Xibaa7oona, Aana, Dishoona, Exeeranne Dishaana.

English Sentences: And the sons of Lotan; Hori, and Homam: and Timna was Lotan's sister.
Wolaitta Sentences: Loxaana attuma naati Hooranne Homaama. Loxaana michchiyaa Timinaa7o.

English Sentences: The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHobaala attuma naati Aaliwaana, Manahaata, Eebaala, SHefanne Oonaama. Xibaa7oona attuma naati Aayanne Aana.

English Sentences: The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aana na7ai Dishoona. Dishoona attuma naati Hemddaana, Eshibaana, Yitiraananne Karaana.

English Sentences: The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.
Wolaitta Sentences: Exeera attuma naati Bilihaana, Za7iwaananne Aqaana. Dishaana attuma naati Uuxanne Araana.

English Sentences: Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the children of Israel; Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eelan ai kawoinne kawotanaappe kase Eedooma biittan kawotida kawoti hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Ba7oora na7ai Belaa7i kawotiis; a katamaa sunttai Dinaaba.

English Sentences: And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Belaa7i haiqqin, Booxirappe yiida Zaraaha na7ai Yobaabi a sohuwan kawotiis.

English Sentences: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yobaabi haiqqin, Temaana biittaappe yiida Hushaami a sohuwan kawotiis.

English Sentences: And when Husham was dead, Hadad the son of Bedad, which smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hushaami haiqqin, Moo7aaba biittan Midiyaamata xoonida Badaada na7aa Hadaadi a sohuwan kawotiis; a katamaa sunttai Awiita.

English Sentences: And when Hadad was dead, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hadaadi haiqqin, Maasireeqappe yiida Saamili a sohuwan kawotiis.

English Sentences: And when Samlah was dead, Shaul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saamili haiqqin, shaafaa matan de7iya Rahobootappe yiida SHaa7uli a sohuwan kawotiis.

English Sentences: And when Shaul was dead, Baalhanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaa7uli haiqqin, Akiboora na7ai Ba7aalihanaani a sohuwan kawotiis.

English Sentences: And when Baalhanan was dead, Hadad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pai; and his wife's name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba7aalihanaani haiqqin, Hadaadi a sohuwan kawotiis; a katamaa sunttai Paa7a. A keettaayyiyaa Mezaahaaba na7ee Maaxireedi na7iyo Mahexaabi7eelo. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Hadaadi haiqqiis.

English Sentences: Hadad died also. And the dukes of Edom were; duke Timnah, duke Aliah, duke Jetheth,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eedooma zaretu halaqati hageeta: Timinaa7a, Aliwa, Yeteeta,

English Sentences: Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,
Wolaitta Sentences: Oholiibaama, Eela, Piinoona,

English Sentences: Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qanaaza, Temaana, Mibxxaara,

English Sentences: Duke Magdiel, duke Iram. These are the dukes of Edom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maagidi7eelanne Iraama. Hageeti Eedooma halaqata.

English Sentences: These are the sons of Israel; Reuben, Simeon, Levi, and Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun,
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela attuma naati hageeta: Roobeela, Simoona, Leewa, Yihudaa, Yisaakoora, Zaabiloona,

English Sentences: Dan, Joseph, and Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daana, Yooseefa, Biniyaama, Nifttaaleema, Gaadanne Aseera.

English Sentences: The sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah: which three were born unto him of the daughter of Shua the Canaanitess. And Er, the firstborn of Judah, was evil in the sight of the LORD; and he slew him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kanaanee Baatishu7ippe Yihudai yelido heezzu attuma naati Eera, Oonaananne SHeela. Yihudaa na7ai bairai, Eeri GODAA sinttan iitabaa oottido gishshau, GODAI a woriis.

English Sentences: And Tamar his daughter in law bore him Pharez and Zerah. All the sons of Judah were five.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa na7aa machchiya Ti7imaara Yihudaayyo Paareesanne Zaraaha yelaasu. Yihudaayyo ubbaara ichchashu attuma naati de7oosona.

English Sentences: The sons of Pharez; Hezron, and Hamul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paareesa attuma naati Hexiroonanne Hamuula.

English Sentences: And the sons of Zerah; Zimri, and Ethan, and Heman, and Calcol, and Dara: five of them in all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zaraaha attuma naati Zimira, Etaana, Hemaana, Kalkkoolanne Darddaa7a; eti muleera ichchasha.

English Sentences: And the sons of Carmi; Achar, the troubler of Israel, who transgressed in the thing accursed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zaraaha zerettaappe gidida Karmma na7ai Akkaani Xoossaayyo dummayi wottido omooduwaa ekkidi, Israa7eela asaa waissidaagaa.

English Sentences: And the sons of Ethan; Azariah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etaana na7ai Azaariyaa.

English Sentences: The sons also of Hezron, that were born unto him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hexirooni yelido naati Yiraahima7eela, Raamanne Kaaleeba.

English Sentences: And Ram begat Amminadab; and Amminadab begat Nahshon, prince of the children of Judah;
Wolaitta Sentences: Raami Aminadaaba yeliis. Aminadaabi Yihudaa zaretu halaqaa Na7asoona yeliis.

English Sentences: And Nahshon begat Salma, and Salma begat Boaz,
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7asooni Salmmoona yeliis; Salmmooni Boo7eeza yeliis;

English Sentences: And Boaz begat Obed, and Obed begat Jesse,
Wolaitta Sentences: Boo7eezi Yoobeeda yeliis; Yoobeedi Isseya yeliis.

English Sentences: And Jesse begat his firstborn Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimma the third,
Wolaitta Sentences: Isseyi ba baira na7aa Eli7aaba, naa77antto na7aa Aminadaaba, heezzantto na7aa SHaama,

English Sentences: Nethaneel the fourth, Raddai the fifth,
Wolaitta Sentences: oiddantto na7aa Nataani7eela, ichchashantto na7aa Raddaaya,

English Sentences: Ozem the sixth, David the seventh:
Wolaitta Sentences: usuppuntto na7aa Ooxeemanne laappuntto na7aa Daawita yeliis.

English Sentences: Whose sisters were Zeruiah, and Abigail. And the sons of Zeruiah; Abishai, and Joab, and Asahel, three.
Wolaitta Sentences: Isseya macca naati Xaruuyonne Abigaalo. Xaruuyi naati heezzati Abishaaya, Yoo7aabanne Asaaheela.

English Sentences: And Abigail bare Amasa: and the father of Amasa was Jether the Ishmeelite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abigaala Amaasa yelaasu; Amaasa aawai Isimaa7eeliyaa Yetera.

English Sentences: And Caleb the son of Hezron begat children of Azubah his wife, and of Jerioth: her sons are these; Jesher, and Shobab, and Ardon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hexiroona na7ai Kaaleebi ba maccaasee Azuubin, Yirii7ooto giyo na7iyo yeliis. Yirii7oota Yesheera, SHobaabanne Arddoona yelaasu.

English Sentences: And when Azubah was dead, Caleb took unto him Ephrath, which bare him Hur.
Wolaitta Sentences: Azuuba haiqqin, Kaaleebi Efiraato ekkiis; Efiraata Huura yelaasu.

English Sentences: And Hur begat Uri, and Uri begat Bezaleel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Huuri Uura yeliis; Uuri Baxaali7eela yeliis.

English Sentences: And afterward Hezron went in to the daughter of Machir the father of Gilead, whom he married when he was threescore years old; and she bare him Segub.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hexirooni usuppun tammu laitta asa gididoogaappe guyyiyan, Gala7aade aawaa Maakira na7iyo ekkidi, Saguba yeliis.

English Sentences: And Segub begat Jair, who had three and twenty cities in the land of Gilead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sagubi Yaa7iira yeliis. Yaa7iiri beni Gala7aade biittan laatamanne heezzu katamata haariis.

English Sentences: And he took Geshur, and Aram, with the towns of Jair, from them, with Kenath, and the towns thereof, even threescore cities. All these belonged to the sons of Machir the father of Gilead.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Gashuuranne Sooriyaa kawoti Yaa7iira katamata Qanaataaranne Qanaata moottatuura usuppun tammu katamata olidi oiqqidosona; yan de7ida asai ubbai Gala7aade aawaa Maakira zare.

English Sentences: And after that Hezron was dead in Calebephratah, then Abiah Hezron's wife bare him Ashur the father of Tekoa.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hexirooni Kaaleeba Efiraata giyoosan haiqqidoogaappe guyyiyan, Hexiroona maccaasiyaa Abiiya Taqo7a aawaa Ashihuura yelaasu.

English Sentences: And the sons of Jerahmeel the firstborn of Hezron were, Ram the firstborn, and Bunah, and Oren, and Ozem, and Ahijah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hexiroona na7aa bairaa Yiraahima7eela na7ai bairai Raama; kaaloti Buuna, Oreena, Ooxeemanne Akiiya.

English Sentences: Jerahmeel had also another wife, whose name was Atarah; she was the mother of Onam.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiraahima7eelayyo Ataaro geetettiya hara maccaasiyaa de7ausu; Ataara Oonaama aayyiyo.

English Sentences: And the sons of Ram the firstborn of Jerahmeel were, Maaz, and Jamin, and Eker.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiraahima7eela na7aa bairaa Raama naati Ma7aaxa, Yaamiinanne Eqeera.

English Sentences: And the sons of Onam were, Shammai, and Jada. And the sons of Shammai; Nadab, and Abishur.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oonaama naati SHammaayanne Yaada. SHammaaya naati Nadaabanne Abishuura.

English Sentences: And the name of the wife of Abishur was Abihail, and she bare him Ahban, and Molid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abishuura maccaasiyaa Abihaila Ahibaananne Moliida yelaasu.

English Sentences: And the sons of Nadab; Seled, and Appaim: but Seled died without children.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nadaaba attuma naati Seledanne Afaayima; Seledi na7a yelennan haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And the sons of Appaim; Ishi. And the sons of Ishi; Sheshan. And the children of Sheshan; Ahlai.
Wolaitta Sentences: Afaayima na7ai Yishi7a; Yishi7a na7ai SHeeshaana; SHeeshaana na7ai Ahilaaya.

English Sentences: And the sons of Jada the brother of Shammai; Jether, and Jonathan: and Jether died without children.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHammaaya ishaa Yaada naati Yeteranne Yonaataana; Yeteri na7a yelennan haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yonaataana naati Peleetanne Zaaza. Hageeti Yiraahima7eela zareta.

English Sentences: Now Sheshan had no sons, but daughters. And Sheshan had a servant, an Egyptian, whose name was Jarha.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHeeshaanayyo maccappe attin, attuma naati baawa. SHeeshaanayyo Yaariha7a geetettiya ashkkarai Gibxxe biittaappe yiidaagee de7ees.

English Sentences: And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant to wife; and she bare him Attai.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHeeshaani ba ashkkaraa Yaariha7ayyo ba macca naatuppe issinno immiis; immin na7iyaa Attaaya yelaasu.

English Sentences: And Attai begat Nathan, and Nathan begat Zabad,
Wolaitta Sentences: Attaayi Naataana yeliis; Naataani Zabaada yeliis;

English Sentences: And Zabad begat Ephlal, and Ephlal begat Obed,
Wolaitta Sentences: Zabaadi Efilaala yeliis; Efilaali Yoobeeda yeliis;

English Sentences: And Obed begat Jehu, and Jehu begat Azariah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoobeedi Yeeha yeliis; Yeehu Azaariyaa yeliis;

English Sentences: And Azariah begat Helez, and Helez begat Eleasah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Azaaree Heleexa yeliis; Heleexi El77aasa yeliis;

English Sentences: And Eleasah begat Sisamai, and Sisamai begat Shallum,
Wolaitta Sentences: El77aasi Sisimaaya yeliis;

English Sentences: And Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sisimaayi SHaaluuma yeliis; SHaaluumi Yiqaamiyaa yeliis; Yiqaamee Elishamaa7a yeliis.

English Sentences: Now the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel were, Mesha his firstborn, which was the father of Ziph; and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiraahima7eela ishaa Kaaleeba na7ai bairai Meesha. Meesha na7ai Ziifa; Ziifa na7ai Mareesha; Mareesha na7ai Kebroona.

English Sentences: And the sons of Hebron; Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kebroona naati Qoraaha, Taappuha, Reqeemanne SHemaa7a.

English Sentences: And Shema begat Raham, the father of Jorkoam: and Rekem begat Shammai.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHemaa7i Yorqqa7aama aawaa Rahaama yeliis. Reqeemi SHammaaya yeliis.

English Sentences: And the son of Shammai was Maon: and Maon was the father of Bethzur.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHammaaya na7ai Maa7oona. Maa7ooni Beetixuura yeliis.

English Sentences: And Ephah, Caleb's concubine, bare Haran, and Moza, and Gazez: and Haran begat Gazez.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kaaleeba kaadumatiyaa Eefa Haaraana, Mooxanne Gazeeza yelaasu; Haaraani Gazeeza yeliis.

English Sentences: And the sons of Jahdai; Regem, and Jotham, and Gesham, and Pelet, and Ephah, and Shaaph.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaahidaaya naati Regeema, Yo7aataama, Geshaana, Peleexa, Eefanne SHa7aafa.

English Sentences: Maachah, Caleb's concubine, bare Sheber, and Tirhanah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kaaleeba kaadumatiyaa Maa7ika SHebeeranne Tirihaana yelaasu.

English Sentences: She bare also Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah, and the father of Gibea: and the daughter of Caleb was Achsa.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Maa7ika SHa7aafanne SHawa yelaasu. SHa7aafi Madimaana yeliis. SHawi Maakibeenanne Gibaa7a yeliis. Kaaleeba na7iyaa Akiso.

English Sentences: These were the sons of Caleb the son of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah; Shobal the father of Kirjathjearim,
Wolaitta Sentences: Kaaleeba naati harati hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidosona. Kaaleebi ba baira na7aa Huura ba keettaayee Efiraatin yeliis. Huura naati Qiriyaati-Yi7aariima aawaa SHobaala,

English Sentences: Salma the father of Bethlehem, Hareph the father of Bethgader.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beetaliheema aawaa Salmmoonanne Beeti-Gadeera aawaa Hareefa.

English Sentences: And Shobal the father of Kirjathjearim had sons; Haroeh, and half of the Manahethites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qiriyaati-Yi7aariima aawaa SHobaala yarati Haro7eetatanne Manuhoota yaratuppe baggata.

English Sentences: And the families of Kirjathjearim; the Ithrites, and the Puhites, and the Shumathites, and the Mishraites; of them came the Zareathites, and the Eshtaulites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qiriyaati-Yi7aariima yarati Yatirata, Puutata, SHumaatatanne Mishiraa7ata. Xor77atinne Eshttaa7oolati hageetuppe yelettidosona.

English Sentences: The sons of Salma; Bethlehem, and the Netophathites, Ataroth, the house of Joab, and half of the Manahethites, the Zorites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beetaliheema aawaa Salmmoona yarati Naxoofata, Axirooti-Beetayoo7aabata, Manuhoota yaratuppe attiya baggatanne Xor77ata.

English Sentences: And the families of the scribes which dwelt at Jabez; the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and Suchathites. These are the Kenites that came of Hemath, the father of the house of Rechab.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaabeexa kataman de7iya xaafiyaageetu yarati qassi Tir77ata, SHim77aatatanne Sukkata. Hageeti Rekaabatu aawaa Haamatappe yelettida Qeenata.

English Sentences: Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:
Wolaitta Sentences: Kebroona kataman Daawiti yelido naati hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidosona. Iziraa7eeliyaa Ahino7aama yelido a bairai Aminoona. Qarmmeloosiyaa Abigaala yelido a naa77antto na7ai Daaneela.

English Sentences: The third, Absalom the son of Maachah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gashuura biittaa Kawuwaa Talmmaaya na7iyaa Maa7ika yelido a heezzantto na7ai Abeselooma. Haggiita yelido a oiddantto na7ai Adooniyaasa.

English Sentences: The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abiixaala yelido a ichchashantto na7ai SHafaaxiyaa. A maccaasiyaa Egila yelido a usuppuntta na7ai Yitira7aama.

English Sentences: These six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti he usuppun naata Kebroonan yeliis. Daawiti Kebroonan laappun laittanne usuppun agina kawotiis. Qassi Yerusalaamen hasttamanne heezzu laitta kawotiis.

English Sentences: And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel:
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Yerusalaamen yelido naati oiddati Ami7eela na7iyaa Berssaaba yelido SHim77a, SHobaaba, Naataananne Solomona.

English Sentences: Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi hara uddufun attuma naati Yibihaara, Elishamaa7a, Elifeleexa,

English Sentences: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
Wolaitta Sentences: Nogaaha, Nefega, Yaafi7a,

English Sentences: And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Elishamaa7a, Eliyadaa7anne Elifeleexa.

English Sentences: These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha attuma naatu ubbaa bollikka Daawitayyo kaadumatatuppe yelettida attuma naati de7oosona; qassi Taamaara ha attuma naatu michchiyo.

English Sentences: And Solomon's son was Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawuwaa Solomona yeletai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaagaa. Solomona na7ai Robi7aama; Robi7aama na7ai Abiiya; Abiiya na7ai Asa; Asa na7ai Yoosaafixa;

English Sentences: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoosaafixa na7ai Yoraama; Yoraama na7ai Akaaziyaasa; Akaaziyaasa na7ai Yo7aasha;

English Sentences: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yo7aasha na7ai Amesiyaasa; Amesiyaasa na7ai Ooziyaana; Ooziyaana na7ai Yo7aataama;

English Sentences: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yo7aataama na7ai Akaaza; Akaaza na7ai Hizqqiyaasa; Hizqqiyaasa na7ai Minaasa;

English Sentences: Amon his son, Josiah his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Minaase na7ai Amoona; Amoona na7ai Yoosiyaasa.

English Sentences: And the sons of Josiah were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoosiyaasa na7ai bairai Yohanaana; naa77anttoi Yo7aqeema; heezzanttoi Sedeqiyaasa; oiddanttoi SHaaluuma.

English Sentences: And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yo7aqeema naati Yo7aakiinanne Sedeqiyaasa.

English Sentences: And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Omoodettidi Baabiloone biida Yo7aakiina attuma naati Salaatiyaala,

English Sentences: Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Malkkiraama, Padaaya, SHenaaxaara, Yiqaamiyaa, Hoshamaa7anne Nadaabiyaa.

English Sentences: And the sons of Pedaiah were, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:
Wolaitta Sentences: Padaaya attuma naati Zarubaabeelanne SHim77a. Zarubaabeela attuma naati Mashulaamanne Hanaaniyaa; eta michchiyaa SHalomiito.

English Sentences: And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushabhesed, five.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeta bollan hara ichchashu attuma naati Zarubaabeelassi de7oosona; etikka Hashuuba, Oheela, Berekiyaa, Hasaadiyaanne Yushaabi-Heseeda.

English Sentences: And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hanaaniyaa attuma naati Palaaxiyaanne Yishaa7iyaa. Yishaa7iyaa na7ai Rafaaya; Rafaaya na7ai Arnnaana; Arnnaana na7ai Obaadiyaa; Obaadiyaa na7ai SHakaaniyaa;

English Sentences: And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHakaaniyaa na7ai SHamaa7iyaa. SHamaa7iyaa naati ichchashati Haxxuusha, Yigi7aala, Bariyaaha, Na7aariyaanne SHafaaxa.

English Sentences: And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
Wolaitta Sentences: Na7aariyaa naati heezzati Eliyoo7enaaya, Hizqqanne Aziriqaama.

English Sentences: And the sons of Elioenai were, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eliyoo7enaaya naati laappunati Hodaawiyaa, Eliyaashiba, Palaaya, Aqquuba, Yohanaana, Dalaayanne Anaana.

English Sentences: The sons of Judah; Pharez, Hezron, and Carmi, and Hur, and Shobal.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa zareti Paareesa, Hexiroona, Karmma, Huuranne SHobaala.

English Sentences: And Reaiah the son of Shobal begat Jahath; and Jahath begat Ahumai, and Lahad. These are the families of the Zorathites.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHobaala na7ai Ra7aayi Yahaata yeliis; Yahaati Ahumaayanne Lahaada yeliis. Hageeti Xor77atu yarata.

English Sentences: And these were of the father of Etam; Jezreel, and Ishma, and Idbash: and the name of their sister was Hazelelponi:
Wolaitta Sentences: Huuri ba aayee Efiraatissi baira na7aa; Huuri Beetaliheema yeliis. Exaama attuma naati Iziraa7eela, Yuushimanne Yidibaasha; eta michchiyaa Haxilelppoono.

English Sentences: And Penuel the father of Gedor, and Ezer the father of Hushah. These are the sons of Hur, the firstborn of Ephratah, the father of Bethlehem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Panu7eeli Gadoora yeliis. Exeeri Huusha yeliis. Hageeti Huura yarata.

English Sentences: And Ashur the father of Tekoa had two wives, Helah and Naarah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taqo7a aawaa Ashihuurayyo Heelonne Naa7iro geetettiya naa77u maccaasati de7oosona.

English Sentences: And Naarah bare him Ahuzam, and Hepher, and Temeni, and Haahashtari. These were the sons of Naarah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa7ira Ahuzaama, Hefeera, Teminanne Ahashttaara Ashihuurayyo yelaasu; hageeti Naa7iri naata.

English Sentences: And the sons of Helah were, Zereth, and Jezoar, and Ethnan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heela Xeereta, Xoohaaranne Etinaana Ashihuurayyo yelaasu.

English Sentences: And Coz begat Anub, and Zobebah, and the families of Aharhel the son of Harum.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qooxi Anuuba, Xobeebanne Haruuma na7aa Ahariheela yarata yeliis.

English Sentences: And Jabez was more honourable than his brethren: and his mother called his name Jabez, saying, Because I bare him with sorrow.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaabeexi ba ishanttu ubbaappe aadhdhi bonchchettees. A aayyiyaa, "Taani a iita maaretan yelido gishshau, a sunttai Yaabeexa" gaada sunttaasu.

English Sentences: And Jabez called on the God of Israel, saying, Oh that thou wouldest bless me indeed, and enlarge my coast, and that thine hand might be with me, and that thou wouldest keep me from evil, that it may not grieve me! And God granted him that which he requested.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaabeexi Israa7eela Xoossaa xeesidi, "Abeet Xoossau, hai tana neeni anjja; ta gadiyaakka aassa. Tanaara issippe gida; tana sakkennaadan tana qohiyaabaappe neeni naaga" yaagidi woossiis. Woossin Xoossai a woosaa siyiis.

English Sentences: And Chelub the brother of Shuah begat Mehir, which was the father of Eshton.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHuha ishai Kaluubi Mahiira yeliis; Mahiiri Eshttoona yeliis.

English Sentences: And Eshton begat Bethrapha, and Paseah, and Tehinnah the father of Irnahash. These are the men of Rechah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eshttooni Beetiraafa, Paaseehanne Tahinna yeliis. Tahinni Nahaasha katamaa asaa yeliis. Hageeti Reeka biittan de7idosona.

English Sentences: And the sons of Kenaz; Othniel, and Seraiah: and the sons of Othniel; Hathath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qanaaza naati Otini7eelanne Saraaya; Otini7eela naati Hataatanne Ma7onootaaya.

English Sentences: And Meonothai begat Ophrah: and Seraiah begat Joab, the father of the valley of Charashim; for they were craftsmen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ma7onootaayi Oofira yeliis. Saraayi Yoo7aaba yeliis. Yoo7aabi Kushe Hiillatu Zanggaaraa giyoosan de7ida asaa yeliis.

English Sentences: And the sons of Caleb the son of Jephunneh; Iru, Elah, and Naam: and the sons of Elah, even Kenaz.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yifune na7aa Kaaleeba naati Ira, Eelanne Na7aama. Eela na7ai Qanaaza.

English Sentences: And the sons of Jehaleleel; Ziph, and Ziphah, Tiria, and Asareel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihaali7eela naati Ziifa, Ziifaaha, Tiirayanne Asaari7eela.

English Sentences: And the sons of Ezra were, Jether, and Mered, and Epher, and Jalon: and she bare Miriam, and Shammai, and Ishbah the father of Eshtemoa.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eezira naati Yetera, Mereda, Efeeranne Yaaloona. Meredi Gibxxe kawuwaa na7iyo Biitiyo ekkiis; ekkin a Miiriyaamo, SHammaayanne Yishiba ayyo yelaasu. Yishibi Eshttamoo7a yeliis.

English Sentences: And his wife Jehudijah bare Jered the father of Gedor, and Heber the father of Socho, and Jekuthiel the father of Zanoah. And these are the sons of Bithiah the daughter of Pharaoh, which Mered took.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa biittaappe ekkido maccaasiyaa Gadoora aawaa Yereda, Sooko aawaa Hebeeranne Zaanooha aawaa Yaqiiti7eela Meredayyo yelaasu.

English Sentences: And the sons of his wife Hodiah the sister of Naham, the father of Keilah the Garmite, and Eshtemoa the Maachathite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nahaama michchee, Hodiyaa maccaasee naati Gaariman de7ida Qa7iila aawaanne Maa7ikan de7ida Eshttamoo7a aawaa.

English Sentences: And the sons of Shimon were, Amnon, and Rinnah, Benhanan, and Tilon. And the sons of Ishi were, Zoheth, and Benzoheth.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHimoona naati Aminoona, Riinna, Benihanaananne Tiiloona. Yishi7a naati Zoheetanne Benzzoheeta.

English Sentences: The sons of Shelah the son of Judah were, Er the father of Lecah, and Laadah the father of Mareshah, and the families of the house of them that wrought fine linen, of the house of Ashbea,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa na7aa SHeela zareti Leeka aawaa Eera, Mareesha aawaa Laa7idanne Beeti-Ashibee7a kataman de7iya liinuwaa giyo maayuwaa daddiyaageetu yarata.

English Sentences: And Jokim, and the men of Chozeba, and Joash, and Saraph, who had the dominion in Moab, and Jashubilehem. And these are ancient things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Harati qassi Yoqiima, Yo7aasha, Yaashubiliheema, Moo7aaba biittaa haarida Saraafanne Kozeeba kataman de7ida asata. Ha yeletaa mazggafai beni wodeesappekka de7iyaagaa.

English Sentences: These were the potters, and those that dwelt among plants and hedges: there they dwelt with the king for his work.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti Naxa7iimaaninne Gadeeran de7ida urqqaa medhdhiya asata. Eti kawuwaa oosuwaa oottanau aara issippe de7idosona.

English Sentences: The sons of Simeon were, Nemuel, and Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, and Shaul:
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoona naati Nemu7eela, Yaamiina, Yaariiba, Zaraahanne SHaa7ula.

English Sentences: Shallum his son, Mibsam his son, Mishma his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaa7ula na7ai SHaaluuma; SHaaluuma na7ai Mibssaama; Mibssaama na7ai Mishimaa7a;

English Sentences: And the sons of Mishma; Hamuel his son, Zacchur his son, Shimei his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mishimaa7a na7ai Hammu7eela; Hammu7eela na7ai Zakkuura; Zakkuura na7ai SHim77a.

English Sentences: And Shimei had sixteen sons and six daughters; but his brethren had not many children, neither did all their family multiply, like to the children of Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHim77ayyo tammanne usuppun attuma naatinne usuppun macca naati de7oosona; shin a ishatuyyo cora naati de7okkona. Yihudaa zaretudan Simoona zareti corattibookkona.

English Sentences: And they dwelt at Beersheba, and Moladah, and Hazarshual,
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoona zareti Berssaabeha katamaaninne Molaada, Haxaari-SHu7aala,

English Sentences: And at Bilhah, and at Ezem, and at Tolad,
Wolaitta Sentences: Baala, Exeema, Tolaada,

English Sentences: And at Bethuel, and at Hormah, and at Ziklag,
Wolaitta Sentences: Baatu7eela, Horima, Xiqilaaga,

English Sentences: And at Bethmarcaboth, and Hazarsusim, and at Bethbirei, and at Shaaraim. These were their cities unto the reign of David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeti-Markkaboota, Hoxaari-Susiima, Beetibiiranne SHaa7iraima katamatun de7idosona. Daawiti kawotana gakkanaassi hageeti eta katamata gididi de7idosona.

English Sentences: And their villages were, Etam, and Ain, Rimmon, and Tochen, and Ashan, five cities:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi eta moottati Exaama, Aina, Rimmoona, Tokeenanne Ashaana. Eti muleera ichchashu katamata.

English Sentences: And all their villages that were round about the same cities, unto Baal. These were their habitations, and their genealogy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baa7ilaata gakkanaashin, ha katamatu yuushuwan de7iya moottati ubbai etan gujettoosona. Hageeta eti de7ido sohota eti bantta yeletaa maaran mazggafan xaafidi oiqqidosona.

English Sentences: And Meshobab, and Jamlech, and Joshah, the son of Amaziah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoona yaratu halaqati hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Eti Mashobaaba, Yaamileeka, Amesiyaasa na7aa Yoosha,

English Sentences: And Joel, and Jehu the son of Josibiah, the son of Seraiah, the son of Asiel,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yuu7eelanne Yoshiibiyaa na7aa Yeeha. Yeehu aawaa aawai Asa7eela na7aa Saraaya.

English Sentences: And Elioenai, and Jaakobah, and Jeshohaiah, and Asaiah, and Adiel, and Jesimiel, and Benaiah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hara halaqati qassi Eliyoo7enaaya, Yaaqooba, Yashohaaya, Asaaya, Adii7eela, Yashimi7eela, Banaayanne

English Sentences: And Ziza the son of Shiphi, the son of Allon, the son of Jedaiah, the son of Shimri, the son of Shemaiah;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ziiza. Ziizi SHif77a na7aa; SHif77i Alloona na7aa; Allooni Yadaaya na7aa; Yadaayi SHiimira na7aa; SHiimiri SHamaa7iyaa na7aa.

English Sentences: These mentioned by their names were princes in their families: and the house of their fathers increased greatly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoona yaratu halaqati hageeta. Eta aawatu zerettai keehippe corattiis.

English Sentences: And they went to the entrance of Gedor, even unto the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta mehiyaayyo heemmiyoosaa koyanau Gadoora geliyoosaa matan de7iya wombbaayyo arshsho baggaara de7iya sohota gakkanaassi biidosona.

English Sentences: And they found fat pasture and good, and the land was wide, and quiet, and peaceable; for they of Ham had dwelt there of old.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biidi issi keehippe araddida lo77o heemmiyo sohuwaa demmidosona; he biittai woppainne saroi kumido aaho biitta. Beni wode he biittan de7idaageeti Kaama zerettata.

English Sentences: And these written by name came in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah, and smote their tents, and the habitations that were found there, and destroyed them utterly unto this day, and dwelt in their rooms: because there was pasture there for their flocks.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaappe qommo baggaara sunttai xaafettido Simoona zareti Yihudaa Kawuwaa Hizqqiyaasa wode Gadoora biitti biidi, yan de7iya Kaama zerettatanne Ma7uuna asata olidi xaissidosona. Xaissidi he biittan eta mehiyaayyo heemmiyo sohoi de7iyo gishshau, Simoona zareti hachchi gattanau yan uttidosona.

English Sentences: And some of them, even of the sons of Simeon, five hundred men, went to mount Seir, having for their captains Pelatiah, and Neariah, and Rephaiah, and Uzziel, the sons of Ishi.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoona zaretuppe ichchashu xeetu asati Se7iira Deriyaakko biidosona. Eta halaqati Palaaxiyaa, Na7aariyaa, Rafaayanne Uzzi7eela; eti Yishi7a naata.

English Sentences: And they smote the rest of the Amalekites that were escaped, and dwelt there unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amaaleeqa asatuppe kase baqati attidaageeta Simoona asati xaissidosona. Eti hachchi gakkanaassi he biittan de7oosona.

English Sentences: Now the sons of Reuben the firstborn of Israel, (for he was the firstborn; but, forasmuch as he defiled his father's bed, his birthright was given unto the sons of Joseph the son of Israel: and the genealogy is not to be reckoned after the birthright.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela na7aa bairaa Roobeela yeletai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaagaa. Roobeeli baira na7a; shin ba aawaa hiixaa i tunissido gishshau, bairatettau bessiyaabai Israa7eela na7aa Yooseefa naatuyyo imettiis. Hegaa gishshau, i yeletan baira gididoogee xaafettibeenna.

English Sentences: For Judah prevailed above his brethren, and of him came the chief ruler; but the birthright was Joseph's:)
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudai ba ishanttuppe minniis; a bairatettai Yooseefau imettidabaa gidikkokka, Israa7eela asaa haariyaagee Yihudaappe kiyiis.

English Sentences: The sons, I say, of Reuben the firstborn of Israel were, Hanoch, and Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela na7aa bairaa Roobeela attuma naati Hanooka, Paala, Hexiroonanne Karmma.

English Sentences: The sons of Joel; Shemaiah his son, Gog his son, Shimei his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yuu7eela na7ai SHamaa7iyaa; SHamaa7iyaa na7ai Googa; Googa na7ai SHim77a;

English Sentences: Micah his son, Reaia his son, Baal his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHim77a na7ai Mikiyaasa; Mikiyaasa na7ai Ra7aaya; Ra7aaya na7ai Ba7aala.

English Sentences: Beerah his son, whom Tilgathpilneser king of Assyria carried away captive: he was prince of the Reubenites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba7aala na7ai Asoore Kawoi Tigilaati-Paleseeri omooddidi efiido Ba7eera; Ba7eeri Roobeela zaretu halaqaa.

English Sentences: And his brethren by their families, when the genealogy of their generations was reckoned, were the chief, Jeiel, and Zechariah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba7eera dabboti, bantta yeletaa mazggafan xaafettida Roobeela yaratu halaqati Yi7i7eela, Zakkaariyaasanne

English Sentences: And Bela the son of Azaz, the son of Shema, the son of Joel, who dwelt in Aroer, even unto Nebo and Baalmeon:
Wolaitta Sentences: Belaa7a. Belaa7i Azaaza na7aa; Azaazi SHemaa7a na7aa; SHemaa7i Yuu7eela zare. Yuu7eela zareti Aaro7era kataman, Nabo biittaaninne Ba7aali-Ma7oona biittan de7idosona.

English Sentences: And eastward he inhabited unto the entering in of the wilderness from the river Euphrates: because their cattle were multiplied in the land of Gilead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Roobeela zaretu mehee Gala7aaden corattido gishshau, eti yaappe arshsho baggi biidi, Efiraaxiisa SHaafaa gakkanaashin tanggaccida bazzuwan uttidosona.

English Sentences: And in the days of Saul they made war with the Hagarites, who fell by their hand: and they dwelt in their tents throughout all the east land of Gilead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola laittan Aggaari yaratuura Roobeela yarati olettin, Roobeela yarati xoonidosona. Xoonidi Gala7aadeppe arshsho baggaara de7iya Aggaari yaratu biittan uttidosona.

English Sentences: And the children of Gad dwelt over against them, in the land of Bashan unto Salcah:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaada zareti Roobeela zaretuppe huuphessa baggan, Salaaka gakkanaashin de7iya Baasaane biittan uttidosona.

English Sentences: Joel the chief, and Shapham the next, and Jaanai, and Shaphat in Bashan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yuu7eeli koiro yaratussi halaqa; SHafaami naa77antto yaratussi halaqa. Yaa7inaayinne SHafaaxi Baasaanen uttida yaratussi halaqata.

English Sentences: And their brethren of the house of their fathers were, Michael, and Meshullam, and Sheba, and Jorai, and Jachan, and Zia, and Heber, seven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta dabboti, laappun yaratu halaqati, Mikaa7eela, Mashulaama, Saaba, Yoraaya, Yaa7ikaana, Zii7anne Ebeera.

English Sentences: These are the children of Abihail the son of Huri, the son of Jaroah, the son of Gilead, the son of Michael, the son of Jeshishai, the son of Jahdo, the son of Buz;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti Abihaila naati Buuza zareta. Buuzi Yaahida yeliis; Yaahidoi Yeshishaaya yeliis; Yeshishaayi Mikaa7eela yeliis; Mikaa7eeli Gala7aada yeliis; Gala7aadee Yaarooha yeliis; Yaaroohi Huura yeliis; Huuri Abihaila yeliis.

English Sentences: Ahi the son of Abdiel, the son of Guni, chief of the house of their fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta aawatu so halaqai Guuna na7aa na7aa Abddi7eela na7aa Aaha.

English Sentences: And they dwelt in Gilead in Bashan, and in her towns, and in all the suburbs of Sharon, upon their borders.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Gala7aadeeninne Baasaanen he biittatu katamatuuninne Saaroona biittan mehee heemettiyo sohotun uttidosona.

English Sentences: All these were reckoned by genealogies in the days of Jotham king of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam king of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageetu ubbaa yeletai Yihudaa Kawuwaa Yo7aataama wodenne Israa7eela Kawuwaa Iyorbbaama wode yeletaa mazggafan xaafettiis.

English Sentences: The sons of Reuben, and the Gadites, and half the tribe of Manasseh, of valiant men, men able to bear buckler and sword, and to shoot with bow, and skilful in war, were four and forty thousand seven hundred and threescore, that went out to the war.
Wolaitta Sentences: Roobeela zaretuppe, Gaada zaretuppenne Minaase zaretuppe baggatuppe olanchchati, wolqqaamati, gonddalliyaanne bisuwaa oiqqiyaageeti, wonddafiyaa duhan loohidaageetinne olaa salppiyaa eriyaageeti oitamanne oiddu sha7anne laappun xeetanne usuppun tamma.

English Sentences: And they made war with the Hagarites, with Jetur, and Nephish, and Nodab.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Aggaari yaratuura, Yixuratuura, Naafiishatuuranne Nodaabatuura olettidosona.

English Sentences: And they were helped against them, and the Hagarites were delivered into their hand, and all that were with them: for they cried to God in the battle, and he was intreated of them; because they put their trust in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti he asatuura olettiiddi, Xoossaakko waassido gishshau, maaduwaa demmidosona. Eti Xoossan ammanettido gishshau, i etau woosettiis. Hegaa gishshau, Aggaari yaratinne etaara de7iya harati eta kushiyan gelidosona.

English Sentences: And they took away their cattle; of their camels fifty thousand, and of sheep two hundred and fifty thousand, and of asses two thousand, and of men an hundred thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta morkketuppe ishatamu sha7u gaameelata, naa77u xeetanne ishatamu sha7u dorssata, naa77u sha7u haretanne xeetu sha7u asata omooddidi efiidosona.

English Sentences: For there fell down many slain, because the war was of God. And they dwelt in their steads until the captivity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Olai Xoossaagaa gidido gishshau, daroti haiqqidosona. Xoonidaageeti omooduwaa wodee gakkanaashinkka he asatu sohuwan uttidosona.

English Sentences: And the children of the half tribe of Manasseh dwelt in the land: they increased from Bashan unto Baalhermon and Senir, and unto mount Hermon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Minaase zaretuppe bagga yarati Baasaaneppe doommidi, Ba7aali-Hermmoone, Saniiranne Hermmoone Deriyaa gakkanaashin de7iya he biittatun uttidosona; eti he sohotun corattidosona.

English Sentences: And these were the heads of the house of their fathers, even Epher, and Ishi, and Eliel, and Azriel, and Jeremiah, and Hodaviah, and Jahdiel, mighty men of valour, famous men, and heads of the house of their fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta aawatu so halaqati Efeera, Yishi7a, Eli7eela, Aziri7eela, Ermmaasa, Hodaawiyaanne Yaahidi7eela. Hageeti eta aawaa keettan erettida, xalanne wolqqaama asata.

English Sentences: And they transgressed against the God of their fathers, and went a whoring after the gods of the people of the land, whom God destroyed before them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha zareti bantta aawatu Xoossaa naaqqidosona; Xoossai eta sinttaappe xaissido he biittaa asatu xoossatuura shaaramuxidosona.

English Sentences: And the God of Israel stirred up the spirit of Pul king of Assyria, and the spirit of Tilgathpilneser king of Assyria, and he carried them away, even the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and the half tribe of Manasseh, and brought them unto Halah, and Habor, and Hara, and to the river Gozan, unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Israa7eela Xoossai Tigilaati-Paleseera woikko Puula giyo Asoore kawuwaa ayyaanaa denttettiis. Yaatidi Roobeela zareta, Gaada zaretanne Minaase zaretuppe baggata omooddidi, Halaaha, Habooranne Haara biittatanne Gozaana SHaafaa efiis. Eti hachchi gakkanaashin yan de7oosona.

English Sentences: The sons of Levi; Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewa naati Gershshoona, Qahaatanne Maraara.

English Sentences: And the sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qahaata naati Amiraama, Yixihaara, Kebroonanne Uzzi7eela.

English Sentences: And the children of Amram; Aaron, and Moses, and Miriam. The sons also of Aaron; Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amiraama naati Aaroona, Muusanne Miiriyaamo. Aaroona naati Nadaaba, Abiiha, El77aazaranne Itaamaara.

English Sentences: Eleazar begat Phinehas, Phinehas begat Abishua,
Wolaitta Sentences: El77aazari Piinihaasa yeliis; Piinihaasi Abishuu7a yeliis; Abishuu7i Buuqa yeliis;

English Sentences: And Abishua begat Bukki, and Bukki begat Uzzi,
Wolaitta Sentences: Buuqi Uzza yeliis;

English Sentences: And Uzzi begat Zerahiah, and Zerahiah begat Meraioth,
Wolaitta Sentences: Uzzi Zaraahiyaa yeliis; Zaraahee Maraayoota yeliis;

English Sentences: Meraioth begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
Wolaitta Sentences: Maraayooti Amaariyaa yeliis; Amaaree Ahixuuba yeliis;

English Sentences: And Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Ahimaaz,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ahixuubi Xaadooqa yeliis; Xaadooqi Ahima7aaxa yeliis;

English Sentences: And Ahimaaz begat Azariah, and Azariah begat Johanan,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ahima7aaxi Azaariyaasa yeliis; Azaariyaasi Yohanaana yeliis;

English Sentences: And Johanan begat Azariah, (he it is that executed the priest's office in the temple that Solomon built in Jerusalem:)
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohanaani Azaariyaasa yeliis. Solomoni Yerusalaamen keexissido Beeta Maqidasiyan oottida qeesee Azaariyaasa.

English Sentences: And Azariah begat Amariah, and Amariah begat Ahitub,
Wolaitta Sentences: Azaariyaasi Amaariyaa yeliis; Amaaree Ahixuuba yeliis;

English Sentences: And Ahitub begat Zadok, and Zadok begat Shallum,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ahixuubi Xaadooqa yeliis; Xaadooqi SHaaluuma yeliis;

English Sentences: And Shallum begat Hilkiah, and Hilkiah begat Azariah,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaaluumi Hilqqiyaa yeliis; Hilqqee Azaariyaasa yeliis;

English Sentences: And Azariah begat Seraiah, and Seraiah begat Jehozadak,
Wolaitta Sentences: Azaariyaasi Saraaya yeliis; Saraayi Yoxedeeqa yeliis.

English Sentences: And Jehozadak went into captivity, when the LORD carried away Judah and Jerusalem by the hand of Nebuchadnezzar.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Yihudaanne Yerusalaame Naabukadanaxooran omoodissido wode Yoxedeeqikka omoodettidi biis.

English Sentences: The sons of Levi; Gershom, Kohath, and Merari.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewa naati Gershshoona, Qahaatanne Maraara.

English Sentences: And these be the names of the sons of Gershom; Libni, and Shimei.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gershshoona naatu sunttai Liibinanne SHim77a.

English Sentences: And the sons of Kohath were, Amram, and Izhar, and Hebron, and Uzziel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qahaata naati Amiraama, Yixihaara, Kebroonanne Uzzi7eela.

English Sentences: The sons of Merari; Mahli, and Mushi. And these are the families of the Levites according to their fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maraara naati Maahilanne Musha. Bantta aawaa keettan keettan xaafettida Leewatu yarati hageeta.

English Sentences: Of Gershom; Libni his son, Jahath his son, Zimmah his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Gershshoona na7ai Liibina; Liibina na7ai Yahaata; Yahaata na7ai Ziimma.

English Sentences: Joah his son, Iddo his son, Zerah his son, Jeaterai his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ziimma na7ai Yo7aaha; Yo7aaha na7ai Idda; Iddo na7ai Zaraaha; Zaraaha na7ai Ya7atiraaya.

English Sentences: The sons of Kohath; Amminadab his son, Korah his son, Assir his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qahaata na7ai Aminadaaba; Aminadaaba na7ai Qoraaha; Qoraaha na7ai Asiira;

English Sentences: Elkanah his son, and Ebiasaph his son, and Assir his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Asiira na7ai Elqqaana; Elqqaana na7ai Ebiyaasaafa; Ebiyaasaafa na7ai Asiira;

English Sentences: Tahath his son, Uriel his son, Uzziah his son, and Shaul his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asiira na7ai Tahaata; Tahaata na7ai Uri7eela; Uri7eela na7ai Ooziyaana; Ooziyaana na7ai SHaa7ula.

English Sentences: And the sons of Elkanah; Amasai, and Ahimoth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Elqqaana naati Amaasaayanne Ahimoota.

English Sentences: As for Elkanah: the sons of Elkanah; Zophai his son, and Nahath his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ahimoota na7ai Elqqaana; Elqqaana na7ai Xofaaya; Xofaaya na7ai Nahaata;

English Sentences: Eliab his son, Jeroham his son, Elkanah his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nahaata na7ai Eli7aaba; Eli7aaba na7ai Yirohaama; Yirohaama na7ai Elqqaana.

English Sentences: And the sons of Samuel; the firstborn Vashni, and Abiah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameela na7ai bairai Yuu7eela; kaaloi Abiiya.

English Sentences: The sons of Merari; Mahli, Libni his son, Shimei his son, Uzza his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Maraara na7ai Maahila; Maahila na7ai Liibina; Liibina na7ai SHim77a; SHim77a na7ai Uzza;

English Sentences: Shimea his son, Haggiah his son, Asaiah his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Uzza na7ai SHim77a; SHim77a na7ai Haggiiya; Haggiiya na7ai Asaaya.

English Sentences: And these are they whom David set over the service of song in the house of the LORD, after that the ark had rest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Taabootaa Yerusalaame ehiidoogaappe guyyiyan, mazamuriyaa yexxanaadan GODAA keettan sunttidoogeeti hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidosona.

English Sentences: And they ministered before the dwelling place of the tabernacle of the congregation with singing, until Solomon had built the house of the LORD in Jerusalem: and then they waited on their office according to their order.
Wolaitta Sentences: Solomoni Yerusalaamen GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxana gakkanaashin, GODAA Taabootai de7iyo Dunkkaaniyaa sinttan eti mazamuriyaa yexxiiddi, kayan kayan oottoosona.

English Sentences: And these are they that waited with their children. Of the sons of the Kohathites: Heman a singer, the son of Joel, the son of Shemuel,
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta naatuura issippe yexxidaageeti hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Qahaata yaratuppe yexxiyaagee Hemaana. Hemaani Yuu7eela na7aa; Yuu7eeli Sameela na7aa;

English Sentences: The son of Elkanah, the son of Jeroham, the son of Eliel, the son of Toah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Sameeli Elqqaana na7aa; Elqqaani Yirohaama na7aa; Yirohaami Eli7eela na7aa; Eli7eeli Tooha na7aa;

English Sentences: The son of Zuph, the son of Elkanah, the son of Mahath, the son of Amasai,
Wolaitta Sentences: Toohi Xufa na7aa; Xufi Elqqaana na7aa; Elqqaani Mahaata na7aa; Mahaati Amaasaaya na7aa;

English Sentences: The son of Elkanah, the son of Joel, the son of Azariah, the son of Zephaniah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Amaasaayi Elqqaana na7aa; Elqqaani Yuu7eela na7aa; Yuu7eeli Azaariyaasa na7aa; Azaariyaasi Xafaaniyaa na7aa;

English Sentences: The son of Tahath, the son of Assir, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Xafaanee Tahaata na7aa; Tahaati Asiira na7aa; Asiiri Ebiyaasaafa na7aa; Ebiyaasaafi Qoraaha na7aa;

English Sentences: The son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the son of Levi, the son of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qoraahi Yixihaara na7aa; Yixihaari Qahaata na7aa; Qahaati Leewa na7aa; Leewi Israa7eela na7aa.

English Sentences: And his brother Asaph, who stood on his right hand, even Asaph the son of Berachiah, the son of Shimea,
Wolaitta Sentences: A dabboi Asaafi a ushachcha baggaara eqqees. Asaafi Berekiyaa na7aa; Berekee SHim77a na7aa;

English Sentences: The son of Michael, the son of Baaseiah, the son of Malchiah,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHim77i Mikaa7eela na7aa; Mikaa7eeli Ba7iseeya na7aa; Ba7iseeyi Malkkiyaa na7aa;

English Sentences: The son of Ethni, the son of Zerah, the son of Adaiah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Malkkee Etaana na7aa; Etaani Zaraaha na7aa; Zaraahi Adaaya na7aa;

English Sentences: The son of Ethan, the son of Zimmah, the son of Shimei,
Wolaitta Sentences: Adaayi Etaana na7aa; Etaani Ziimma na7aa; Ziimmi SHim77a na7aa;

English Sentences: The son of Jahath, the son of Gershom, the son of Levi.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHim77i Yahaata na7aa; Yahaati Gershshoona na7aa; Gershshooni Leewa na7aa.

English Sentences: And their brethren the sons of Merari stood on the left hand: Ethan the son of Kishi, the son of Abdi, the son of Malluch,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta haddirssa baggaara eta dabboti, Maraara yarati eqqoosona. Etaani Qiisha na7aa; Qiishi Abdda na7aa; Abddi Malluuka na7aa;

English Sentences: The son of Hashabiah, the son of Amaziah, the son of Hilkiah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Malluuki Hashaabiyaa na7aa; Hashaabee Amesiyaasa na7aa; Amesiyaasi Hilqqiyaa na7aa;

English Sentences: The son of Amzi, the son of Bani, the son of Shamer,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hilqqee Amoxa na7aa; Amoxi Baana na7aa; Baani SHemeera na7aa;

English Sentences: The son of Mahli, the son of Mushi, the son of Merari, the son of Levi.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHemeeri Maahila na7aa; Maahili Musha na7aa; Mushi Maraara na7aa; Maraari Leewa na7aa.

English Sentences: Their brethren also the Levites were appointed unto all manner of service of the tabernacle of the house of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta dabboti Leewati Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaayyo oottanau sunttettidosona.

English Sentences: But Aaron and his sons offered upon the altar of the burnt offering, and on the altar of incense, and were appointed for all the work of the place most holy, and to make an atonement for Israel, according to all that Moses the servant of God had commanded.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Aarooninne Aaroona zerettati ixaanaa cuwayoosona; yarshshiyoosan xuuggiyo yarshshuwaakka yarshshoosona. Xoossaa ashkkarai Muusee azazidoogaadan, Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwan goinniyo goino ubbaayyonne Xoossai Israa7eela nagaraa atto giyo yarshshuwaayyo aawatettai etayyo de7ees.

English Sentences: And these are the sons of Aaron; Eleazar his son, Phinehas his son, Abishua his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aaroona yeletai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaagaa. Aaroona na7ai El77aazara; El77aazara na7ai Piinihaasa; Piinihaasa na7ai Abishuu7a;

English Sentences: Bukki his son, Uzzi his son, Zerahiah his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Abishuu7a na7ai Buuqa; Buuqa na7ai Uzza; Uzza na7ai Zaraahiyaa.

English Sentences: Meraioth his son, Amariah his son, Ahitub his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Zaraahiyaa na7ai Maraayoota; Maraayoota na7ai Amaariyaa; Amaariyaa na7ai Ahixuuba;

English Sentences: Zadok his son, Ahimaaz his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ahixuuba na7ai Xaadooqa; Xaadooqa na7ai Ahima7aaxa.

English Sentences: Now these are their dwelling places throughout their castles in their coasts, of the sons of Aaron, of the families of the Kohathites: for theirs was the lot.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aaroona zareti bantta zawaa giddon de7anau eta utettaadan etayyo imettida sohoti hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Qahaata yarati koiro saamaa ekkidosona.

English Sentences: And they gave them Hebron in the land of Judah, and the suburbs thereof round about it.
Wolaitta Sentences: He saaman Yihudan de7iya Kebroona katamaanne Kebroona yuushuwan de7iya hentta gadeta etayyo immidosona;

English Sentences: But the fields of the city, and the villages thereof, they gave to Caleb the son of Jephunneh.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin katamaa goshshaanne katamaa yuushuwan de7iya moottata Yifune na7aa Kaaleebayyo immidosona.

English Sentences: And to the sons of Aaron they gave the cities of Judah, namely, Hebron, the city of refuge, and Libnah with her suburbs, and Jattir, and Eshtemoa, with their suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aaroona naatuyyo asai baqati biidi attiyo katamata, Kebroona, Yattira, Liibinanne eta hentta gadeta Eshttamoo7anne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: And Hilen with her suburbs, Debir with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiilenanne a hentta gadeta, Dabiiranne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: And Ashan with her suburbs, and Bethshemesh with her suburbs:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ashaananne a hentta gadetanne Beeti-SHemeshanne a hentta gadeta immidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the tribe of Benjamin; Geba with her suburbs, and Alemeth with her suburbs, and Anathoth with her suburbs. All their cities throughout their families were thirteen cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Biniyaama zaretuppe Gebaa7anne a hentta gadeta, Alemeetanne a hentta gadetanne Anatootanne a hentta gadeta immidosona. Aaroona naatuyyo imettida katamati muleera tammanne heezza.

English Sentences: And unto the sons of Kohath, which were left of the family of that tribe, were cities given out of the half tribe, namely, out of the half tribe of Manasseh, by lot, ten cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Minaase yaratu baggatu biittaappe tammu katamata attida Qahaata yaratuyyo saaman immidosona.

English Sentences: And to the sons of Gershom throughout their families out of the tribe of Issachar, and out of the tribe of Asher, and out of the tribe of Naphtali, and out of the tribe of Manasseh in Bashan, thirteen cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yisaakoora zaretu biittaappe, Aseera zaretu biittaappe, Nifttaaleema zaretu biittaappenne Baasaanen de7iya Minaase yaratu biittaappe tammanne heezzu katamata Gershshoona yaratuyyo saaman immidosona.

English Sentences: Unto the sons of Merari were given by lot, throughout their families, out of the tribe of Reuben, and out of the tribe of Gad, and out of the tribe of Zebulun, twelve cities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Roobeela zaretu biittaappe, Gaada zaretu biittaappenne Zaabiloona zaretu biittaappe tammanne naa77u katamata Maraara yaratuyyo saaman immidosona.

English Sentences: And the children of Israel gave to the Levites these cities with their suburbs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan oottidi, Israa7eela asai Leewatuyyo ha katamatanne katamatu heeran de7iya hentta gadeta immiis.

English Sentences: And they gave by lot out of the tribe of the children of Judah, and out of the tribe of the children of Simeon, and out of the tribe of the children of Benjamin, these cities, which are called by their names.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yihudaa zaretu biittaappe, Simoona zaretu biittaappenne Biniyaama zaretu biittaappe, hagaappe qommo baggaara bantta sunttan xaafettida katamata etayyo saaman immiis.

English Sentences: And the residue of the families of the sons of Kohath had cities of their coasts out of the tribe of Ephraim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qahaata yaratuppe amaridaageeti bantta katamata Efireema zaretu katamatuppe ekkidosona.

English Sentences: And they gave unto them, of the cities of refuge, Shechem in mount Ephraim with her suburbs; they gave also Gezer with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Etayyo asai baqati biidi attiyo katamata, Efireema gezziyan de7iya Sekeemanne a hentta gadeta, Gezeeranne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: And Jokmeam with her suburbs, and Bethhoron with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoqima7aamanne a hentta gadeta, Beeti-Horoonanne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: And Aijalon with her suburbs, and Gathrimmon with her suburbs:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ayyaaloonanne a hentta gadetanne Gaate-Rimmoonanne a hentta gadeta immidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the half tribe of Manasseh; Aner with her suburbs, and Bileam with her suburbs, for the family of the remnant of the sons of Kohath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Minaase zaretu baggatuppe Aneeranne a hentta gadetanne Bil77aamanne a hentta gadeta ekkidi, Qahaata yaratuppe attidaageetuyyo immidosona.

English Sentences: Unto the sons of Gershom were given out of the family of the half tribe of Manasseh, Golan in Bashan with her suburbs, and Ashtaroth with her suburbs:
Wolaitta Sentences: Minaase zaretu baggatuppe Baasaanen de7iya Golaananne a hentta gadetanne Asttaarootanne a hentta gadeta ekkidi, Gershshoona yaratuyyo immidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the tribe of Issachar; Kedesh with her suburbs, Daberath with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yisaakoora zaretuppe Qaadeesanne a hentta gadeta, Dabiraatanne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: And Ramoth with her suburbs, and Anem with her suburbs:
Wolaitta Sentences: Raamootanne a hentta gadetanne Aaneemanne a hentta gadeta ekkidi, etayyo immidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the tribe of Asher; Mashal with her suburbs, and Abdon with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Aseera zaretuppe Maashaalanne a hentta gadeta, Abddoonanne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: And Hukok with her suburbs, and Rehob with her suburbs:
Wolaitta Sentences: Huqooqanne a hentta gadetanne Rahoobanne a hentta gadeta ekkidi, etayyo immidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the tribe of Naphtali; Kedesh in Galilee with her suburbs, and Hammon with her suburbs, and Kirjathaim with her suburbs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka Nifttaaleema zaretuppe Galiilan de7iya Qedeeshanne a hentta gadeta, Hammoonanne a hentta gadetanne Qiriyaataimanne a hentta gadeta ekkidi, etayyo immidosona.

English Sentences: Unto the rest of the children of Merari were given out of the tribe of Zebulun, Rimmon with her suburbs, Tabor with her suburbs:
Wolaitta Sentences: Attida Maraara yaratuyyo Zaabiloona zaretuppe Rimmoonanne a hentta gadetanne Taabooranne a hentta gadeta ekkidi immidosona.

English Sentences: And on the other side Jordan by Jericho, on the east side of Jordan, were given them out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer in the wilderness with her suburbs, and Jahzah with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Roobeela zaretuppe Yarkko ginan, Yorddaanoosappe hefinttan arggo baggaara, xoqqa dembban de7iya Beexeranne a hentta gadeta, Yaahixanne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: Kedemoth also with her suburbs, and Mephaath with her suburbs:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qidemootanne a hentta gadetanne Mefa7aatanne a hentta gadeta ekkidi, etayyo immidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the tribe of Gad; Ramoth in Gilead with her suburbs, and Mahanaim with her suburbs,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Gaada zaretuppe Gala7aaden de7iya Raamootanne a hentta gadeta, Maahinaimanne a hentta gadeta,

English Sentences: And Heshbon with her suburbs, and Jazer with her suburbs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haseboonanne a hentta gadetanne Yaa7izeeranne a hentta gadeta ekkidi etayyo immidosona.

English Sentences: Now the sons of Issachar were, Tola, and Puah, Jashub, and Shimrom, four.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yisaakoorayyo oiddu naati de7oosona; etikka Tolaa7a, Puuwa, Yaashuubanne SHimiroona.

English Sentences: And the sons of Tola; Uzzi, and Rephaiah, and Jeriel, and Jahmai, and Jibsam, and Shemuel, heads of their father's house, to wit, of Tola: they were valiant men of might in their generations; whose number was in the days of David two and twenty thousand and six hundred.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tolaa7a naati Uzza, Rafaaya, Yirii7eela, Yaahimaaya, Yibisaamanne SHalumi7eela; eti Tolaa7a yaratu halaqata. Eti wolqqaamanne xala asata. Daawita wode eta qoodai laatamanne naa77u sha7anne usuppun xeeta.

English Sentences: And the sons of Uzzi; Izrahiah: and the sons of Izrahiah; Michael, and Obadiah, and Joel, Ishiah, five: all of them chief men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Uzza na7ai Yiziraahiyaa. Yiziraahiyaa naati Mikaa7eela, Obaadiyaa, Yuu7eelanne Yishiyaa; ha ichchashatikka so asaa halaqata.

English Sentences: And with them, by their generations, after the house of their fathers, were bands of soldiers for war, six and thirty thousand men: for they had many wives and sons.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta aawatu so asaa yeletaadan Uzza yaratuppe olau giigida olanchchati hasttamanne usuppun sha7a; aissi giikko, etayyo cora maccaasainne cora naati de7oosona.

English Sentences: And their brethren among all the families of Issachar were valiant men of might, reckoned in all by their genealogies fourscore and seven thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yisaakoora zaretuppe olanchchati bantta yeletaa mazggafan qoodettidi, muleera hosppun tammanne laappun sha7a gididosona.

English Sentences: The sons of Benjamin; Bela, and Becher, and Jediael, three.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaamayyo heezzu naati de7oosona; etikka Belaa7a, Bekeeranne Yidi7eela.

English Sentences: And the sons of Bela; Ezbon, and Uzzi, and Uzziel, and Jerimoth, and Iri, five; heads of the house of their fathers, mighty men of valour; and were reckoned by their genealogies twenty and two thousand and thirty and four.
Wolaitta Sentences: Belaa7a naati Exiboona, Uzza, Uzzi7eela, Yaarimootanne Ira; ha ichchashatikka so asaa halaqata. Eti wolqqaamanne xala asata. Bantta yeletaadan qoodettida olanchchati laatamanne naa77u sha7anne hasttamanne oiddaa gididosona.

English Sentences: And the sons of Becher; Zemira, and Joash, and Eliezer, and Elioenai, and Omri, and Jerimoth, and Abiah, and Anathoth, and Alameth. All these are the sons of Becher.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bekeera naati Zamiira, Yo7aasha, El77eezara, Eliyoo7enaaya, Omira, Yaarimoota, Abiiya, Anatootanne Alemeeta; hageeti ubbati Bekeera naata.

English Sentences: And the number of them, after their genealogy by their generations, heads of the house of their fathers, mighty men of valour, was twenty thousand and two hundred.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta yeletaa mazggafaadan qoodettida wolqqaamanne xala asati laatamu sha7anne naa77u xeeta gididosona.

English Sentences: The sons also of Jediael; Bilhan: and the sons of Bilhan; Jeush, and Benjamin, and Ehud, and Chenaanah, and Zethan, and Tharshish, and Ahishahar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yidi7eela na7ai Bilihaana. Bilihaana naati Yi7uusha, Biniyaama, Ehuuda, Kanaa7ina, Zetaana, Tarsseesanne Ahishahaara;

English Sentences: All these the sons of Jediael, by the heads of their fathers, mighty men of valour, were seventeen thousand and two hundred soldiers, fit to go out for war and battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: hageeti ubbati Yidi7eela naata. Eti so asaa halaqatanne wolqqaamanne xala asata. Bantta yeletaadan qoodettida olanchchati tammanne laappun sha7anne naa77u xeeta.

English Sentences: Shuppim also, and Huppim, the children of Ir, and Hushim, the sons of Aher.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi SHufiiminne Hufiimi Ira naata. Hushiimi Daana na7aa.

English Sentences: The sons of Naphtali; Jahziel, and Guni, and Jezer, and Shallum, the sons of Bilhah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nifttaaleema naati Yaahixi7eela, Guuna, Yexeeranne SHaaluuma; hageeti Baali naatu naata.

English Sentences: The sons of Manasseh; Ashriel, whom she bare: (but his concubine the Aramitess bare Machir the father of Gilead:
Wolaitta Sentences: Minaase zareti hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Minaasee Sooriyaa biittaappe ekkido kaadumatiyaa yelido attuma naati Asiri7eelanne Gala7aade aawaa Maakiira.

English Sentences: And Machir took to wife the sister of Huppim and Shuppim, whose sister's name was Maachah;) and the name of the second was Zelophehad: and Zelophehad had daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maakiiri Hufiimassinne SHufiimassi issi issi maccaasa oichchidi immiis. Maakiira michchee sunttai Maa7iko. Maakiira na7ai kaaloi Xalofihaada. Xalofihaadi macca naatu xalaalaa yeliis.

English Sentences: And Maachah the wife of Machir bare a son, and she called his name Peresh; and the name of his brother was Sheresh; and his sons were Ulam and Rakem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maakiira maccaasiyaa Maa7ika ayyo naata yelaasu. Baira na7aa Peresha sunttaasu; Peresha ishaa sunttai SHereesha. Peresha naati Ulaamanne Raqeema.

English Sentences: And the sons of Ulam; Bedan. These were the sons of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ulaama na7ai Badaana. Hageeti Minaase na7aa na7aa, Maakiira na7aa Gala7aade zareta.

English Sentences: And his sister Hammoleketh bare Ishod, and Abiezer, and Mahalah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gala7aade michchiyaa Hamolekeeta Ishooda, Abi7eezeranne Maahila yelaasu.

English Sentences: And the sons of Shemidah were, Ahian, and Shechem, and Likhi, and Aniam.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHamidaa7a naati Ahiyaana, SHekeema, Liiqihanne Ani7aama.

English Sentences: And the sons of Ephraim; Shuthelah, and Bered his son, and Tahath his son, and Eladah his son, and Tahath his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema na7ai SHutelaaha; SHutelaaha na7ai Bereeda; Bereeda na7ai Tahaata; Tahaata na7ai El77aada; El77aada na7ai Tahaata;

English Sentences: And Zabad his son, and Shuthelah his son, and Ezer, and Elead, whom the men of Gath that were born in that land slew, because they came down to take away their cattle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tahaata na7ai Zabaada; Zabaada na7ai SHutelaaha. Efireemayyo Edeeranne El77aada geetettiya hara naa77u naati de7oosona. Eti Gaate katamaa asatu mehiyaa wuuqqishin, asai eta oiqqidi woriis.

English Sentences: And Ephraim their father mourned many days, and his brethren came to comfort him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, eta aawai Efireemi daro wodiyaa azzaniis; azzanin a ishantti a minttettanau yiidosona.

English Sentences: And when he went in to his wife, she conceived, and bare a son, and he called his name Beriah, because it went evil with his house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, i ba keettaayeera gaittiis; gaittin a shahaarada attuma na7aa yelaasu. Efireema soo gakkida iita metuwaa gishshau, i ba na7aa Barii7a sunttiis.

English Sentences: (And his daughter was Sherah, who built Bethhoron the nether, and the upper, and Uzzensherah.)
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireemayyo SHe7iiro giyo na7iyaa de7ausu; Hirkki Beeti-Horoona, Qommo Beeti-Horoonanne Uzenishe7iira geetettiya katamata he na7iyaa keexxaasu.

English Sentences: And Rephah was his son, also Resheph, and Telah his son, and Tahan his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema attuma na7ai Refaaha; Refaaha na7ai Resheefa; Resheefa na7ai Telaaha; Telaaha na7ai Tahaana;

English Sentences: Laadan his son, Ammihud his son, Elishama his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Tahaana na7ai La7idaana; La7idaana na7ai Amihuuda; Amihuuda na7ai Elishamaa7a;

English Sentences: Non his son, Jehoshuah his son,
Wolaitta Sentences: Elishamaa7a na7ai Nawa; Nawe na7ai Yaasa.

English Sentences: And their possessions and habitations were, Bethel and the towns thereof, and eastward Naaran, and westward Gezer, with the towns thereof; Shechem also and the towns thereof, unto Gaza and the towns thereof:
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema zaretu biittainne eti de7iyoosai Beeteelenne Beeteele moottata, arshsho baggaara de7iya Na7iraana, arggo baggaara de7iya Gezeeranne Gezeera moottata, SHekeemanne SHekeema moottatanne Aayanne Aaya moottata.

English Sentences: And by the borders of the children of Manasseh, Bethshean and her towns, Taanach and her towns, Megiddo and her towns, Dor and her towns. In these dwelt the children of Joseph the son of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Minaase zaretu biittaa zawan de7iya Beetishaananne Beetishaana moottata, Taa7inaakanne Taa7inaaka moottata, Magiddonne Magiddo moottatanne Dooranne Doora moottata. Israa7eela na7aa Yooseefa zareti ha katamatun de7idosona.

English Sentences: The sons of Asher; Imnah, and Isuah, and Ishuai, and Beriah, and Serah their sister.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aseera attuma naati Yimina, Yishiwaaha, Yishiwanne Barii7a; eta michchiyaa Seraaho.

English Sentences: And the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel, who is the father of Birzavith.
Wolaitta Sentences: Barii7a attuma naati Hebeeranne Birzzaawita aawaa Malkki7eela.

English Sentences: And Heber begat Japhlet, and Shomer, and Hotham, and Shua their sister.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hebeeri Yaafileexa, SHomeeranne Hotaama yeliis; eta michchee sunttai SHuu7o.

English Sentences: And the sons of Japhlet; Pasach, and Bimhal, and Ashvath. These are the children of Japhlet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaafileexa attuma naati Paasaaka, Bimihaalanne Ashiwaata; hageeti Yaafileexa naata.

English Sentences: And the sons of Shamer; Ahi, and Rohgah, Jehubbah, and Aram.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaafileexa ishaa SHomeera attuma naati Aaha, Rohiga, Yahuubanne Araama.

English Sentences: And the sons of his brother Helem; Zophah, and Imna, and Shelesh, and Amal.
Wolaitta Sentences: A ishaa Hotaama attuma naati Xofaaha, Yiminaa7a, SHeleeshanne Amaala.

English Sentences: The sons of Zophah; Suah, and Harnepher, and Shual, and Beri, and Imrah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Xofaaha attuma naati Suha, Harnneefera, SHu7aala, Beera, Yimira,

English Sentences: Bezer, and Hod, and Shamma, and Shilshah, and Ithran, and Beera.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beexera, Hooda, SHamma, SHilshsha, Yitiraananne Ba7eera.

English Sentences: And the sons of Jether; Jephunneh, and Pispah, and Ara.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yetera attuma naati Yifuna, Pisppanne Aara.

English Sentences: And the sons of Ulla; Arah, and Haniel, and Rezia.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ulla attuma naati Araaha, Hani7eelanne Riixiyaa.

English Sentences: All these were the children of Asher, heads of their father's house, choice and mighty men of valour, chief of the princes. And the number throughout the genealogy of them that were apt to the war and to battle was twenty and six thousand men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti ubbati Aseera zareta. Eti bantta aawatu so asaa halaqatanne doorettida wolqqaamanne xala asata. Bantta yeletaadan qoodettida olanchchati laatamanne usuppun sha7aa gididosona.

English Sentences: Now Benjamin begat Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaama na7ai bairai Belaa7a; kaaloi Ashibeela; heezzanttoi Ahiraaha;

English Sentences: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
Wolaitta Sentences: oiddanttoi Noha; ichchashanttoi Raafa.

English Sentences: And the sons of Bela were, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,
Wolaitta Sentences: Belaa7a attuma naati Adaara, Geera, Abihuuda,

English Sentences: And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Abishuu7a, Naa7imaana, Ahooha,

English Sentences: And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geera, SHafufaamanne Huraama.

English Sentences: And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ehuuda attuma naati Naa7imaana, Akiiyanne Geera. Eti Gebaa7an de7ida bantta aawatu so asaa halaqata.

English Sentences: And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, eti Manahaata biitti omoodetti biidosona. Eta halaqai Geeri Uzzanne Ahihuuda aawaa.

English Sentences: And Shaharaim begat children in the country of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaharaami ba maccaasata Hushiimonne Baa7iro yeddidoogaappe guyyiyan, Moo7aaba biittan attuma naata yeliis.

English Sentences: And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaharaami ba maccaasee Hodeeshin Yobaaba, Xiibiyaa, Meesha, Malkkaama,

English Sentences: And Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirma. These were his sons, heads of the fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ya7uuxa, Saakiyaanne Mirmma yeliis. A naati ubbai so asaa halaqata gididosona.

English Sentences: And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba maccaasee Hushiimin, Ahixuubanne Elppa7aala yeliis.

English Sentences: The sons of Elpaal; Eber, and Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof:
Wolaitta Sentences: Elppa7aala attuma naati Ebeera, Misha7aamanne SHemeda. SHemedi Oonanne Looda katamatanne eta heeran de7iya moottata keexxiis.

English Sentences: Beriah also, and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi SHaharaami Barii7anne SHemaa7a yeliis. Eti Ayyaaloona kataman de7iya bantta so asaa halaqata. Eti Gaate kataman de7iya asaa yedettidosona.

English Sentences: And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka SHaharaami Ahiyya, SHaashaqa, Yiremoota yeliis.

English Sentences: And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,
Wolaitta Sentences: Zabaadee, Araadi, Edeeri,

English Sentences: And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;
Wolaitta Sentences: Mikaa7eeli, Yishppinne Yoohi Barii7a attuma naata.

English Sentences: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,
Wolaitta Sentences: Zabaadee, Mashulaami, Hizqqi, Hebeeri,

English Sentences: Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yishimaraayi, Yuzilii7inne Yobaabi Elppa7aala attuma naata.

English Sentences: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqiimi, Ziikiri, Zabddi,

English Sentences: And Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eli7enaayi, Xilttaayi, Eli7eeli,

English Sentences: And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;
Wolaitta Sentences: Adaayi, Baraayinne SHiimiraati SHim77a attuma naata.

English Sentences: And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yishphphaani, Ebeeri, Eli7eeli,

English Sentences: And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,
Wolaitta Sentences: Abddooni, Ziikiri, Hanaani,

English Sentences: And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hanaanee, Elaami, Anttootee,

English Sentences: And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yifidaayinne Panu7eeli SHaashaqa attuma naata.

English Sentences: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaamisharaayi, SHahaaree, Ataalee,

English Sentences: And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaa7ireeshee, Eelaasinne Ziikiri Yirohaama attuma naata.
