English Sentences: These were heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief men. These dwelt in Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti bantta yeletan Yerusalaamen uttida bantta so asaa halaqata.

English Sentences: And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; whose wife's name was Maachah:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gabaa7oona aawai Yi7i7eeli Gabaa7oona kataman de7iis. A keettaayee sunttai Maa7iko.

English Sentences: And his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,
Wolaitta Sentences: A na7ai bairai Abddoona; a attuma naati harati Xuura, Qiisa, Ba7aala, Nadaaba,

English Sentences: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gadoora, Ahiyya, Zekeranne

English Sentences: And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And these also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, over against them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Miqiloota. Miqilooti SHim77a yeliis. Hageeti qassi Yerusalaamen de7iya bantta dabbotu matan de7idosona.

English Sentences: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeri Qiisa yeliis; Qiisi Saa7oola yeliis. Saa7ooli Yonaataana, Malkkishuu7a, Abinadaabanne Eshiba7aala yeliis.

English Sentences: And the son of Jonathan was Meribbaal; and Meribbaal begat Micah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yonaataana na7ai Mariiba7aala; Mariiba7aali Mikiyaasa yeliis.

English Sentences: And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mikiyaasa attuma naati Pittoona, Meleka, Taree7anne Akaaza.

English Sentences: And Ahaz begat Jehoadah; and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,
Wolaitta Sentences: Akaazi Yaho7aada yeliis. Yaho7aadi Alemeeta, Azimaaweetanne Zimira yeliis. Zimiri Mooxa yeliis;

English Sentences: And Moza begat Binea: Rapha was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son:
Wolaitta Sentences: Mooxi Biini7a yeliis; Biini7i Raafa yeliis; Raafi El77aasa yeliis; El77aasi Axeela yeliis.

English Sentences: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Axeelayyo usuppun attuma naati de7oosona. Eta sunttai Aziriqaama, Bookera, Isimaa7eela, SHa7aariyaa, Obaadiyaanne Hanaana; hageeti ubbai Axeela naata.

English Sentences: And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
Wolaitta Sentences: Axeela ishaa Esheeqayyo heezzu naati de7oosona. A na7ai bairai Ulaama; kaaloi Yi7uusha; heezzanttoi Elifeleexa.

English Sentences: And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers, and had many sons, and sons' sons, an hundred and fifty. All these are of the sons of Benjamin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ulaama naati wolqqaamanne xala asata; eti wonddafiyaasata. Ulaamayyo xeetanne ishatamaa gidiya naatinne naatu naati de7oosona. Hageeti ubbati Biniyaama zareta.

English Sentences: So all Israel were reckoned by genealogies; and, behold, they were written in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah, who were carried away to Babylon for their transgression.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai ubbai ba yeletan yeletan xaafettiis; ha taarikee Israa7eela Kawotu Maxaafan de7ees. Yihudaa asai ammanettibeenna gishshau, Baabiloone biitti omoodetti biidosona.

English Sentences: Now the first inhabitants that dwelt in their possessions in their cities were, the Israelites, the priests, Levites, and the Nethinims.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koiro simmida Israa7eela asai, qeeseti, Leewatinne Beeta Maqidasiyan oottiyaageeti bantta sohotuuninne bantta katamatun uttidosona.

English Sentences: And in Jerusalem dwelt of the children of Judah, and of the children of Benjamin, and of the children of Ephraim, and Manasseh;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa zaretuppe, Biniyaama zaretuppe, Efireema zaretuppenne Minaase zaretuppe amaridaageeti Yerusalaamen de7idosona.

English Sentences: Uthai the son of Ammihud, the son of Omri, the son of Imri, the son of Bani, of the children of Pharez the son of Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa na7aa Paareesa yaratuppe Utaayi Yerusalaamen uttidaageetu halaqaa. Utaayi Amihuuda na7aa; Amihuudi Omira na7aa; Omiri Imira na7aa; Imiri Baana na7aa.

English Sentences: And of the Shilonites; Asaiah the firstborn, and his sons.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa na7aa SHeela yaratuppe Asaayinne a naati Yerusalaamen uttidaageetu halaqata.

English Sentences: And of the sons of Zerah; Jeuel, and their brethren, six hundred and ninety.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa na7aa Zaraaha yaratuppe Yi7u7eeli Yerusalaamen uttidaageetu halaqaa. Yihudaa zareti qoodin muleera usuppun xeetanne uddufun tamma.

English Sentences: And of the sons of Benjamin; Sallu the son of Meshullam, the son of Hodaviah, the son of Hasenuah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaama yaratu halaqati hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidosona. Halaqai Saalu Mashulaama na7aa;

English Sentences: And Ibneiah the son of Jeroham, and Elah the son of Uzzi, the son of Michri, and Meshullam the son of Shephathiah, the son of Reuel, the son of Ibnijah;
Wolaitta Sentences: Mashulaami Hodaawiyaa na7aa; Hodaawee Hassanuu7a na7aa. Halaqai Yibinaayi Yirohaama na7aa. Halaqai Eeli Uzza na7aa; Uzzi Miikira na7aa.

English Sentences: And their brethren, according to their generations, nine hundred and fifty and six. All these men were chief of the fathers in the house of their fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Halaqai Mashulaami SHafaaxiyaa na7aa; SHafaaxee Ra7u7eela na7aa; Ra7u7eeli Yibiniyaa na7aa. Biniyaama zareti qoodin muleera uddufun xeetanne ishatamanne usuppuna.

English Sentences: And of the priests; Jedaiah, and Jehoiarib, and Jachin,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yerusalaamen de7ida qeeseti hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Eti Yadaaya, Yihoyaariba, Yaakiinanne

English Sentences: And Azariah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, the ruler of the house of God;
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyan halaqatiya Azaariyaasa. Azaariyaasi Hilqqiyaa na7aa; Hilqqee Mashulaama na7aa; Mashulaami Xaadooqa na7aa; Xaadooqi Maraayoota na7aa; Maraayooti Ahixuuba na7aa.

English Sentences: And Adaiah the son of Jeroham, the son of Pashur, the son of Malchijah, and Maasiai the son of Adiel, the son of Jahzerah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Meshillemith, the son of Immer;
Wolaitta Sentences: Harati qassi Yirohaama na7aa Adaayanne Adii7eela na7aa Ma7isaaya. Yirohaami Paashihuura na7aa; Paashihuuri Malkkiyaa na7aa. Adii7eeli Yaahizeera na7aa; Yaahizeeri Mashulaama na7aa; Mashulaami Mashilemiita na7aa; Mashilemiiti Imeera na7aa.

English Sentences: And their brethren, heads of the house of their fathers, a thousand and seven hundred and threescore; very able men for the work of the service of the house of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta so asaassi halaqatiya qeeseti issi sha7anne laappun xeetanne usuppun tamma. Hageeti Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyan oottanau danddayiya asata.

English Sentences: And of the Levites; Shemaiah the son of Hasshub, the son of Azrikam, the son of Hashabiah, of the sons of Merari;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yerusalaamen de7ida Leewati hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Hashshuuba na7ai SHamaa7ee Maraara yara. Hashshuubi Aziriqaama na7aa; Aziriqaami Hashaabiyaa na7aa.

English Sentences: And Bakbakkar, Heresh, and Galal, and Mattaniah the son of Micah, the son of Zichri, the son of Asaph;
Wolaitta Sentences: Harati qassi Baqibaqaara, Hereesha, Galaalanne Mataaniyaa. Mataanee Miika na7aa; Miiki Ziikira na7aa; Ziikiri Asaafa na7aa.

English Sentences: And Obadiah the son of Shemaiah, the son of Galal, the son of Jeduthun, and Berechiah the son of Asa, the son of Elkanah, that dwelt in the villages of the Netophathites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Harati qassi Naxoofa asatu moottatun uttida Obaadiyaanne Berekiyaa. Obaadee SHamaa7iyaa na7aa; SHamaa7ee Galaala na7aa; Galaali Yidutuuna na7aa. Berekee Asa na7aa; Asi Elqqaana na7aa.

English Sentences: And the porters were, Shallum, and Akkub, and Talmon, and Ahiman, and their brethren: Shallum was the chief;
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasiyaa penggiyaa naagiyaageeti SHaaluuma, Aqquuba, Xalmmoona, Ahimaananne eta dabbota. SHaaluumi eta halaqaa.

English Sentences: Who hitherto waited in the king's gate eastward: they were porters in the companies of the children of Levi.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha yarati kase arggo baggaara de7iya, Kawo Penggiyaa giyo penggiyaa naagidosona. Hegaappe kase eti Leewati dunkkaaniyo wode, eta dunkkaaneta naagidosona.

English Sentences: And Shallum the son of Kore, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah, and his brethren, of the house of his father, the Korahites, were over the work of the service, keepers of the gates of the tabernacle: and their fathers, being over the host of the LORD, were keepers of the entry.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaaluumi Ebiyaasaafa na7aa Qore na7aa; i Qoraaha yara asa. Qoraaha yarati kase GODAA Dunkkaaniyaa naagidoogaadan, SHaaluuminne Qoraaha yara gidiya a dabboti Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliyo penggiyaa naagoosona.

English Sentences: And Phinehas the son of Eleazar was the ruler over them in time past, and the LORD was with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: El77aazara na7ai Piinihaasi beni wode Qoraaha yaratu halaqaa; GODAI aara de7iis.

English Sentences: And Zechariah the son of Meshelemiah was porter of the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mashelemiyaa na7ai Zakkaariyaasi Dunkkaaniyaa geliyo penggiyaa naagiis.

English Sentences: All these which were chosen to be porters in the gates were two hundred and twelve. These were reckoned by their genealogy in their villages, whom David and Samuel the seer did ordain in their set office.
Wolaitta Sentences: Penggiyaa naaganau doorettidaageeti muleera naa77u xeetanne tammanne naa77a; hageeti bantta moottan moottan qoodettidi xaafettidosona. Eta yaratuyyo ha aawatettaa immidaageeti Kawuwaa Daawitanne hananabaa yootiya Sameela.

English Sentences: So they and their children had the oversight of the gates of the house of the LORD, namely, the house of the tabernacle, by wards.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, etinne eta naati Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliyo penggiyaa naagoosona.

English Sentences: In four quarters were the porters, toward the east, west, north, and south.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oiddu zoozetun arggon, arshshon, huuphessaaninne tohossan issi issi penggee de7ees; he penggeta naagiyaageetikka de7oosona.

English Sentences: And their brethren, which were in their villages, were to come after seven days from time to time with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: He moottan de7iya eta dabboti laappuntta laappuntta gallassan laametti naagidi, eta maaddoosona.

English Sentences: For these Levites, the four chief porters, were in their set office, and were over the chambers and treasuries of the house of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Penggiyaa naagiya oiddu halaqati Leewata; eti Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyaayyo, a giddo kifiletuyyoonne kifiletu giddon de7iya miishshatuyyo aawatoosona.

English Sentences: And they lodged round about the house of God, because the charge was upon them, and the opening thereof every morning pertained to them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyaa naagiyaageetinne qassi maallado maallado kariyaa dooyiyaageeti eta gidiyo gishshau, yan aqoosona.

English Sentences: And certain of them had the charge of the ministering vessels, that they should bring them in and out by tale.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewatuppe amaridaageeti goinniyo wode go7ettiyo miishshatuyyo aawatoosona; he miishshata kare kessiyo wodenne soo gelissiyo wode eti qoodoosona.

English Sentences: Some of them also were appointed to oversee the vessels, and all the instruments of the sanctuary, and the fine flour, and the wine, and the oil, and the frankincense, and the spices.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi etappe issooti issooti Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon go7ettiyo hara miishshatuyyo, liiqo xiilliyaayyo, woine eessaayyo, zaitiyaayyo, ixaanaayyoonne sawotuyyo aawatoosona.

English Sentences: And some of the sons of the priests made the ointment of the spices.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin qeesetu naatuppe issooti issooti sawuwaa likki likkidi walakkoosona.

English Sentences: And Mattithiah, one of the Levites, who was the firstborn of Shallum the Korahite, had the set office over the things that were made in the pans.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qoraaha yaratuppe SHaaluuma baira na7ai Matiitee yarshshuwaa oittaa uukkiyoogau aawatees.

English Sentences: And other of their brethren, of the sons of the Kohathites, were over the shewbread, to prepare it every sabbath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qahaata yara gidiya eta dabbotuppe amaridaageeti qassi Sambbatan Sambbatan xaraphpheezan wottiyo oittaa giigissiyo aawatettaa oiqqoosona.

English Sentences: And these are the singers, chief of the fathers of the Levites, who remaining in the chambers were free: for they were employed in that work day and night.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewatu zaretuppe amarida halaqati Beeta Maqidasiyan yexxiyaageeta. Qammikka gallassikka eti oottiyo gishshau, hara ooso oottennan, Beeta Maqidasiyaa dirssaa giddon de7iya keettatun de7oosona.

English Sentences: These chief fathers of the Levites were chief throughout their generations; these dwelt at Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewa zaretu so asaa halaqati ubbai hagaappe qommoora xaafettidaageeta; eti Yerusalaamen de7idosona.

English Sentences: And in Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon, Jehiel, whose wife's name was Maachah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Gabaa7oona aawai Yi7i7eeli Gabaa7oona kataman de7iis. A keettaayee sunttai Maa7iko.

English Sentences: And his firstborn son Abdon, then Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Ner, and Nadab,
Wolaitta Sentences: A na7ai bairai Abddoona; a naati harati Xuura, Qiisa, Ba7aala, Neera, Nadaaba,

English Sentences: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zechariah, and Mikloth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gadoora, Ahiyya, Zekeranne Miqiloota.

English Sentences: And Mikloth begat Shimeam. And they also dwelt with their brethren at Jerusalem, over against their brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Miqilooti SHim77a yeliis. Hageeti qassi Yerusalaamen de7iya bantta dabbotu matan de7idosona.

English Sentences: And Ner begat Kish; and Kish begat Saul; and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeri Qiisa yeliis; Qiisi Saa7oola yeliis. Saa7ooli Yonaataana, Malkkishuu7a, Abinadaabanne Eshiba7aala yeliis.

English Sentences: And the son of Jonathan was Meribbaal: and Meribbaal begat Micah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yonaataana na7ai Mariiba7aala; Mariiba7aali Mikiyaasa yeliis.

English Sentences: And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tahrea, and Ahaz.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mikiyaasa naati Pittoona, Meleka, Taree7anne Akaaza.

English Sentences: And Ahaz begat Jarah; and Jarah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza;
Wolaitta Sentences: Akaazi Yaa7iira yeliis. Yaa7iiri Alemeeta, Azimaaweetanne Zimira yeliis. Zimiri Mooxa yeliis;

English Sentences: And Moza begat Binea; and Rephaiah his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mooxi Biini7a yeliis; Biini7i Rafaaya yeliis; Rafaayi El77aasa yeliis; El77aasi Axeela yeliis.

English Sentences: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan: these were the sons of Azel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Axeelayyo usuppun attuma naati de7oosona. Eta sunttai Aziriqaama, Bookera, Isimaa7eela, SHa7aariyaa, Obaadiyaanne Hanaana; hageeti ubbai Axeela naata.

English Sentences: Now the Philistines fought against Israel; and the men of Israel fled from before the Philistines, and fell down slain in mount Gilboa.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeema asati Israa7eela asatuura olettidosona. Israa7eela asati Pilisxxeema asatu sinttappe baqatidosona. Daro Israa7eelati Gilbboo7a Deriyan haiqqidosona.

English Sentences: And the Philistines followed hard after Saul, and after his sons; and the Philistines slew Jonathan, and Abinadab, and Malchishua, the sons of Saul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeema asati Saa7oolanne a attuma naata yedetti gakkidi, Saa7oola naata Yonaataana, Abinadaabanne Malkkishuu7a woridosona.

English Sentences: And the battle went sore against Saul, and the archers hit him, and he was wounded of the archers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Olai Saa7oola yuuyi aadhdhidi un77ettiis; wonddafiyaasati Saa7oola demmido wode, zubbiyan a caddidi masunxxissidosona.

English Sentences: Then said Saul to his armourbearer, Draw thy sword, and thrust me through therewith; lest these uncircumcised come and abuse me. But his armourbearer would not; for he was sore afraid. So Saul took a sword, and fell upon it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Masunxxissin Saa7ooli ba ola miishshaa tookkiyaagaa, "Ha qaxxarettibeenna Pilisxxeemati yiidi, ta bolli kaa7ennaadan, ne bisuwan caddada, tana neeni wora" yaagiis. SHin a ola miishshaa tookkiyaagee keehippe yayyido gishshau ixxiis; ixxin Saa7ooli ba bisuwaa sa7an essidi, a bolli kunddiis.

English Sentences: And when his armourbearer saw that Saul was dead, he fell likewise on the sword, and died.
Wolaitta Sentences: A ola miishshaa tookkiyaagee Saa7ooli haiqqidoogaa be7idi, ikka ba bisuwaa sa7an essidi, a bolli kunddidi, haiqqi aggiis.

English Sentences: So Saul died, and his three sons, and all his house died together.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaadan hanidi, Saa7ooli, a naati heezzainne a so asai ubbai he gallassi issippe haiqqidosona.

English Sentences: And when all the men of Israel that were in the valley saw that they fled, and that Saul and his sons were dead, then they forsook their cities, and fled: and the Philistines came and dwelt in them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wombban de7iya Israa7eela asati ubbai bantta olanchchati baqatidoogaanne Saa7oolinne a naati haiqqidoogaa be7idi, etikka bantta katamata aggidi baqatidosona. Baqatin Pilisxxeema asati yiidi, he katamatun de7idosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass on the morrow, when the Philistines came to strip the slain, that they found Saul and his sons fallen in mount Gilboa.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi Pilisxxeemati ahatu bollaappe ola miishshata qaari ekkanau yiidi, Saa7oolinne a naati Gilbboo7a Deriyan haiqqidi, zin77idaageeta demmidosona.

English Sentences: And when they had stripped him, they took his head, and his armour, and sent into the land of the Philistines round about, to carry tidings unto their idols, and to the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Demmidi eti Saa7oola qooriyaa muucidosonanne a ola miishshaa qaari ekkidosona. Yaatidi bantta eeqatu keettaaninne bantta asaa giddon xoonuwaa awaajjana mala, Pilisxxeema biittau ubbau asaa kiitaa yeddidosona.

English Sentences: And they put his armour in the house of their gods, and fastened his head in the temple of Dagon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Saa7oola ola miishshaa bantta xoossatu keettatuppe issuwan wottidosona; a guuggiyaakka bantta xoossaa Daagoona Eeqa Keettan kaqqidosona.

English Sentences: And when all Jabeshgilead heard all that the Philistines had done to Saul,
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeema asati Saa7oola oottidobaa ubbaa Gala7aaden de7iya Yaabeesha katamaa asati siyido wode,

English Sentences: They arose, all the valiant men, and took away the body of Saul, and the bodies of his sons, and brought them to Jabesh, and buried their bones under the oak in Jabesh, and fasted seven days.
Wolaitta Sentences: eta mino asati ubbai biidi, Saa7oola ahaanne a naatu ahaa ekkidi, Yaabeesha katamaa ehiidosona. Ehiidi Yaabeeshan de7iya wolaa garssan eta meqettaa moogidosona; yaatidi laappun gallassaa xoomidosona.

English Sentences: So Saul died for his transgression which he committed against the LORD, even against the word of the LORD, which he kept not, and also for asking counsel of one that had a familiar spirit, to enquire of it;
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli GODAASSI ammanettibeenna gishshau haiqqiis. GODAA qaalaa i naagibeenna; GODAARA zorettiyoogaa aggidi, moitilliyaa xeesiya asaara zorettiis.

English Sentences: And enquired not of the LORD: therefore he slew him, and turned the kingdom unto David the son of Jesse.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAI a woridi, a kawotettaa Isseya na7aa Daawitayyo aattidi immiis.

English Sentences: Then all Israel gathered themselves to David unto Hebron, saying, Behold, we are thy bone and thy flesh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Israa7eela asai ubbai issippe Kebroonan de7iya Daawitakko shiiqidi, "Nuuni ne suuttanne ne asho.

English Sentences: And moreover in time past, even when Saul was king, thou wast he that leddest out and broughtest in Israel: and the LORD thy God said unto thee, Thou shalt feed my people Israel, and thou shalt be ruler over my people Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kase Saa7ooli kawo gididi de7iyo wodekka, Israa7eela asaa olau kaalettidai nena. GODAI ne Xoossai nena, Ta asaa Israa7eela neeni heemmana; eta bollikka neeni kawotana yaagiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Therefore came all the elders of Israel to the king to Hebron; and David made a covenant with them in Hebron before the LORD; and they anointed David king over Israel, according to the word of the LORD by Samuel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Israa7eela cimati ubbai Kawuwaa Daawitakko Kebroona katamaa yiidosona; i etaara Kebroonan GODAA sinttan maachchaa maacettiis. GODAI Sameela baggaara haasayido qaalaadan, Daawiti Israa7eela bolli kawotanaadan eti a tiyidosona.

English Sentences: And David and all Israel went to Jerusalem, which is Jebus; where the Jebusites were, the inhabitants of the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawitinne Israa7eela asai ubbai Yerusalaame katamaa biidosona. He wode Yaabuusa asati he sohuwan de7iyo gishshau, he katamai Yaabuusa geetettees.

English Sentences: And the inhabitants of Jebus said to David, Thou shalt not come hither. Nevertheless David took the castle of Zion, which is the city of David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaabuusa asati Daawita, "Neeni ha katamaa gelanau mulekka danddayakka" yaagidosona. Gidikkonne, Daawiti Xiyoonen de7iya eta qatuwaa oiqqiis; oiqqin Xiyoonee Daawita Katamaa geetettiis.

English Sentences: And David said, Whosoever smiteth the Jebusites first shall be chief and captain. So Joab the son of Zeruiah went first up, and was chief.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ba olanchchata, "Yaabuusa asata kaseti oliya ooninne ola gadaawa gidana" yaagiis. Yaagin Xaruuyi na7ai Yoo7aabi kaseti biidi oliis; yaatidi gadaawa gidiis.

English Sentences: And David dwelt in the castle; therefore they called it the city of David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti he qatuwan de7iis; hegaa gishshau, he katamai Daawita Katamaa geetettiis.

English Sentences: And he built the city round about, even from Millo round about: and Joab repaired the rest of the city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Miilloppe doommidi, he katamaa zaarettidi keexxiis; attida katamaa qassi Yoo7aabi zaarettidi keexxiis.

English Sentences: So David waxed greater and greater: for the LORD of hosts was with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI aara de7iyo gishshau, Daawiti minni minnidi biis.

English Sentences: These also are the chief of the mighty men whom David had, who strengthened themselves with him in his kingdom, and with all Israel, to make him king, according to the word of the LORD concerning Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawita asati minoti hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidosona. GODAI Israa7eelabaa haasayidoogaadan, Daawiti kawotana mala, ha asati Israa7eela asaara gididi, keehippe maaddidosona. Qassi a kawotettaakka minttidosona.

English Sentences: And this is the number of the mighty men whom David had; Jashobeam, an Hachmonite, the chief of the captains: he lifted up his spear against three hundred slain by him at one time.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawita asati minoti hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Etappe heezzati keehippe erettidaageeta. Heezzatuppe koiroi Hakimoonappe yiida Yaashobi7aama; Yaashobi7aami issitoo olan heezzu xeetu asaa ba tooran woriis.

English Sentences: And after him was Eleazar the son of Dodo, the Ahohite, who was one of the three mighties.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzu mino asatu giddon a kaallidi de7iyaagee Ahoohiyaa Doodo na7aa El77aazara.

English Sentences: He was with David at Pasdammim, and there the Philistines were gathered together to battle, where was a parcel of ground full of barley; and the people fled from before the Philistines.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeema asati olettanau Pasddaamima giyoosaa shiiqido wode, El77aazari Daawitaara issippe de7ees. Israa7eela olanchchati Pilisxxeema asatu sinttaappe baqatiyo wode, El77aazari banggaa shooqan de7ees.

English Sentences: And they set themselves in the midst of that parcel, and delivered it, and slew the Philistines; and the LORD saved them by a great deliverance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inne a asati shooqaa giddon eqqidi, Pilisxxeema asataara olettidosona. Olettin GODAI gita xoonuwaa immidi, eta ashshiis.

English Sentences: Now three of the thirty captains went down to the rock to David, into the cave of Adullam; and the host of the Philistines encamped in the valley of Rephaim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeema olanchchati Rafaima Wombban dunkkaanido wode, hasttamu halaqatuppe heezzati Daawiti de7iyo Adulaama gonggoluwan de7iya zaallaakko yiidosona.

English Sentences: And David was then in the hold, and the Philistines' garrison was then at Bethlehem.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Daawiti qatuwaa giddon de7ees; Pilisxxeema olanchchatu citai Beetaliheemen de7ees.

English Sentences: And David longed, and said, Oh that one would give me drink of the water of the well of Bethlehem, that is at the gate!
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti haattaa uyanau amottidi, "Beetaliheeme katamaa penggiyaa lanqqen de7iya pultto haattaappe tana ooni ushshanddeeshsha!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the three brake through the host of the Philistines, and drew water out of the well of Bethlehem, that was by the gate, and took it, and brought it to David: but David would not drink of it, but poured it out to the LORD,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin heezzu mino asati Pilisxxeema asati dunkkaanidosaa kantti biidi, Beetaliheeme katamaa penggen de7iya pulttuwaappe haattaa duuqqidi, Daawitayyo ehiidosona. SHin Daawiti uyennan ixxiis; ixxidi i he haattaa GODAA sinttan tigiis.

English Sentences: And said, My God forbid it me, that I should do this thing: shall I drink the blood of these men that have put their lives in jeopardy? for with the jeopardy of their lives they brought it. Therefore he would not drink it. These things did these three mightiest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tigidi, "Hagaa uyanaagee taappe haakko! Bantta shemppuwaa olidi biida ha asatu suuttaa taani uyoo? Aissi giikko, eti bantta shemppuwaa aatti immidi, haattaa ehiidosona" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau, Daawiti he haattaa uyibeenna. He heezzu mino asati hegaa oottidosona.

English Sentences: And Abishai the brother of Joab, he was chief of the three: for lifting up his spear against three hundred, he slew them, and had a name among the three.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aaba ishai Abishaayi hasttamatuyyo halaqa. I ba tooran heezzu xeetu asata olidi woriis. Yaatidi ikka hara heezzatudan erettiis.

English Sentences: Of the three, he was more honourable than the two; for he was their captain: howbeit he attained not to the first three.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hasttamatuppe aadhdhi bonchchettida asa; i etau halaqa gidiis. SHin i he heezzatu qoodan de7enna.

English Sentences: Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, the son of a valiant man of Kabzeel, who had done many acts; he slew two lionlike men of Moab: also he went down and slew a lion in a pit in a snowy day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qabxxi7eelappe yiida Yoodaahe na7ai Banaayi mino asa; mino oosota oottiis. I naa77u erettida Moo7aaba biittaa asata woriis. Qassi shachchai darido issi gallassi ollaa giddo gelidi, gaammuwaa woriis.

English Sentences: And he slew an Egyptian, a man of great stature, five cubits high; and in the Egyptian's hand was a spear like a weaver's beam; and he went down to him with a staff, and plucked the spear out of the Egyptian's hand, and slew him with his own spear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Banaayi geesai ichchashu wara gakkiyo Gibxxe biittaa bitaniyaa adussaa woriis. Gibxxe bitaniyaa kushiyan shimainniyaa wonddarashiyaa keena toorai de7ees; shin Banaayi gatimaa oiqqidi, bitaniyaakko biis. Biidi he bitaniyaa kushiyaappe tooraa dafi ekkidi, a tooran a woriis.

English Sentences: These things did Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and had the name among the three mighties.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoodaahe na7ai Banaayi hageeta oottiis. A sunttaikka he heezzatuugaadan erettiis.

English Sentences: Behold, he was honourable among the thirty, but attained not to the first three: and David set him over his guard.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hasttamatu giddon daro bonchchettiis; shin i heezzatu qoodan de7enna. Daawiti a bana naagiya olanchchatussi halaqa kessiis.

English Sentences: Also the valiant men of the armies were, Asahel the brother of Joab, Elhanan the son of Dodo of Bethlehem,
Wolaitta Sentences: Mino asati Yoo7aaba ishaa Asaaheela, Beetaliheemeppe yiida Doodo na7aa Elihanaana,

English Sentences: Shammoth the Harorite, Helez the Pelonite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Haroodappe yiida SHammoota, Piloonappe yiida Heleexa,

English Sentences: Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite, Abiezer the Antothite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Taqo7appe yiida Iqqeesha na7aa Ira, Anatootappe yiida Abi7eezera,

English Sentences: Sibbecai the Hushathite, Ilai the Ahohite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Huushappe yiida Sibbakaaya, Ahoohiyaa Ilaaya,

English Sentences: Maharai the Netophathite, Heled the son of Baanah the Netophathite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Naxoofappe yiida Maahiraaya, Naxoofappe yiida Ba7aana na7aa Heleeda,

English Sentences: Ithai the son of Ribai of Gibeah, that pertained to the children of Benjamin, Benaiah the Pirathonite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaama biittan de7iya Gib77a katamaappe yiida Ribaaya na7aa Ittaaya, Pir77aatoonappe yiida Banaaya,

English Sentences: Hurai of the brooks of Gaash, Abiel the Arbathite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ga7aasha Zanggaaraa matappe yiida Huraaya, Aarabappe yiida Abii7eela,

English Sentences: Azmaveth the Baharumite, Eliahba the Shaalbonite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Baahiruumappe yiida Azimaaweeta, SHa7albboonappe yiida Eliyaahiba,

English Sentences: The sons of Hashem the Gizonite, Jonathan the son of Shage the Hararite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Giizoonappe yiida Hasheema, Haaraarappe yiida SHaage na7aa Yonaataana,

English Sentences: Ahiam the son of Sacar the Hararite, Eliphal the son of Ur,
Wolaitta Sentences: Haaraarappe yiida Sakaara na7aa Ahi7aama, Uura na7aa Elifaala,

English Sentences: Hepher the Mecherathite, Ahijah the Pelonite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Makeerappe yiida Hefeera, Piloonappe yiida Akiiya,

English Sentences: Hezro the Carmelite, Naarai the son of Ezbai,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qarmmeloosappe yiida Hexira, Ezbbaaya na7aa Naa7iraaya,

English Sentences: Joel the brother of Nathan, Mibhar the son of Haggeri,
Wolaitta Sentences: Naataana ishaa Yuu7eela, Haagira na7aa Mibihaara,

English Sentences: Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Berothite, the armourbearer of Joab the son of Zeruiah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Amoonappe yiida Xeleqa, Xaruuyi na7aa Yoo7aaba ola miishshaa tookkiya Ba7erootappe yiida Naahiraaya,

English Sentences: Ira the Ithrite, Gareb the Ithrite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yatira yara gidiya Ira, Yatira yara gidiya Gaareeba,

English Sentences: Uriah the Hittite, Zabad the son of Ahlai,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiitiyaa Ooriyoona, Ahilaaya na7aa Zabaadanne

English Sentences: Adina the son of Shiza the Reubenite, a captain of the Reubenites, and thirty with him,
Wolaitta Sentences: Roobeela zare gidiya SHiiza na7aa Adiina. I Roobeela zaretu halaqa; aara issippe hasttamu asati de7oosona.

English Sentences: Hanan the son of Maachah, and Joshaphat the Mithnite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hara mino asati qassi Maa7ika na7aa Hanaana, Mitaanappe yiida Yoshafaaxa,

English Sentences: Uzzia the Ashterathite, Shama and Jehiel the sons of Hothan the Aroerite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ashttaarappe yiida Ooziyaana, Aaro7erappe yiida Hotaama naata SHamaa7anne Yi7i7eela,

English Sentences: Jediael the son of Shimri, and Joha his brother, the Tizite,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiimira na7aa Yidi7eelanne a ishaa Tiixappe yiida Yooha,

English Sentences: Eliel the Mahavite, and Jeribai, and Joshaviah, the sons of Elnaam, and Ithmah the Moabite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Mahaawappe yiida Eli7eela, Elnna7aama naata Yiriibaayanne Yooshaawiyaa, Moo7aaba biittaappe yiida Yitima,

English Sentences: Eliel, and Obed, and Jasiel the Mesobaite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xooba katamaappe yiida Eli7eela, Yoobeedanne Ya7isi7eela.

English Sentences: Now these are they that came to David to Ziklag, while he yet kept himself close because of Saul the son of Kish: and they were among the mighty men, helpers of the war.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Qiisa na7aa Saa7oolappe baqati biidi, Xiqilaagan uttido wode, akko yiida asati hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Eti kase Daawita olan maaddida mino asatu giddon de7oosona.

English Sentences: They were armed with bows, and could use both the right hand and the left in hurling stones and shooting arrows out of a bow, even of Saul's brethren of Benjamin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti wonddafiyaasata; qassi bantta ushachcha kushiyaaninne haddirssa kushiyan shuchchaa yambbarshshan olanau danddayoosona. Eti Biniyaama zare gidiya Saa7oola dabbota.

English Sentences: The chief was Ahiezer, then Joash, the sons of Shemaah the Gibeathite; and Jeziel, and Pelet, the sons of Azmaveth; and Berachah, and Jehu the Antothite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta halaqai Ahi7eezera; Ahi7eezerappe simmin Yo7aasha; eti Gib77appe yiida SHamaa7a naata. Harati qassi Azimaaweeta naata gidiya Yizi7eelanne Peleexa, Baraaka, Anatootappe yiida Yeeha,

English Sentences: And Ismaiah the Gibeonite, a mighty man among the thirty, and over the thirty; and Jeremiah, and Jahaziel, and Johanan, and Josabad the Gederathite,
Wolaitta Sentences: hasttamatu giddon wolqqaama gididi, eta kaalettiya Gabaa7oonappe yiida Yishimaa7iyaa, Ermmaasa, Yahaazi7eela, Yohanaana, Gedeerappe yiida Yozabaada,

English Sentences: Eluzai, and Jerimoth, and Bealiah, and Shemariah, and Shephatiah the Haruphite,
Wolaitta Sentences: El77uzaaya, Yaarimoota, Ba7aaliyaa, SHamaariyaa, Hariifappe yiida SHafaaxiyaa,

English Sentences: Elkanah, and Jesiah, and Azareel, and Joezer, and Jashobeam, the Korhites,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qoraaha yarata gidiya Elqqaana, Yishiyaa, Azaari7eela, Yo7eezeranne Yaashobi7aama,

English Sentences: And Joelah, and Zebadiah, the sons of Jeroham of Gedor.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gadoorappe yiida Yirohaama naata Yo7eelanne Zabaadiyaa.

English Sentences: And of the Gadites there separated themselves unto David into the hold to the wilderness men of might, and men of war fit for the battle, that could handle shield and buckler, whose faces were like the faces of lions, and were as swift as the roes upon the mountains;
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti bazzuwan de7iya baqati attiyo sohuwan uttidaashin, Gaada zariyaappe asati akko yiidosona. Eti mino asatanne olau giigidaageeta; qassi gonddalliyaanne tooraa oiqqanau danddayiyaageeta. Eta som77oi gaammuwaa som77uwaa milatees; eti deretu huuphiyan guppiya genessaadan eesotoosona.

English Sentences: Ezer the first, Obadiah the second, Eliab the third,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta halaqai Exeera; naa77anttoi Obaadiyaa; heezzanttoi Eli7aaba;

English Sentences: Mishmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth,
Wolaitta Sentences: oiddanttoi Mishimaanna; ichchashanttoi Ermmaasa;

English Sentences: Attai the sixth, Eliel the seventh,
Wolaitta Sentences: usuppunttoi Attaaya; laappunttoi Eli7eela;

English Sentences: Johanan the eighth, Elzabad the ninth,
Wolaitta Sentences: hosppunttoi Yohanaana; uddufunttoi Elzzabaada;

English Sentences: Jeremiah the tenth, Machbanai the eleventh.
Wolaitta Sentences: tammanttoi Ermmaasa; tammanne isiininttoi Maakibanaaya.

English Sentences: These were of the sons of Gad, captains of the host: one of the least was over an hundred, and the greatest over a thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti Gaada zare olanchchatuyyo halaqata. Etappe laafiyaageeti mato halaqata; minniyaageeti shaalaqata.

English Sentences: These are they that went over Jordan in the first month, when it had overflown all his banks; and they put to flight all them of the valleys, both toward the east, and toward the west.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yorddaanoosa SHaafai, gaxaappe gaxaa gakkanaashin kumi kixxido koiro aginan pinnidaageeti hageeta. Eti wombban arshshooranne arggoora uttida asaa ubbaa yedettidosona.

English Sentences: And there came of the children of Benjamin and Judah to the hold unto David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaama zaretuppenne Yihudaa zaretuppe amarida asati Daawitakko qatuwaa yiidosona.

English Sentences: And David went out to meet them, and answered and said unto them, If ye be come peaceably unto me to help me, mine heart shall be knit unto you: but if ye be come to betray me to mine enemies, seeing there is no wrong in mine hands, the God of our fathers look thereon, and rebuke it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yin Daawiti etaara gaittanau kiyidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Intte tana maaddanau saruwan taakko yiidabaa gidikko, ta wozanai inttenaara issippe gidana. SHin intte tana ta morkketuyyo aatti immanau yiidabaa gidikko, inttena erite! Taani oottido iitabi bainna gishshau, nu aawatu Xoossai hegaa be7o; i inttena pirddo!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then the spirit came upon Amasai, who was chief of the captains, and he said, Thine are we, David, and on thy side, thou son of Jesse: peace, peace be unto thee, and peace be to thine helpers; for thy God helpeth thee. Then David received them, and made them captains of the band.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, hasttamatu halaqaa Amaasaaya bolli Xoossaa Ayyaanai wodhdhin, "Daawitaa, nuuni neegeeta! Isseya na7au, nuuni nenaara issippe de7eettees! Saroi neessi gido! Nena maaddiyaageetussikka saroi gido! Ne Xoossai nena maaddees" yaagiis. Yaagin Daawiti eta ekkidi, ba olanchchatuyyo halaqata oottiis.

English Sentences: And there fell some of Manasseh to David, when he came with the Philistines against Saul to battle: but they helped them not: for the lords of the Philistines upon advisement sent him away, saying, He will fall to his master Saul to the jeopardy of our heads.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Pilisxxeematuura issippe gididi, Saa7oola olanau biido wode, Minaase zariyaappe amarida asati Daawitan gaittidosona. SHin Pilisxxeema asatu halaqati Daawitinne Daawita asai banttanaara beennaadan diggidosona. Pilisxxeema asati keehippe zorettidoogaappe guyyiyan, eta guyye yeddidosona; aissi giikko, Daawitinne Daawita asai eta Kawuwaa Saa7oolayyo aatti immanaakkonne giidi yayyidosona.

English Sentences: As he went to Ziklag, there fell to him of Manasseh, Adnah, and Jozabad, and Jediael, and Michael, and Jozabad, and Elihu, and Zilthai, captains of the thousands that were of Manasseh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Xiqilaaga katamaa simmishin, Minaase zariyaappe Daawita maaddanau kiyida shaalaqati Adinaaha, Yozabaada, Yidi7eela, Mikaa7eela, Yozabaada, Eelihanne Xilttaaya.

English Sentences: And they helped David against the band of the rovers: for they were all mighty men of valour, and were captains in the host.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubbaikka xalanne wolqqaama asa gidiyo gishshau, Daawiti ambbaanota paanaa kaalliyo wode, eti a maaddidosona.

English Sentences: For at that time day by day there came to David to help him, until it was a great host, like the host of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawita olanchchati Xoossaa olanchchatudan corattana gakkanaashin, a maaddiya asai gallassi gallassi gujettees.

English Sentences: And these are the numbers of the bands that were ready armed to the war, and came to David to Hebron, to turn the kingdom of Saul to him, according to the word of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI haasayidoogaadan Saa7oola kawotettaa Daawitayyo zaaranau olau gixxi giigidi, Kebroonan de7iya Daawitakko yiida olanchchatu qoodai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaagaa.

English Sentences: The children of Judah that bare shield and spear were six thousand and eight hundred, ready armed to the war.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gonddalliyaanne tooraa oiqqidi, olau gixxi giigida Yihudaa zareti usuppun sha7anne hosppun xeeta.

English Sentences: Of the children of Simeon, mighty men of valour for the war, seven thousand and one hundred.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoona zariyaappe olau giigida xalanne wolqqaama olanchchati laappun sha7anne issi xeeta.

English Sentences: Of the children of Levi four thousand and six hundred.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewa zariyaappe oiddu sha7anne usuppun xeeta.

English Sentences: And Jehoiada was the leader of the Aaronites, and with him were three thousand and seven hundred;
Wolaitta Sentences: Aaroona zaretu halaqai Yoodaaha; Yoodaaheera issippe heezzu sha7anne laappun xeetu asati de7oosona.

English Sentences: And Zadok, a young man mighty of valour, and of his father's house twenty and two captains.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Xaadooqi yelaga xalanne wolqqaama asa; Xaadooqa aawaa keettaa asaappe laatamanne naa77u halaqati aara issippe de7oosona.

English Sentences: And of the children of Benjamin, the kindred of Saul, three thousand: for hitherto the greatest part of them had kept the ward of the house of Saul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaama zare gidiya Saa7oola dabboti heezzu sha7u asa. SHin Biniyaama zariyaappe dariya bagga asai Saa7oola keettaa asau he wodee gakkanaashin ammanettiyaageeta.

English Sentences: And of the children of Ephraim twenty thousand and eight hundred, mighty men of valour, famous throughout the house of their fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema zariyaappe bantta aawatu keettaa asan erettida xalanne wolqqaama asati laatamu sha7anne hosppun xeeta.

English Sentences: And of the half tribe of Manasseh eighteen thousand, which were expressed by name, to come and make David king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawita kawoyanau baanau doorettida Minaase zariyaappe baggati tammanne hosppun sha7a.

English Sentences: And of the children of Issachar, which were men that had understanding of the times, to know what Israel ought to do; the heads of them were two hundred; and all their brethren were at their commandment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Israa7eela asai ai oottanau bessiyaakko, wodiyaabaa shaakki eriya akeekanchcha asati, Yisaakoora zariyaayyo halaqati naa77u xeeta; eta dabboti ubbai etayyo azazettoosona.

English Sentences: Of Zebulun, such as went forth to battle, expert in war, with all instruments of war, fifty thousand, which could keep rank: they were not of double heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ola miishshaa ubbaa oiqqidi, bantta kumetta wozanan Daawita maaddanau giigida olanchchatun Zaabiloona zare asati ishatamu sha7a.

English Sentences: And of Naphtali a thousand captains, and with them with shield and spear thirty and seven thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nifttaaleema zariyaappe issi sha7u halaqati de7oosona; gonddalliyaanne tooraa oiqqiya hasttamanne laappun sha7u asati etaara issippe de7oosona.

English Sentences: And of the Danites expert in war twenty and eight thousand and six hundred.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daana zariyaappe olau giigida asati laatamanne hosppun sha7anne uddufun xeeta.

English Sentences: And of Asher, such as went forth to battle, expert in war, forty thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Olau kiyanau Aseera zariyaappe giigidaageeti oitamu sha7a.

English Sentences: And on the other side of Jordan, of the Reubenites, and the Gadites, and of the half tribe of Manasseh, with all manner of instruments of war for the battle, an hundred and twenty thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefintta arshsho baggan de7iya Roobeela zariyaappe, Gaada zariyaappenne Minaase zariyaa baggaappe ola miishshaa ubbaa oiqqidi yiida asati issi xeetanne laatamu sha7a.

English Sentences: All these men of war, that could keep rank, came with a perfect heart to Hebron, to make David king over all Israel: and all the rest also of Israel were of one heart to make David king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha olau giigida olanchchati ubbai Daawita Israa7eela bolli kawoyanau bantta qofaa qachchidi, Kebroona katamaa yiidosona. Qassi Israa7eelappe attidaageetikka Daawita kawoyanau issi wozana gididosona.

English Sentences: And there they were with David three days, eating and drinking: for their brethren had prepared for them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta dabboti etayyo koshshiyaabaa giigissi wottido gishshau, miiddinne uyiiddi Daawitaara heezzu gallassaa uttidosona.

English Sentences: Moreover they that were nigh them, even unto Issachar and Zebulun and Naphtali, brought bread on asses, and on camels, and on mules, and on oxen, and meat, meal, cakes of figs, and bunches of raisins, and wine, and oil, and oxen, and sheep abundantly: for there was joy in Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asaayyo ufaissa gidiyo gishshau, huuphessa baggaara de7iya Yisaakoorappe, Zaabiloonappenne Nifttaaleemappe asati daro qumaa ehiidosona. Xiilliyaa, balasiyaa lichchakkuwaa, woiniyaa teeraa, woine eessaanne zaitiyaa hariyan, baquluwan, gaameelaaninne booran caanidi ehiidosona; qassikka eti miizzaanne dorssaa shukkidi maanau ekkidi yiidosona.

English Sentences: And David consulted with the captains of thousands and hundreds, and with every leader.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawiti shaalaqatuuranne mato halaqatuura zorettiis.

English Sentences: And David said unto all the congregation of Israel, If it seem good unto you, and that it be of the LORD our God, let us send abroad unto our brethren every where, that are left in all the land of Israel, and with them also to the priests and Levites which are in their cities and suburbs, that they may gather themselves unto us:
Wolaitta Sentences: Zorettidi Israa7eela asaa ubbaa, "Intteyyo lo77o milatiyaabaa gidikkonne, GODAA nu Xoossaa shene gidikko, Israa7eela biittaa gaxan de7iya nu dabboti, qeesetinne bantta kataman de7iya Leewati nunaara issippe shiiqanaadan asa kiittoos.

English Sentences: And let us bring again the ark of our God to us: for we enquired not at it in the days of Saul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli kawotido wode shenehoo gin, dogettidi attida nu Xoossaa Taabootaa ane zaaridi ehoos" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And all the congregation said that they would do so: for the thing was right in the eyes of all the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti odido yohoi suure gidido gishshau, asai ubbai maayiis.

English Sentences: So David gathered all Israel together, from Shihor of Egypt even unto the entering of Hemath, to bring the ark of God from Kirjathjearim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Daawiti Xoossaa Taabootaa Qiriyaati-Yi7aariimappe ehaana mala, Gibxxe zawaappe doommidi, Hamaata Pinuwaa gakkanaashin de7iya Israa7eela asaa ubbaa shiishshiis.

English Sentences: And David went up, and all Israel, to Baalah, that is, to Kirjathjearim, which belonged to Judah, to bring up thence the ark of God the LORD, that dwelleth between the cherubims, whose name is called on it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawitinne Israa7eela asai ubbai kiruubetuppe gidduwan ba kawotaa araataa bolli uttida GODAA sunttan xeesettida Xoossaa Taabootaa ehaanau Yihudaa biittan de7iya Ba7aala giyo Qiriyaati-Yi7aariima katamaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And they carried the ark of God in a new cart out of the house of Abinadab: and Uzza and Ahio drave the cart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa Taabootaa parai goochchiyo ooratta gaariyan wottidi, Abinadaaba sooppe ehiidosona; Uzzinne Ahiyyoi gaariyaa laaggoosona.

English Sentences: And David and all Israel played before God with all their might, and with singing, and with harps, and with psalteries, and with timbrels, and with cymbals, and with trumpets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawitinne Israa7eela asai ubbai diittaanne maazinqqiyaa diixxiiddi, karaabiyaa baqqiiddi, daalaa qaattiiddinne xurumbbaa punniiddi, bantta kumetta wolqqan Xoossaa sinttan ufaittidi bonchchidosona.

English Sentences: And when they came unto the threshingfloor of Chidon, Uzza put forth his hand to hold the ark; for the oxen stumbled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Kiidoona giyosan de7iya kattaa qoxxiyo audiyaa gakkiyo wode, boorati xubettin, Uzzi Taabootaa oiqqanau ba kushiyaa yeddiis.

English Sentences: And the anger of the LORD was kindled against Uzza, and he smote him, because he put his hand to the ark: and there he died before God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yeddin a kushee Taabootaa bochchido gishshau, GODAA hanqqoi Uzza bolli eexxi kiyiis. Hegaa gishshau, GODAI a shocin, i he sohuwan Xoossaa sinttan haiqqi aggiis.

English Sentences: And David was displeased, because the LORD had made a breach upon Uzza: wherefore that place is called Perezuzza to this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hanqqettidi Uzza worido gishshau, Daawiti yiillotiis. Hachchi gakkanaashin, he sohoi Uzzi SHocettosaa geetettees.

English Sentences: And David was afraid of God that day, saying, How shall I bring the ark of God home to me?
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi Daawiti Xoossaayyo yayyido gishshau, "Xoossaa Taabootaa taakko waata ehaanau danddayiyaanaa?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So David brought not the ark home to himself to the city of David, but carried it aside into the house of Obededom the Gittite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Taabootaa banaara Daawita Katamaa efibeenna. SHin Gaatiyaa Obeedi-Eedooma giyo bitaniyaa soo efiis.

English Sentences: And the ark of God remained with the family of Obededom in his house three months. And the LORD blessed the house of Obededom, and all that he had.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa Taabootai Obeedi-Eedooma keettan a keettaa asaara heezzu aginaa gam77iis. GODAI a keettaa asaanne ayyo de7iya ubbabaa anjjiis.

English Sentences: Now Hiram king of Tyre sent messengers to David, and timber of cedars, with masons and carpenters, to build him an house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xiiroosa Kawoi Kiiraami Daawitayyo asata kiittiis. Kiitettida asatuura keettaa keexxanaadan zigaa mudettaanne qassi shuchchaa massiyaageetanne anaaxeta ayyo yeddiis.

English Sentences: And David perceived that the LORD had confirmed him king over Israel, for his kingdom was lifted up on high, because of his people Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela bolli a kawo oottidi essidoogaanne ba asaa Israa7eela gishshau, a kawotettaa xoqqu oottidi bonchchidoogaa Daawiti eriis.

English Sentences: And David took more wives at Jerusalem: and David begat more sons and daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawiti Yerusalaamen hara maccaasaa gujji ekkidi, attuma naatanne macca naata yeliis.

English Sentences: Now these are the names of his children which he had in Jerusalem; Shammua, and Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon,
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Yerusalaamen yelido attuma naati SHaamu7a, SHobaaba, Naataana, Solomona,

English Sentences: And Ibhar, and Elishua, and Elpalet,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yibihaara, Elishuu7a, Elppaaleexa,

English Sentences: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
Wolaitta Sentences: Nogaaha, Nefega, Yaafi7a,

English Sentences: And Elishama, and Beeliada, and Eliphalet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Elishamaa7a, Be7eliyaadanne Elifeleexa.

English Sentences: And when the Philistines heard that David was anointed king over all Israel, all the Philistines went up to seek David. And David heard of it, and went out against them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Israa7eela ubbaa bolli kawo gididi tiyettidoogaa Pilisxxeema asai siyido wode, eti ubbai Daawita koyanau kiyidosona. Daawiti eti kiyidoogaa siyidi, etaara olettanau kiyiis.

English Sentences: And the Philistines came and spread themselves in the valley of Rephaim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeema asai Rafaima Wombbaa yiidi bonqqidosona.

English Sentences: And David enquired of God, saying, Shall I go up against the Philistines? And wilt thou deliver them into mine hand? And the LORD said unto him, Go up; for I will deliver them into thine hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Xoossaa, "Taani baada Pilisxxeemata oloo? Neeni eta taayyo aatta immuutee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin GODAI a, "Baada ola. Taani eta neeyyo aatta immana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So they came up to Baalperazim; and David smote them there. Then David said, God hath broken in upon mine enemies by mine hand like the breaking forth of waters: therefore they called the name of that place Baalperazim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Daawitinne a asai Ba7aali-Paraaxiima giyoosaa biidi, yan eta xoonidosona. Xoonin Daawiti, "Haattaa di7oi xuussi kanttiyoogaadan Xoossai ta morkketu giddoora tana kanttissiis" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau, he sohuwaa sunttai Ba7aali-Paraaxiima geetettiis.

English Sentences: And when they had left their gods there, David gave a commandment, and they were burned with fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeemati bantta eeqata he sohuwan yeggidi biidosona. Yaatin Daawiti azazidi, eta eeqata taman xuugissiis.

English Sentences: And the Philistines yet again spread themselves abroad in the valley.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeema asati naa77anttuwaakka ha wombbaa simmi yiidi bonqqidosona.

English Sentences: Therefore David enquired again of God; and God said unto him, Go not up after them; turn away from them, and come upon them over against the mulberry trees.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bonqqin Daawiti Xoossaa naa77anttuwaakka oichchiis. Oichchin Xoossai a, "Neeni eta geeduwaa booppa. Eta guyyeera yuuya aadhdhada ettaappe sintta baggaara olanau giiga.

English Sentences: And it shall be, when thou shalt hear a sound of going in the tops of the mulberry trees, that then thou shalt go out to battle: for God is gone forth before thee to smite the host of the Philistines.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ettaa huuphiyan salppiyaa cenggurssaa neeni siyiyo wode, olanau kiya. Aissi giikko, hegee Pilisxxeema olanchchata shocanau Xoossai neeppe sinttau aadhdhiis giyoogaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: David therefore did as God commanded him: and they smote the host of the Philistines from Gibeon even to Gazer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai azazidoogaadan Daawiti oottiis. Gabaa7oonappe biidi Gezeera gakkanaashin, Israa7eela asai Pilisxxeema olanchchata woriis.

English Sentences: And the fame of David went out into all lands; and the LORD brought the fear of him upon all nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawita woree biittaa ubbaa gakkiis. Kawotettati ubbai Daawitayyo yayyanaadan GODAI oottiis.

English Sentences: And David made him houses in the city of David, and prepared a place for the ark of God, and pitched for it a tent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ba kataman baayyo keettaa keexxiis; Xoossaa Taabootaukka sohuwaa giigissidi, dunkkaaniyaa essiis.

English Sentences: Then David said, None ought to carry the ark of God but the Levites: for them hath the LORD chosen to carry the ark of God, and to minister unto him for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Daawiti, "Xoossaa Taabootaa tokkanaadaaninne meri merinau Xoossau oottanau GODAI doorido Leewatuppe attin, ooninne Xoossaa Taabootaa tookkanau bessenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David gathered all Israel together to Jerusalem, to bring up the ark of the LORD unto his place, which he had prepared for it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti GODAA Taabootaayyo giigissido sohuwaa Taabootaa ehaanaadan, Israa7eela asaa ubbaa Yerusalaamen shiishshiis.

English Sentences: And David assembled the children of Aaron, and the Levites:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Daawiti Aaroona zaretanne Leewata xeesidi shiishshiis.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Kohath; Uriel the chief, and his brethren an hundred and twenty:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qahaata yaratuppe halaqai Uri7eelinne issi xeetanne laatamu a dabboti yiidosona.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Merari; Asaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred and twenty:
Wolaitta Sentences: Maraara yaratuppe halaqai Asaayinne naa77u xeetanne laatamu a dabboti yiidosona.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Gershom; Joel the chief, and his brethren an hundred and thirty:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gershshoona yaratuppe halaqai Yuu7eelinne xeetanne hasttamu a dabboti yiidosona.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Elizaphan; Shemaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred:
Wolaitta Sentences: Elxxaafaana yaratuppe halaqai SHamaa7eenne naa77u xeetu a dabboti yiidosona.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Hebron; Eliel the chief, and his brethren fourscore:
Wolaitta Sentences: Kebroona yaratuppe halaqai Eli7eelinne hosppun tammu a dabboti yiidosona.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Uzziel; Amminadab the chief, and his brethren an hundred and twelve.
Wolaitta Sentences: Uzzi7eela yaratuppe halaqai Aminadaabinne xeetanne tammanne naa77u a dabboti yiidosona.

English Sentences: And David called for Zadok and Abiathar the priests, and for the Levites, for Uriel, Asaiah, and Joel, Shemaiah, and Eliel, and Amminadab,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawiti qeeseta Xaadooqanne Abiyaataara, qassi Leewata Uri7eela, Asaaya, Yuu7eela, SHamaa7iyaa, Eli7eelanne Aminadaaba xeesissiis.

English Sentences: And said unto them, Ye are the chief of the fathers of the Levites: sanctify yourselves, both ye and your brethren, that ye may bring up the ark of the LORD God of Israel unto the place that I have prepared for it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xeesissidi eta, "Intte Leewatu zaretuyyo halaqata. GODAA Israa7eela Xoossaa Taabootaa taani giigissa wottido sohuwaa ehaanau inttenne intte dabboti geeyite.

English Sentences: For because ye did it not at the first, the LORD our God made a breach upon us, for that we sought him not after the due order.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte Leewati koiro Xoossaa Taabootaa tookkibeenna gishshaunne nuuni a wogaadan waati efaanaakko Xoossaa oichchibeenna gishshau, GODAI nu Xoossai nuna qaxxayiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So the priests and the Levites sanctified themselves to bring up the ark of the LORD God of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, GODAA Israa7eela Xoossaa Taabootaa ehaanau qeesetinne Leewati banttana geeshshidosona.

English Sentences: And the children of the Levites bare the ark of God upon their shoulders with the staves thereon, as Moses commanded according to the word of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muuse baggaara kase azazidoogaadan, Leewati Xoossaa Taabootaa kasuwaara bantta hashiyan tookkidosona.

English Sentences: And David spake to the chief of the Levites to appoint their brethren to be the singers with instruments of musick, psalteries and harps and cymbals, sounding, by lifting up the voice with joy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, diittaanne maazinqqiyaa diixxiiddi, daalaa qaattiiddi, ufaissiya yettaa yexxana mala, Leewata kaalettiyaageeti bantta dabbota sunttanaadan Daawiti azaziis.

English Sentences: So the Levites appointed Heman the son of Joel; and of his brethren, Asaph the son of Berechiah; and of the sons of Merari their brethren, Ethan the son of Kushaiah;
Wolaitta Sentences: Azazin Leewati Yuu7eela na7aa Hemaana, a dabbotuppe Berekiyaa na7aa Asaafanne eta dabbotuppe Maraara yaraa Qusaaya na7aa Etaana sunttidosona.

English Sentences: And with them their brethren of the second degree, Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obededom, and Jeiel, the porters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi naa77antto kayan Zakkaariyaasa, Yaa7izi7eela, SHamiraamoota, Yihi7eela, Uunna, Eli7aaba, Banaaya, Ma7iseeya, Matiitiyaa, Elifaala, Miiqineeyanne penggiyaa naagiyaageeta Obeedi-Eedoomanne Yi7i7eela sunttidosona.

English Sentences: So the singers, Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, were appointed to sound with cymbals of brass;
Wolaitta Sentences: Nahaasiyaa daalaa xoqqu oottidi qaattanaadan Hemaani, Asaafinne Etaani sunttettidosona.

English Sentences: And Zechariah, and Aziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, and Eliab, and Maaseiah, and Benaiah, with psalteries on Alamoth;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Zakkaariyaasi, Yaa7izi7eeli, SHamiraamooti, Yihi7eeli, Uunni, Eli7aabi, Ma7iseeyinne Banaayi diittaa lee7iyan diixxoosona.

English Sentences: And Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obededom, and Jeiel, and Azaziah, with harps on the Sheminith to excel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Matiitee, Elifaali, Miiqineeyi, Obeedi-Eedoomi, Yi7i7eelinne Azaazee diittaa orddiyan diixxoosona.

English Sentences: And Chenaniah, chief of the Levites, was for song: he instructed about the song, because he was skilful.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewatu halaqai Kanaanee mazamuriyaa kaalettanau sunttettiis; i eranchcha gidiyo gishshau, eta tamaarissees.

English Sentences: And Berechiah and Elkanah were doorkeepers for the ark.
Wolaitta Sentences: Berekeenne Elqqaani Taabootaa dunkkaaniyaa penggiyaa naaganau doorettidosona.

English Sentences: And Shebaniah, and Jehoshaphat, and Nethaneel, and Amasai, and Zechariah, and Benaiah, and Eliezer, the priests, did blow with the trumpets before the ark of God: and Obededom and Jehiah were doorkeepers for the ark.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi qeeseti SHabaanee, Yoshafaaxi, Nataani7eeli, Amaasaayi, Zakkaariyaasi, Banaayinne El77eezari Xoossaa Taabootaa sinttan xurumbbaa punnanau doorettidosona. Obeedi-Eedoominne Yuuhee Taabootaa naaganau doorettidosona.

English Sentences: So David, and the elders of Israel, and the captains over thousands, went to bring up the ark of the covenant of the LORD out of the house of Obededom with joy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Daawiti, Israa7eela cimatinne shaalaqati GODAA Maachchaa Taabootaa Obeedi-Eedooma sooppe ehaanau ufaittidi biidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when God helped the Levites that bare the ark of the covenant of the LORD, that they offered seven bullocks and seven rams.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA Maachchaa Taabootaa tookkida Leewata Xoossai maaddido gishshau, eti laappun korimatanne laappun dorssa orggeta yarshshidosona.

English Sentences: And David was clothed with a robe of fine linen, and all the Levites that bare the ark, and the singers, and Chenaniah the master of the song with the singers: David also had upon him an ephod of linen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti, Taabootaa tookkida Leewati ubbai, mazamuriyaa yexxiyaageetinne mazamuriyaa yexxiyaageetu halaqai Kanaanee liinuwaa giyo qacinaappe dadettida maayuwaa maayidosona. Daawitikka qassi liinuwaappe dadettida eefuudiyaa giyo maayuwaa maayiis.

English Sentences: Thus all Israel brought up the ark of the covenant of the LORD with shouting, and with sound of the cornet, and with trumpets, and with cymbals, making a noise with psalteries and harps.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaadan oottidi, Israa7eela ubbai hombbociiddi, xurumbbaanne malkkataa punniiddi, daalaa qaattiiddinne, diittaanne maazinqqiyaa diixxiiddi, GODAA Maachchaa Taabootaa ehiidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as the ark of the covenant of the LORD came to the city of David, that Michal, the daughter of Saul looking out at a window saw king David dancing and playing: and she despised him in her heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA Maachchaa Taabootai Daawita Katamaa gelido wode, Saa7oola na7iyaa Miikaala maskkootiyaara xeellada, Kawoi Daawiti ufaittidi durishiininne kaa7ishin be7aasu; be7ada Daawita ba wozanan karaasu.

English Sentences: So they brought the ark of God, and set it in the midst of the tent that David had pitched for it: and they offered burnt sacrifices and peace offerings before God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Xoossaa Taabootaa ehiidi, Daawiti Taabootaa wottanau tolido dunkkaaniyaa giddon wottidosona. Wottidi xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne issippetettaa yarshshuwaa Xoossaayyo yarshshidosona.

English Sentences: And when David had made an end of offering the burnt offerings and the peace offerings, he blessed the people in the name of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne issippetettaa yarshshuwaa yarshshidi polidoogaappe guyyiyan, GODAA sunttan asaa anjjiis.

English Sentences: And he dealt to every one of Israel, both man and woman, to every one a loaf of bread, and a good piece of flesh, and a flagon of wine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asau ubbau, maccaunne attumau, huuphiyan huuphiyan issi issi komppo oittaa, issi issi muxo ashuwaanne woiniyaa teeraa melaappe issi issi lichchakkuwaa gishiis.

English Sentences: And he appointed certain of the Levites to minister before the ark of the LORD, and to record, and to thank and praise the LORD God of Israel:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA Taabootaa sinttan oottanaadaaninne GODAA Israa7eela Xoossaa sabbanaadan, galatanaadaaninne bonchchanaadan, amarida Leewata Daawiti sunttiis.

English Sentences: Asaph the chief, and next to him Zechariah, Jeiel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Mattithiah, and Eliab, and Benaiah, and Obededom: and Jeiel with psalteries and with harps; but Asaph made a sound with cymbals;
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewatu halaqai Asaafa; Asaafa kaallidi naa77antto halaqai Zakkaariyaasa. Zakkaariyaasa kaallidi de7iyaageeti Yi7i7eela, SHamiraamoota, Yihi7eela, Matiitiyaa, Eli7aaba, Banaayanne Obeedi-Eedooma. Eti maazinqqiyaanne diittaa diixxanau sunttettidosona; shin Asaafi daalaa qaattanau sunttettiis.

English Sentences: Benaiah also and Jahaziel the priests with trumpets continually before the ark of the covenant of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeesiyaa Banaayinne Yahaazi7eeli Xoossaa Maachchaa Taabootaa sinttan ubba wode xurumbbaa punnanau sunttettidosona.

English Sentences: Then on that day David delivered first this psalm to thank the LORD into the hand of Asaph and his brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi Daawiti kasetidi, Asaafinne a dabboti GODAA sabbanaadan azaziis.

English Sentences: Give thanks unto the LORD, call upon his name, make known his deeds among the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA galatite; a sunttaa xeesite. I oottidobaa kawotettatu gidduwan erissite.

English Sentences: Sing unto him, sing psalms unto him, talk ye of all his wondrous works.
Wolaitta Sentences: A sabbite; galata yettaa au yexxite. A maalaalissiya oosuwaa ubbaa yootite.

English Sentences: Glory ye in his holy name: let the heart of them rejoice that seek the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: A geeshsha sunttan ceeqettite; GODAA koyiyaageetu wozanati ufaittona.

English Sentences: Seek the LORD and his strength, seek his face continually.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAANNE a wolqqaa xomoosite; ubbatoo a sinttaa koyite.

English Sentences: Remember his marvellous works that he hath done, his wonders, and the judgments of his mouth;
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, a ashkkaraa Abrahaama zerettatoo, doorettida Yaaqooba naatoo,

English Sentences: O ye seed of Israel his servant, ye children of Jacob, his chosen ones.
Wolaitta Sentences: i oottido maalaalissiyaabaa, a malaataanne i pirddido pirddaa hassayite.

English Sentences: He is the LORD our God; his judgments are in all the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: I GODAA nu Xoossaa; a pirddaikka sa7aa ubbaa bollaana.

English Sentences: Be ye mindful always of his covenant; the word which he commanded to a thousand generations;
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba maachchaa merinaassi, ba azazido qaalaa sha7u yeletaa gakkanaassi naagees.

English Sentences: Even of the covenant which he made with Abraham, and of his oath unto Isaac;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, i Abrahaamaara maacettido maachchaa, Yisaaqassi caaqqido maachchaa.

English Sentences: And hath confirmed the same to Jacob for a law, and to Israel for an everlasting covenant,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobassi woga, Israa7eelassikka merinaa maachcha oottidi minttidoogaa.

English Sentences: Saying, Unto thee will I give the land of Canaan, the lot of your inheritance;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeyyo Kanaane biittaa immana; i ne zerettatuyyo laata gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When ye were but few, even a few, and strangers in it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa asati qoodan qii guuttanne Kanaane biittan bete gididi de7iyo wode,

English Sentences: And when they went from nation to nation, and from one kingdom to another people;
Wolaitta Sentences: issi deriyaappe hara deriyaa, issi kawotettaappe hara kawotettaa yuuyidosona.

English Sentences: He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes,
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai eta ooninne naaqqanau immibeenna; eta gishshau kawota seeriiddi,

English Sentences: Saying, Touch not mine anointed, and do my prophets no harm.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani tiyidoogeeta bochchoppite; ta hananabaa yootiyaageeta qohoppite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Sing unto the LORD, all the earth; shew forth from day to day his salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7an de7iya asau, ubbaikka GODAASSI yexxite; i ashshiyo mishiraachchuwaa hachchi hachchi yootite.

English Sentences: Declare his glory among the heathen; his marvellous works among all nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettatu giddon a bonchchuwaabaa, asaa ubbaa giddon a maalaalissiya oosuwaabaa awaajjite.

English Sentences: For great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised: he also is to be feared above all gods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI gita; aaro galatai ayyo bessees. Xoossatu ubbaappe aadhdhidi, i yayettanau bessees.

English Sentences: For all the gods of the people are idols: but the LORD made the heavens.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hara asaa xoossati ubbai eeqata; shin GODAI salota medhdhida Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Glory and honour are in his presence; strength and gladness are in his place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bonchchoinne anggai a yuushuwan de7ees; minotettainne ufaissai a Beeta Maqidasiyan de7ees.

English Sentences: Give unto the LORD, ye kindreds of the people, give unto the LORD glory and strength.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, asa zaretoo ubbau, GODAABAA yootite; "Bonchchoinne wolqqai GODAABAA" giidi yootite.

English Sentences: Give unto the LORD the glory due unto his name: bring an offering, and come before him: worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Bonchchoi a sunttaassa" giidi GODAABAA yootite. Yarshshuwaa ekkidi, a sintti yiite. A geeshshatettaa puulan GODAAYYO goinnite.

English Sentences: Fear before him, all the earth: the world also shall be stable, that it be not moved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittan de7iya asau ubbau, a sinttan kokkorite. Sa7ai minni eqqiis; mulekka qaaxxenna.

English Sentences: Let the heavens be glad, and let the earth rejoice: and let men say among the nations, The LORD reigneth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saloti ufaittona; sa7aikka hashshu go! Kawotettatu giddon eti, "GODAI kawotiis!" yaagona.

English Sentences: Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof: let the fields rejoice, and all that is therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abbainne a giddon kumidabati guummona. SHooqainne shooqan de7iyaabati ubbati ufaittona.

English Sentences: Then shall the trees of the wood sing out at the presence of the LORD, because he cometh to judge the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan woran de7iya mitta ubbai ufaissan GODAA sinttan yexxana. Aissi giikko, i sa7aa bollan pirddanau yees.

English Sentences: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good; for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI keha gidiyo gishshaunne aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa gidiyo gishshau, GODAA galatite.

English Sentences: And say ye, Save us, O God of our salvation, and gather us together, and deliver us from the heathen, that we may give thanks to thy holy name, and glory in thy praise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan intte, "Abeet nuna ashshiya Xoossau, nuna ashsha. Nuuni ne geeshsha sunttaa galatanaadaaninne ne bonchchuwan ceeqettanaadan, kawotettatu giddoppe shiishshada ashsha" yaagite.

English Sentences: Blessed be the LORD God of Israel for ever and ever. And all the people said, Amen, and praised the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai merinaappe merinaa gakkanaayyo galatetto! Hegaappe guyyiyan asai ubbai, "Amin77i" giidi, GODAA galatiis.

English Sentences: So he left there before the ark of the covenant of the LORD Asaph and his brethren, to minister before the ark continually, as every day's work required:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA Maachchaa Taabootaa sinttan hachchi hachchi goinuwaassi koshshiyaabaa ubba wode eti oottanaadan, Daawiti Asaafanne a dabbota wottiis.

English Sentences: And Obededom with their brethren, threescore and eight; Obededom also the son of Jeduthun and Hosah to be porters:
Wolaitta Sentences: I qassi Obeedi-Eedoomanne a dabbota usuppun tammanne hosppunata etaara oottanaadan wottiis; Yidutuuna na7aa Obeedi-Eedoomanne Hoosa penggiyaa naaganaadan wottiis.

English Sentences: And Zadok the priest, and his brethren the priests, before the tabernacle of the LORD in the high place that was at Gibeon,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeesee Xaadooqinne aara oottiya qeeseti Gabaa7oonan de7iya xoqqa sohuwan, Dunkkaaniyaa sinttan oottanaadan yan attidosona.

English Sentences: To offer burnt offerings unto the LORD upon the altar of the burnt offering continually morning and evening, and to do according to all that is written in the law of the LORD, which he commanded Israel;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eelayyo immido higgiyan xaafettidoogaadan, eti maalladonne omarssi ubba wode xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosan yarshshoosona.

English Sentences: And with them Heman and Jeduthun, and the rest that were chosen, who were expressed by name, to give thanks to the LORD, because his mercy endureth for ever;
Wolaitta Sentences: Aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa gidiyo gishshau, GODAA yettan galatanaadan Hemaana, Yidutuunanne doorettida haraata Daawiti etaara issippe wottiis.

English Sentences: And with them Heman and Jeduthun with trumpets and cymbals for those that should make a sound, and with musical instruments of God. And the sons of Jeduthun were porters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hemaaninne Yidutuuni xurumbbaa punnoosona, daalaa qaattoosonanne galataa mazamuriyaa yexxiiddi kaa7iyo hara miishshata kaa7oosona. Yidutuuna attuma naati penggiyaa naaganau sunttettidosona.

English Sentences: And all the people departed every man to his house: and David returned to bless his house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, asai ubbai ba soo ba soo biis. Daawitikka ba so asaa anjjanau simmiis.

English Sentences: Now it came to pass, as David sat in his house, that David said to Nathan the prophet, Lo, I dwell in an house of cedars, but the ark of the covenant of the LORD remaineth under curtains.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ba kawo keettan de7iiddi, hananabaa yootiya Naataana, "Taani zigaappe keexettida keettan de7ais; shin GODAA Maachchaa Taabootai dunkkaane garssaana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Nathan said unto David, Do all that is in thine heart; for God is with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Naataani Daawita, "Oottanau ne wozanai qoppidobaa ubbaa ootta; GODAI nenaara de7ees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass the same night, that the word of God came to Nathan, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he gallassa qammi GODAA qaalai Naataanakko yiidi,

English Sentences: Go and tell David my servant, Thus saith the LORD, Thou shalt not build me an house to dwell in:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ba; baada ta ashkkaraa Daawita hagaadan yaaga; GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani de7ana keettaa keexxanai nena gidakka.

English Sentences: For I have not dwelt in an house since the day that I brought up Israel unto this day; but have gone from tent to tent, and from one tabernacle to another.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani Israa7eelata Gibxxeppe kessido gallassaappe doommada hachchi gakkanaashin, keettan de7abeikke; taani dunkkaaniyaappe dunkkaaniyau, qassi issi sohuwaappe hara sohuwau yuuyada de7aas.

English Sentences: Wheresoever I have walked with all Israel, spake I a word to any of the judges of Israel, whom I commanded to feed my people, saying, Why have ye not built me an house of cedars?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Israa7eela asaa ubbaara yuuyido soho ubban, ta asaa heemmanau taani azazido Israa7eela daannatuppe oossinne, Taayyo zigaa keettaa aissi keexxabeikkii? gaada oichchabeikke" yaagees yaaga.

English Sentences: Now therefore thus shalt thou say unto my servant David, Thus saith the LORD of hosts, I took thee from the sheepcote, even from following the sheep, that thou shouldest be ruler over my people Israel:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, ha77ikka ta ashkkaraa Daawita, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI nena hagaadan yaagees; "Taani nena hentta gadeppe, dorssaa heemmiyoosaappe denttada, ta asaa Israa7eela kaalettanaadan ekkaas.

English Sentences: And I have been with thee whithersoever thou hast walked, and have cut off all thine enemies from before thee, and have made thee a name like the name of the great men that are in the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni biido soho ubban taani nenaara issippe gidaas; ne morkketa ubbaa ne sinttaappe diggaas. Ha77i simmi taani ha sa7an erettida gita asatu sunttaadan ne sunttaa gitayana.

English Sentences: Also I will ordain a place for my people Israel, and will plant them, and they shall dwell in their place, and shall be moved no more; neither shall the children of wickedness waste them any more, as at the beginning,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi taani ta asaassi, Israa7eelassi soho immada, eta he sohuwan tokkana. Hegaa gishshau, eti bantta sohuwan de7ana; eti naa77antto shabbirettokkona. Kase taani ta asaa Israa7eela bolli daannata sunttido wodiyaappe doommin naaqqidoogaadan, naa77antto iita asati eta naaqqokkona.

English Sentences: And since the time that I commanded judges to be over my people Israel. Moreover I will subdue all thine enemies. Furthermore I tell thee that the LORD will build thee an house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne morkketa ubbaa neeyyo haarissana. ""Hegaa bollankka GODAI ba huuphen ne zareti de7i be7anaadan oottanaagaa neessi yootees.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass, when thy days be expired that thou must go to be with thy fathers, that I will raise up thy seed after thee, which shall be of thy sons; and I will establish his kingdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne baree wurin, haiqqada ne maizza aawatun gaittiyo wode, taani neeppe guyyiyan ne zariyaa, ne naatuppe issuwaa denttada, a kawotettaa minttana.

English Sentences: He shall build me an house, and I will stablish his throne for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taayyo keettaa keexxanai a; taani a kawotaa araataa merinau mintta essana.

English Sentences: I will be his father, and he shall be my son: and I will not take my mercy away from him, as I took it from him that was before thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ayyo aawa gidana; ikka taayyo na7a gidana. Neeppe kase kawotida Saa7oolappe taani ta siiquwaa ekkarggidoogaadan, taani appe mulekka ekkikke.

English Sentences: But I will settle him in mine house and in my kingdom for ever: and his throne shall be established for evermore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a ta asaa bollinne ta kawotettaa bolli merinau sunttana; a kawotaa araataikka merinau minni eqqana" yaagees yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: According to all these words, and according to all this vision, so did Nathan speak unto David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naataani Xoossai ayyo ajjuutan qonccissido qaalaa ubbaa hagaadan Daawitayyo odiis.

English Sentences: And David the king came and sat before the LORD, and said, Who am I, O LORD God, and what is mine house, that thou hast brought me hitherto?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Kawoi Daawiti dunkkaaniyaa gelidi, GODAA sinttan uttiis. Uttidi hagaadan yaagidi woossiis; "Abeet GODAU, Xoossau, neeni hagaa ubbaa taayyo oottanau taani oonee? Ta so asaikka aibee?

English Sentences: And yet this was a small thing in thine eyes, O God; for thou hast also spoken of thy servant's house for a great while to come, and hast regarded me according to the estate of a man of high degree, O LORD God.
