Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, hagee ne aifiyaa sinttan guutta milatin, ne ashkkaraa zareti sinttappe yaana laittatun hananabaa yootadasa. Tana qassi gita asa kessadasa.

English Sentences: What can David speak more to thee for the honour of thy servant? for thou knowest thy servant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana ne ashkkaraa bonchchido gishshau, taani Daawiti simmi ai gaanau danddayiyaanaa? Neeni tana ne ashkkaraa eraasa.

English Sentences: O LORD, for thy servant's sake, and according to thine own heart, hast thou done all this greatness, in making known all these great things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne ashkkaraa gishshau, ne wozanaa qofaadan ha gitabaa ubbaa oottada, ha gitatettaa ubbaa tana erissadasa.

English Sentences: O LORD, there is none like thee, neither is there any God beside thee, according to all that we have heard with our ears.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Abeet GODAU, ne mali issoinne baawa. Nuuni nu haittan siyidoogaadan, neeppe attin, hara xoossi baawa.

English Sentences: And what one nation in the earth is like thy people Israel, whom God went to redeem to be his own people, to make thee a name of greatness and terribleness, by driving out nations from before thy people, whom thou hast redeemed out of Egypt?
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne asa oottanau wozido ne asaa Israa7eela milatiya hara kawotetti sa7aa bollan baawa. Neeni oottido gitanne maalaalissiya oosotu gaasuwan ne sunttai biittan sa7an erettiis. Neeni Gibxxeppe wozido ne asaa sinttaappe kawotettata laaggadasa.

English Sentences: For thy people Israel didst thou make thine own people for ever; and thou, LORD, becamest their God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne asaa Israa7eela merinau nebaa oottadasa. Abeet GODAU, neenikka eta Xoossaa gidadasa.

English Sentences: Therefore now, LORD, let the thing that thou hast spoken concerning thy servant and concerning his house be established for ever, and do as thou hast said.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Abeet GODAU, neeni ne ashkkaraabaanne a zerettaabaa haasayidoogee merinau minni eqqo; neeni oottana giidoogaadankka ootta.

English Sentences: Let it even be established, that thy name may be magnified for ever, saying, The LORD of hosts is the God of Israel, even a God to Israel: and let the house of David thy servant be established before thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai tumaappe Israa7eelassi Xoossaa geetettanaadan ne sunttai merinau minni eqqananne gitatana. Ne ashkkaraa Daawita zareti ne sinttan minni eqqana.

English Sentences: For thou, O my God, hast told thy servant that thou wilt build him an house: therefore thy servant hath found in his heart to pray before thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Abeet ta Xoossau, Taani ne zareti de7i be7anaadan oottana yaagada neeni taassi ne ashkkaraassi qonccadasa. Hegaa gishshau, taani ne ashkkarai ha woosaa nena woossanau xalaas.

English Sentences: And now, LORD, thou art God, and hast promised this goodness unto thy servant:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni Xoossaattennee! Neeni ha lo77o qaalaa taayyo ne ashkkaraayyo oottana gaadasa.

English Sentences: Now therefore let it please thee to bless the house of thy servant, that it may be before thee for ever: for thou blessest, O LORD, and it shall be blessed for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne sinttan yaa merinau gam77anaadan, ne ashkkaraa zariyaa anjjanau ufaitta. Abeet GODAU, neeni anjjidoogee merinau anjjettidaagaa gidana" yaagidi woossiis.

English Sentences: Now after this it came to pass, that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them, and took Gath and her towns out of the hand of the Philistines.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawiti Pilisxxeemata xoonidi haariis; yaatidi Gaate giyo katamaanne a moottata Pilisxxeema asatu kushiyaappe wotti ekkiis.

English Sentences: And he smote Moab; and the Moabites became David's servants, and brought gifts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Daawiti Moo7aaba biittaa asata xoonin, eti ayyo haarettidosona; haarettidi giiraa giiridosona.

English Sentences: And David smote Hadarezer king of Zobah unto Hamath, as he went to stablish his dominion by the river Euphrates.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hamaata katamaa matan de7iya Xooba biittaa Kawoi Hadaadi7eezeri, ba kawotettaa Efiraaxiisa SHaafaa gakkanaashin aassanau biishin, Daawiti a xooniis.

English Sentences: And David took from him a thousand chariots, and seven thousand horsemen, and twenty thousand footmen: David also houghed all the chariot horses, but reserved of them an hundred chariots.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Hadaadi7eezerappe issi sha7u para gaareta, laappun sha7u paraasatanne laatamu sha7u tohuwaasata omooddiis. Daawiti xeetu gaaretuyyo gidiya parata ashshidi, hara paratu ubbau gaadiyaa gilddayiis.

English Sentences: And when the Syrians of Damascus came to help Hadarezer king of Zobah, David slew of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Damasqqo kataman de7iya Sooreti Xooba biittaa Kawuwaa Hadaadi7eezera maaddanau yiido wode, Daawiti etappe laatamanne naa77u sha7u asaa woriis.

English Sentences: Then David put garrisons in Syriadamascus; and the Syrians became David's servants, and brought gifts. Thus the LORD preserved David whithersoever he went.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Sooriyaa biittan Damasqqo kataman olanchchatu qatota medhdhiis. Yaatin, Sooriyaa asati Daawitayyo haarettidi, giiraa giiridosona. Daawiti biido soho ubban GODAI ayyo xoonuwaa immiis.

English Sentences: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadarezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Daawiti Hadaadi7eezera oosanchchati tookkido worqqa gonddalleta ekkidi, Yerusalaame efiis.

English Sentences: Likewise from Tibhath, and from Chun, cities of Hadarezer, brought David very much brass, wherewith Solomon made the brasen sea, and the pillars, and the vessels of brass.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Daawiti Hadaadi7eezeri haariyo Xebaahanne Kuna katamatuppe nahaasiyaa giyo birataa keehi daruwaa ekkiis. Hegaappe simmin, Solomoni he nahaasiyaa birataappe Abba Sainiyaa, tuussatanne dumma dumma miishshata medhdhiis.

English Sentences: Now when Tou king of Hamath heard how David had smitten all the host of Hadarezer king of Zobah;
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Xooba biittaa Kawuwaa Hadaadi7eezera olanchchata ubbaa xoonidoogaa Hamaata Kawoi Too7i siyiis.

English Sentences: He sent Hadoram his son to king David, to enquire of his welfare, and to congratulate him, because he had fought against Hadarezer, and smitten him; (for Hadarezer had war with Tou;) and with him all manner of vessels of gold and silver and brass.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyidi Hadaadi7eezera olidi xoonido gishshau, a hashshu gaanaunne sarotanau ba na7aa Hadoraama Kawuwaa Daawitakko kiittiis. Aissi giikko, Hadaadi7eezeri Too7aara olettiiddi gam77iis. Hadoraami worqqaappe, biraappenne nahaasiyaappe medhdhido miishshata ekkidi yiis.

English Sentences: Them also king David dedicated unto the LORD, with the silver and the gold that he brought from all these nations; from Edom, and from Moab, and from the children of Ammon, and from the Philistines, and from Amalek.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Daawiti Eedoomappe, Moo7aabappe, Amoona asatuppe, Pilisxxeematuppenne Amaaleeqa asatuppe omooddi ekkido biraanne worqqa ha miishshatuura issippe gattidi, GODAU dummayidi wottiis.

English Sentences: Moreover Abishai the son of Zeruiah slew of the Edomites in the valley of salt eighteen thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xaruuyi na7ai Abishaayi Eedooma asaappe tammanne hosppun sha7ata Maxine Wombban woriis.

English Sentences: And he put garrisons in Edom; and all the Edomites became David's servants. Thus the LORD preserved David whithersoever he went.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawiti Eedooman olanchchatu qatota medhdhiis; yaatin, he biittaa asai ubbai Daawitayyo haarettiis. Daawiti biido soho ubban GODAI ayyo xoonuwaa immiis.

English Sentences: So David reigned over all Israel, and executed judgment and justice among all his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan oottidi, Daawiti Israa7eela ubbaa bolli kawotiis; kawotidi ba asaa ubbaa xillotettaaninne suure pirddan aissiis.

English Sentences: And Joab the son of Zeruiah was over the host; and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, recorder.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xaruuyi na7ai Yoo7aabi ola gadaawa; Ahiluuda na7ai Yoosaafixi hanidabaa xaafiyaagaa;

English Sentences: And Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Abimelech the son of Abiathar, were the priests; and Shavsha was scribe;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ahixuuba na7ai Xaadooqinne Abiyaataara na7ai Abimeleki qeeseta; Saraayi waanna xaafe;

English Sentences: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and the sons of David were chief about the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoodaahe na7ai Banaayi Daawita naagiya olanchchata halaqa; Daawita attuma naati a kawotettan xoqqa sohuwaa oiqqida halaqata.

English Sentences: Now it came to pass after this, that Nahash the king of the children of Ammon died, and his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Amoonatu Kawoi Naa7oosi haiqqiis; haiqqin a na7ai a sohuwan kawotiis.

English Sentences: And David said, I will shew kindness unto Hanun the son of Nahash, because his father shewed kindness to me. And David sent messengers to comfort him concerning his father. So the servants of David came into the land of the children of Ammon to Hanun, to comfort him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti, "A aawai Naa7oosi taayyo kehido gishshau, taani a na7aa Hanuunayyo kehana" yaagiis. Hanuuna aawai haiqqido gishshau, Daawiti a minttettanau asa kiittiis. Daawiti kiittidoogeeti Hanuuna minttettanau Amoona biitti gakkido wode,

English Sentences: But the princes of the children of Ammon said to Hanun, Thinkest thou that David doth honour thy father, that he hath sent comforters unto thee? are not his servants come unto thee for to search, and to overthrow, and to spy out the land?
Wolaitta Sentences: Amoona asaa halaqati Hanuuna, "Daawiti nena minttettanau ha asata kiittidoogee ne aawaa bonchchuwaa gishshaassa gaadiiyye? I ba asaa kiittidoogee ha katamaa xeellanaassa, wochchanaassanne olidi xoonanaassa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Wherefore Hanun took David's servants, and shaved them, and cut off their garments in the midst hard by their buttocks, and sent them away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Hanuuni Daawiti kiittido asata oiqqidi, eta buuchchaa meediis; eta maayuwaakka uttiyo dulliyaa baggaappe qanxxi ekkidi, eta yeddiis.

English Sentences: Then there went certain, and told David how the men were served. And he sent to meet them: for the men were greatly ashamed. And the king said, Tarry at Jericho until your beards be grown, and then return.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, asati daro yeellatidosona. Daawiti hegaa siyidi, i etaara gaittiya asa kiittiis. Kiittidi, "Intte buuchchai diccanaashin, Yarkko kataman de7ishshite; hegaappe guyyiyan haa yiite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the children of Ammon saw that they had made themselves odious to David, Hanun and the children of Ammon sent a thousand talents of silver to hire them chariots and horsemen out of Mesopotamia, and out of Syriamaachah, and out of Zobah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amoonati bantta oosuwan Daawiti eta morkkanaadan oottidoogaa erido wode, Hanuuninne Amoonati Masphphexoomiyaappenne Sooriyan de7iya Maa7ikanne Xooba geetettiya katamatuppe paraa gaaretanne paraasata qaxaranau hasttamanne oiddu sha7u kilo giraame deexxiya xaqara biraa yeddidosona.

English Sentences: So they hired thirty and two thousand chariots, and the king of Maachah and his people; who came and pitched before Medeba. And the children of Ammon gathered themselves together from their cities, and came to battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yeddidi hasttamanne naa77u sha7u paraa gaareta, paraasata, Maa7ika kawuwaanne a olanchchata qaxaridosona; qaxarin yiidi, Medaaban dunkkaanidosona. Qassi Amoonati bantta katamaappe shiiqidi, olau giigettidosona.

English Sentences: And when David heard of it, he sent Joab, and all the host of the mighty men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti hegaa siyido wode, Yoo7aabanne olanchchata ubbaa yeddiis.

English Sentences: And the children of Ammon came out, and put the battle in array before the gate of the city: and the kings that were come were by themselves in the field.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amoonati kiyidi, katamaa penggiyan olau salppidosona. Eta maaddanau yiida kawotikka bantta sohuwaa oiqqidi, dembban shiiqidosona.

English Sentences: Now when Joab saw that the battle was set against him before and behind, he chose out of all the choice of Israel, and put them in array against the Syrians.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabi bana olai sinttaaranne guyyeera doggomidoogaa be7ido wode, Israa7eelatu giddoppe ubbaappe minniya olanchchata doori ekkidi, Sooriyaa asatu sinttan salppissiis.

English Sentences: And the rest of the people he delivered unto the hand of Abishai his brother, and they set themselves in array against the children of Ammon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Attida asatuppe ba ishai Abishaayi azazana mala oottidi, Amoona asatu sinttan salppidosona.

English Sentences: And he said, If the Syrians be too strong for me, then thou shalt help me: but if the children of Ammon be too strong for thee, then I will help thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabi ba ishaa Abishaaya, "Sooriyaa asati taayyo wolqqaamikko, neeni yaada tana maadda. Qassi Amoona asati neeyyo wolqqaamikko, taani yaada nena maaddana.

English Sentences: Be of good courage, and let us behave ourselves valiantly for our people, and for the cities of our God: and let the LORD do that which is good in his sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi minna! Nu asaa gishshaunne nu Xoossaa katamatu gishshau, ane minni olettoos. GODAI bana lo77iyaabaa ootto" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Joab and the people that were with him drew nigh before the Syrians unto the battle; and they fled before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yoo7aabinne aara de7iya asai Sooriyaa asatuura olettanau lauhu giidosona. Yaatin, Sooriyaa asati a sinttaappe baqatidosona.

English Sentences: And when the children of Ammon saw that the Syrians were fled, they likewise fled before Abishai his brother, and entered into the city. Then Joab came to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sooriyaa asati baqatidoogaa Amoona asati be7ido wode, etikka a ishaa Abishaaya sinttaappe baqatidi, katamaa gelidosona. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yoo7aabi Yerusalaame simmiis.

English Sentences: And when the Syrians saw that they were put to the worse before Israel, they sent messengers, and drew forth the Syrians that were beyond the river: and Shophach the captain of the host of Hadarezer went before them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sooriyaa asati Israa7eela asati eta xoonidoogaa erido wode, asa kiittidi Efiraaxiisa SHaafaappe hefinttaara de7iya Sooriyaa asata ehiissidosona. Hadaadi7eezera ola gadaawai SHobaaki eta kaalettees.

English Sentences: And it was told David; and he gathered all Israel, and passed over Jordan, and came upon them, and set the battle in array against them. So when David had put the battle in array against the Syrians, they fought with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti hegaa siyido wode, Israa7eela olanchchata shiishshidi, Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinniis; pinnidi Sooriyaa asatuura olettanau eta sinttan salppidosona. Daawiti etaara olettanau salppin, etikka aara olettidosona.

English Sentences: But the Syrians fled before Israel; and David slew of the Syrians seven thousand men which fought in chariots, and forty thousand footmen, and killed Shophach the captain of the host.
Wolaitta Sentences: Olettin Sooriyaa asati Israa7eelatu sinttaappe baqatidosona; Daawiti Sooriyaa asatuppe paraa gaariyaa laaggiya laappun sha7u asatanne oitamu sha7u tohuwaasata woriis; eta ola gadaawaa SHobaakakka woriis.

English Sentences: And when the servants of Hadarezer saw that they were put to the worse before Israel, they made peace with David, and became his servants: neither would the Syrians help the children of Ammon any more.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hadaadi7eezera olanchchati Israa7eelatun xoonettidoogaa erido wode, Daawitaara sigettidi, ayyo haarettidosona. Hegaappe simmin, Sooriyaa asai Amoona asaa maaddanau dosibeenna.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that after the year was expired, at the time that kings go out to battle, Joab led forth the power of the army, and wasted the country of the children of Ammon, and came and besieged Rabbah. But David tarried at Jerusalem. And Joab smote Rabbah, and destroyed it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ofinttan, kawoti olau kiyiyo wode, Yoo7aabi olanchchata kaalettidi, Amoona biittaa woraajjiis; woraajjidi Raaba katamaa dooddiis. SHin Daawiti Yerusalaamen takkiis; Yoo7aabi Raaba katamaa olidi bashshiis.

English Sentences: And David took the crown of their king from off his head, and found it to weigh a talent of gold, and there were precious stones in it; and it was set upon David's head: and he brought also exceeding much spoil out of the city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Daawiti yiidi, eta kawuwaa worqqa kallachchaa a huuphiyaappe ekkiis. Kallachchai mazzaniyo wode hasttamanne oiddu kilo giraame gidiis; a giddon inqquwaa giyo al77o shuchchai de7ees. He kallachchai ekettidi, Daawita huuphiyan goxettiis. Qassi Daawiti he katamaappe keehi daro omooduwaa ekkiis.

English Sentences: And he brought out the people that were in it, and cut them with saws, and with harrows of iron, and with axes. Even so dealt David with all the cities of the children of Ammon. And David and all the people returned to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi kataman de7iya asaa kessidi, magaaziyan, birata shalkkiyaaninne kalttan ootissiis. Amoona katamatun de7iya asaa ubbaakka hegaadan ootissiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawitinne a asai ubbai Yerusalaame simmiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass after this, that there arose war at Gezer with the Philistines; at which time Sibbechai the Hushathite slew Sippai, that was of the children of the giant: and they were subdued.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe simmin, Pilisxxeema asatuura Gezeeran olai denddiis; denddin Huushappe yiida Sibbakaayi adussa mino asatu yaraappe gidiya Sippaaya woriis. Yaatin, Pilisxxeemati xoonettidosona.

English Sentences: And there was war again with the Philistines; and Elhanan the son of Jair slew Lahmi the brother of Goliath the Gittite, whose spear staff was like a weaver's beam.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe simminkka Pilisxxeema asatuura hara olai denddiis; denddin Yaa7iira na7ai Elihanaani tooraa toomai shimainniyaa wondderashiyaa keeniyo, Gaate katamaappe yiida Gooliyaada ishaa Laahima woriis.

English Sentences: And yet again there was war at Gath, where was a man of great stature, whose fingers and toes were four and twenty, six on each hand, and six on each foot and he also was the son of the giant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka hara olai Gaate kataman denddiis. He sohuwan issi wogga adussa bitanee de7ees. He bitaniyaayyo issi issi kushiyan usuppun biradhdheti, issi issi tohuwankka usuppun biradhdheti, muleera laatamanne oiddu biradhdheti de7oosona. He bitanee adussa mino asatu yaraappe gidiya asa.

English Sentences: But when he defied Israel, Jonathan the son of Shimea David's brother slew him.
Wolaitta Sentences: He bitanee Israa7eelata naassido wode, Daawita ishaa SHaama na7ai Yonaataani a woriis.

English Sentences: These were born unto the giant in Gath; and they fell by the hand of David, and by the hand of his servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti Gaate kataman de7iya adussa mino asatu yarata; eti ubbai Daawita kushiyaaninne a asaa kushiyan haiqqidosona.

English Sentences: And Satan stood up against Israel, and provoked David to number Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Seexaanai Israa7eela bolli metuwaa ehaanau koyidi, Daawiti Israa7eela asaa qoodanaadan denttettiis.

English Sentences: And David said to Joab and to the rulers of the people, Go, number Israel from Beersheba even to Dan; and bring the number of them to me, that I may know it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Yoo7aabanne olanchchatu halaqata hagaadan yaagiis; "Daanappe Berssaabeha gakkanaashin biite; biidi Israa7eela asaa qoodite. Yaatidi asaa qoodai aappunakko tana erissite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Joab answered, The LORD make his people an hundred times so many more as they be: but, my lord the king, are they not all my lord's servants? why then doth my lord require this thing? why will he be a cause of trespass to Israel?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yoo7aabi a, "GODAI ha de7iya ba asaa bolli xeetu kushiyaa gujjo! Ta godau, kawuwau, eti ubbai ta godaa ashkkarata gidokkonaayye? Ta godai hegaa malabaa oottanau aibissi koyii? Israa7eela kawotettaa aibissi mooranchcha kessii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Nevertheless the king's word prevailed against Joab. Wherefore Joab departed, and went throughout all Israel, and came to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin kawuwaa qaalai Yoo7aaba xooniis. Xoonin Yoo7aabi kiyidi, Israa7eela biittaa ubbaa yuuyiis; yuuyidi Yerusalaame simmiis.

English Sentences: And Joab gave the sum of the number of the people unto David. And all they of Israel were a thousand thousand and an hundred thousand men that drew sword: and Judah was four hundred threescore and ten thousand men that drew sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabi qoodido asaa qoodaa Daawitayyo immiis. Israa7eela biittan ubban bisuwan olettanau danddayiya issi miiloonenne issi xeetu sha7u mino asati de7oosona. Qassi Yihudaa biittan bisuwan olettanau danddayiya oiddu xeetanne laappun tammu sha7u mino asati de7oosona.

English Sentences: But Levi and Benjamin counted he not among them: for the king's word was abominable to Joab.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabi kawuwaa azazuwaa shenetido gishshau, Leewatanne Biniyaama zareta qoodan gujjibeenna.

English Sentences: And God was displeased with this thing; therefore he smote Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ha yohuwan ufaittibeenna gishshau, Israa7eela qaxxayiis.

English Sentences: And David said unto God, I have sinned greatly, because I have done this thing: but now, I beseech thee, do away the iniquity of thy servant; for I have done very foolishly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin Daawiti Xoossaa, "Taani ha oosuwan gita nagaraa oottaas. SHin ha77i nena woossais; ta mooruwaa, ne ashkkaraa mooruwaa qucca. Taani daro eeyyabaa hanaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Gad, David's seer, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin GODAI Daawitayyo hananabaa yootiya Gaada hagaadan yaagidi haasayissiis;

English Sentences: Go and tell David, saying, Thus saith the LORD, I offer thee three things: choose thee one of them, that I may do it unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ba; baada Daawita, GODAI nena, "Taani nena heezzubaappe dooruwaa bessais; taani ne bolli polanau taayyo etappe issuwaa doora" yaagees yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Gad came to David, and said unto him, Thus saith the LORD, Choose thee
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Gaadi Daawitakko biidi a, "GODAI nena, Haageetuppe issuwaa doora:

English Sentences: Either three years' famine; or three months to be destroyed before thy foes, while that the sword of thine enemies overtaketh thee; or else three days the sword of the LORD, even the pestilence, in the land, and the angel of the LORD destroying throughout all the coasts of Israel. Now therefore advise thyself what word I shall bring again to him that sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: heezzu laitta koshaa doorai? Woikko ne morkketi nena yedettishin, heezzu aginaa eta sinttaappe baqatanaagaa doorai? Woikko GODAA bisoi ne biittaa heezzu gallassaa shocanaagaanne hegaarakka qassi Israa7eela biittaa kantti kiyanaashin haiquwaa boshan shociya kiittanchchaa i kiittiyoogaa doorai? yaagees. Ane ha77i kuuyada, taani tana kiittidaagaayyo zaariyoobaa oda" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David said unto Gad, I am in a great strait: let me fall now into the hand of the LORD; for very great are his mercies: but let me not fall into the hand of man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Gaada, "Taani keehippe un77ettaas. GODAA maarotai keehi gita gidiyo gishshau, ane taani a kushiyan kunddana; taani asa kushiyan kunddikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So the LORD sent pestilence upon Israel: and there fell of Israel seventy thousand men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAI Israa7eela bolli boshaa yeddin, laappun tammu sha7u Israa7eela asati haiqqidosona.

English Sentences: And God sent an angel unto Jerusalem to destroy it: and as he was destroying, the LORD beheld, and he repented him of the evil, and said to the angel that destroyed, It is enough, stay now thine hand. And the angel of the LORD stood by the threshingfloor of Ornan the Jebusite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Xoossai Yerusalaame bashshanau kiitanchchaa kiittiis. SHin kiitanchchai Yerusalaame bashshanau mati uttidaashin, GODAI be7idi azzaniis. Azzanidi bashshiya kiitanchchaa, "Agga! Hegee gidana!" yaagiis. He wode GODAA kiitanchchai Yaabuusiyaa Ornna audiyaa matan eqqiis.

English Sentences: And David lifted up his eyes, and saw the angel of the LORD stand between the earth and the heaven, having a drawn sword in his hand stretched out over Jerusalem. Then David and the elders of Israel, who were clothed in sackcloth, fell upon their faces.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitanchchai ba bisuwaa ba kushiyan oiqqidi, Yerusalaame bashshanau sa7aappenne saluwaappe giddon eqqidaagaa Daawiti be7iis. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawitinne cimati waaruwaa maayidi, bantta som77uwan gufannidosona.

English Sentences: And David said unto God, Is it not I that commanded the people to be numbered? even I it is that have sinned and done evil indeed; but as for these sheep, what have they done? let thine hand, I pray thee, O LORD my God, be on me, and on my father's house; but not on thy people, that they should be plagued.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Xoossaa, "Asai qoodettanaadan oottidai tana gidikkinaayye? Naaqqidaageenne iitabaa oottidaagee tana. SHin ha dorssati, eti ai oottidonaa? Abeet GODAU, ta Xoossau, hayyanaa ne kushee tananne ta aawaa so asaa qaxxayo. Ne kushee ne asaa qaxxayoppo!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then the angel of the LORD commanded Gad to say to David, that David should go up, and set up an altar unto the LORD in the threshingfloor of Ornan the Jebusite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, GODAA kiitanchchai Gaada hagaadan yaagidi azaziis; "Daawiti pude Yaabuusiyaa Ornna audiyaa biidi, GODAAYYO yarshshiyoosaa yan gimbbanaadan yoota" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David went up at the saying of Gad, which he spake in the name of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA sunttan Gaadi yootidoogaadan Daawiti biis.

English Sentences: And Ornan turned back, and saw the angel; and his four sons with him hid themselves. Now Ornan was threshing wheat.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Ornninne a oiddu attuma naati audiyan gisttiyaa qoxxoosona. Qoxxiiddi guyye simmi xeellidi, kiitanchchaa be7idosona; be7in aara de7iya naati qosettidosona.

English Sentences: And as David came to Ornan, Ornan looked and saw David, and went out of the threshingfloor, and bowed himself to David with his face to the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Ornnakko yiido wode, Ornni a be7idi, audiyaappe gaxi kiyidi, ba som77uwaa sa7aa gattidi, Daawitayyo ziggiis.

English Sentences: Then David said to Ornan, Grant me the place of this threshingfloor, that I may build an altar therein unto the LORD: thou shalt grant it me for the full price: that the plague may be stayed from the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawiti Ornna, "Boshai asaa bollappe kichchana mala, taani GODAAYYO yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosaa keexxanau ne audiyaa taayyo baizzarkkii. Taani neeyyo kumetta waagaa qanxxana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Ornan said unto David, Take it to thee, and let my lord the king do that which is good in his eyes: lo, I give thee the oxen also for burnt offerings, and the threshing instruments for wood, and the wheat for the meat offering; I give it all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Ornni Daawita, "Neeyyo ekka; ta godai kawoi bana ufaissiyaabaa ootto. Be7a, xuuggiyo yarshshuwau booraa, eettanau kattaa qoxxiyo miishshaanne kattaa yarshshuwau gisttiyaa taani immana. Taani ha ubbaakka neeyyo immana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And king David said to Ornan, Nay; but I will verily buy it for the full price: for I will not take that which is thine for the LORD, nor offer burnt offerings without cost.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Kawoi Daawiti Ornna, "CHii, chii! Taani kumetta waagaa qanxxada shammana. Aissi giikko, taani nebaa GODAAYYO ekkikke; qassi taani miishshaa kessabeennabaa xuuggiyo yarshsho oottada yarshshikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So David gave to Ornan for the place six hundred shekels of gold by weight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Daawiti he audiyaayyo usuppun xeetu worqqa santtimiyaa immiis.

English Sentences: And David built there an altar unto the LORD, and offered burnt offerings and peace offerings, and called upon the LORD; and he answered him from heaven by fire upon the altar of burnt offering.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawiti he sohuwan GODAAYYO yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosaa keexxiis. Yaatidi xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne issippetettaa yarshshuwaa yarshshiis; yarshshidi GODAA woossin, GODAI xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa bolli saluwaappe tamaa yeddidi, ayyo zaariis.

English Sentences: And the LORD commanded the angel; and he put up his sword again into the sheath thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, GODAI kiitanchchaa azazin, kiitanchchai ba bisuwaa shoohuwau zaariis.

English Sentences: At that time when David saw that the LORD had answered him in the threshingfloor of Ornan the Jebusite, then he sacrificed there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti GODAI a woosau zaaridoogaa be7idi, Yaabuusiyaa Ornna audiyan naa77anttuwaa yarshshiis.

English Sentences: For the tabernacle of the LORD, which Moses made in the wilderness, and the altar of the burnt offering, were at that season in the high place at Gibeon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee bazzon giigissido GODAA Dunkkaaneenne xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosai he wode Gabaa7oonan goinniyo xoqqa sohuwan de7ees.

English Sentences: But David could not go before it to enquire of God: for he was afraid because of the sword of the angel of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Daawiti GODAA kiitanchchaa bisuwau yayyido gishshau, Xoossaa oichchanau he sohuwaa baanau danddayibeenna.

English Sentences: Then David said, This is the house of the LORD God, and this is the altar of the burnt offering for Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Daawiti, "GODAA Beeta Maqidasee hagan de7ana; Israa7eela asai xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa yarshshana sohoi hagaa gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David commanded to gather together the strangers that were in the land of Israel; and he set masons to hew wrought stones to build the house of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Daawiti Israa7eela biittan de7iya hara biittaa asata shiishshanaadan azaziis. Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxanau shuchchaa massiyaageeti shuchchaa massidi loittanau eta giddoppe sunttiis.

English Sentences: And David prepared iron in abundance for the nails for the doors of the gates, and for the joinings; and brass in abundance without weight;
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti penggiyaa sanqqaa oottanau misimaariyaayyoonne maaxafiyau haniya cora birataanne mazzananau danddayettenna, zawi bainna nahaasiyaa birataa giigissiis.

English Sentences: Also cedar trees in abundance: for the Zidonians and they of Tyre brought much cedar wood to David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sidoona asatinne Xiiroosa asati Daawitayyo zigaa ehiyo gishshau, Daawiti qoodai bainna zigaa giigissiis.

English Sentences: And David said, Solomon my son is young and tender, and the house that is to be builded for the LORD must be exceeding magnifical, of fame and of glory throughout all countries: I will therefore now make preparation for it. So David prepared abundantly before his death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti, "Ta na7ai Solomoni lammachchanne yelaga na7a. GODAAYYO keexettiya Beeta Maqidasee biitta ubban erettidanne bonchchettida, lo77o keetta gidanau bessees. Hegaa gishshau, au koshshiyaabaa taani giigissana" yaagiis. Daawiti haiqqanaappe kasetidi darobaa giigissi wottiis.

English Sentences: Then he called for Solomon his son, and charged him to build an house for the LORD God of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawiti ba na7aa Solomona xeesidi, GODAAYYO Israa7eela Xoossaayyo Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxanaadan azaziis.

English Sentences: And David said to Solomon, My son, as for me, it was in my mind to build an house unto the name of the LORD my God:
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Solomona, "Ta na7au, taani GODAA ta Xoossaa sunttaayyo Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxanau ta wozanan qoppaas.

English Sentences: But the word of the LORD came to me, saying, Thou hast shed blood abundantly, and hast made great wars: thou shalt not build an house unto my name, because thou hast shed much blood upon the earth in my sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAA qaalai tana, Neeni daro suuttaa gussadasa; qassi daro olaakka olettadasa. Neeni ha sa7aa bollan ta sinttan daro suuttaa gussido gishshau, ta sunttaayyo Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxakka.

English Sentences: Behold, a son shall be born to thee, who shall be a man of rest; and I will give him rest from all his enemies round about: for his name shall be Solomon, and I will give peace and quietness unto Israel in his days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7a; neeyyo issi saro na7i yelettana. A yuushuwan de7iya morkketu ubbaara taani a saro oottana. A sunttai Solomona; taani i kawotido laittan Israa7eela asaayyo sarotettaanne woppaa immana.

English Sentences: He shall build an house for my name; and he shall be my son, and I will be his father; and I will establish the throne of his kingdom over Israel for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ta sunttaayyo Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxana. I ta na7a gidana; taanikka ayyo aawa gidana. A kawotaa araataa Israa7eelan merinau mintta essana yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now, my son, the LORD be with thee; and prosper thou, and build the house of the LORD thy God, as he hath said of thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha77ikka ta na7au, GODAI nenaara gido. GODAI kase nebaa haasayidoogaadan, GODAA ne Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxanaagaa nena polisso.

English Sentences: Only the LORD give thee wisdom and understanding, and give thee charge concerning Israel, that thou mayest keep the law of the LORD thy God.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI nena Israa7eela asaa bolli kawo oottiyo wode, GODAA ne Xoossaa higgiyaa naaganaadan, GODAI neeyyo aadhdhida eratettaanne akeekaa immo.

English Sentences: Then shalt thou prosper, if thou takest heed to fulfil the statutes and judgments which the LORD charged Moses with concerning Israel: be strong, and of good courage; dread not, nor be dismayed.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Muuse baggaara Israa7eela azazido azazuwaanne wogaa naagiyaabaa gidikko, ubbai neeyyo hanana. Aikko baa minna! Yayyoppa woikko dagammoppa!

English Sentences: Now, behold, in my trouble I have prepared for the house of the LORD an hundred thousand talents of gold, and a thousand thousand talents of silver; and of brass and iron without weight; for it is in abundance: timber also and stone have I prepared; and thou mayest add thereto.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani daro tuggan GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxanau heezzu sha7anne oiddu xeetu kilo giraame deexxiya worqqaanne hasttamanne oiddu sha7u kilo giraame deexxiya biraa shiishshaas; qassi zawi bainna nahaasiyaanne birataa shiishshaas; qassikka mittaanne shuchchaa giigissaas. Gidikkokka, neeni hegaa bolli haraa gujjanau koshshees.

English Sentences: Moreover there are workmen with thee in abundance, hewers and workers of stone and timber, and all manner of cunning men for every manner of work.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne matan daro oosanchchati de7oosona; shuchchaa qoo7iyaageetinne massiyaageeti, anaaxetinne ubba oosuwaa oottanau danddayiya eranchcha asati de7oosona.

English Sentences: Of the gold, the silver, and the brass, and the iron, there is no number. Arise therefore, and be doing, and the LORD be with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti oottiyo worqqau, birau, nahaasiyaunne biratau zawi baawa. Ha77i neeni oosuwaa doomma. GODAI nenaara gido" yaagiis.

English Sentences: David also commanded all the princes of Israel to help Solomon his son, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Israa7eela kaalettiyaageeti ubbai ba na7aa Solomona maaddanaadan hagaadan yaagidi azaziis;

English Sentences: Is not the LORD your God with you? and hath he not given you rest on every side? for he hath given the inhabitants of the land into mine hand; and the land is subdued before the LORD, and before his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI intte Xoossai inttenaara de7enneeyye? I inttena ubbasaara shemppissibeennee? Ha biittan de7iyaageeta i ta kushiyan aatti immido gishshau, ha biittai GODAAYYONNE a asaayyo haarettiis.

English Sentences: Now set your heart and your soul to seek the LORD your God; arise therefore, and build ye the sanctuary of the LORD God, to bring the ark of the covenant of the LORD, and the holy vessels of God, into the house that is to be built to the name of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77ikka GODAA intte Xoossaa koyanau intte wozanaanne intte shemppuwaa immite. GODAA sunttau keexettida Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon GODAA Maachchaa Taabootaanne Xoossaa geeshsha miishshata ehiidi wottanaadan, intte denddidi, GODAA Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So when David was old and full of days, he made Solomon his son king over Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ceeggido wode, ba na7aa Solomona Israa7eela bolli kawoyiis.

English Sentences: And he gathered together all the princes of Israel, with the priests and the Levites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Israa7eela kaalettiyaageeta ubbata, qeesetanne Leewata issippe shiishshiis.

English Sentences: Now the Levites were numbered from the age of thirty years and upward: and their number by their polls, man by man, was thirty and eight thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hasttamu laittanne hegaappe bollaara de7iya Leewati qoodettidosona; qoodettidi eti muleera hasttamanne hosppun sha7u attumaasa gididosona.

English Sentences: Of which, twenty and four thousand were to set forward the work of the house of the LORD; and six thousand were officers and judges:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageetu giddoppe GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaayyo aawatiya laatamanne oiddu sha7ata kawoi wottiis. Qassi halaqatanne pirdda daannata usuppun sha7ata wottiis.

English Sentences: Moreover four thousand were porters; and four thousand praised the LORD with the instruments which I made, said David, to praise therewith.
Wolaitta Sentences: Penggiyaa naagiyaageeta oiddu sha7ata wottiis. GODAA galatanau Daawiti medhdhido yetta miishshan GODAA galatiyaageeta oiddu sha7ata wottiis.

English Sentences: And David divided them into courses among the sons of Levi, namely, Gershon, Kohath, and Merari.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Leewi yelido attuma naata Gershshoona, Qahaatanne Maraara eta yaran yaran heezzu citan shaakkiis.

English Sentences: Of the Gershonites were, Laadan, and Shimei.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gershshooni yelido attuma naati La7idaananne SHim77a.

English Sentences: The sons of Laadan; the chief was Jehiel, and Zetham, and Joel, three.
Wolaitta Sentences: La7idaana attuma naati heezza; etikka Yihi7eela, Zetaamanne Yuu7eela.

English Sentences: The sons of Shimei; Shelomith, and Haziel, and Haran, three. These were the chief of the fathers of Laadan.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHim77a attuma naati heezzati SHalomoota, Hazii7eelanne Haaraana; hageeti La7idaana yaratuyyo halaqata.

English Sentences: And the sons of Shimei were, Jahath, Zina, and Jeush, and Beriah. These four were the sons of Shimei.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHim77a attuma naati oiddati, bantta yeletaa yeletaa maaran Yahaata, Ziina, Yi7uushanne Barii7a.

English Sentences: And Jahath was the chief, and Zizah the second: but Jeush and Beriah had not many sons; therefore they were in one reckoning, according to their father's house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yi7uushassinne Barii7assi naati darenna; hegaa gishshau, eti issi yaradan qoodettidosona.

English Sentences: The sons of Kohath; Amram, Izhar, Hebron, and Uzziel, four.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qahaata naati oiddati Amiraama, Yixihaara, Kebroonanne Uzzi7eela.

English Sentences: The sons of Amram; Aaron and Moses: and Aaron was separated, that he should sanctify the most holy things, he and his sons for ever, to burn incense before the LORD, to minister unto him, and to bless in his name for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amiraama attuma naati Aaroonanne Muusa. Aarooninne a zerettai ubbaappe aaro geeshsha gidanaadan dummatidosona. Eti GODAA sinttan ixaanaa cuwayanau, GODAAYYO oottanaunne GODAA sunttan asaa anjjanau merinau dummatidosona.

English Sentences: Now concerning Moses the man of God, his sons were named of the tribe of Levi.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossa asa gidiya Muuse naati Leewa zaretuura gatto qoodettidosona.

English Sentences: The sons of Moses were, Gershom, and Eliezer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muuse naati Gershshoomanne El77eezara.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Gershom, Shebuel was the chief.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gershshooma naatu giddoppe halaqai SHabu7eela.

English Sentences: And the sons of Eliezer were, Rehabiah the chief. And Eliezer had none other sons; but the sons of Rehabiah were very many.
Wolaitta Sentences: El77eezara na7ai Rahaabiyaa. El77eezarayyo hara na7i baawa; shin Rahaabiyaa naati keehi cora.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Izhar; Shelomith the chief.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yixihaara naatu halaqai SHalomiita.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Hebron; Jeriah the first, Amariah the second, Jahaziel the third, and Jekameam the fourth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kebroona na7ai bairai Yiriiya; naa77anttoi Amaariyaa; heezzanttoi Yahaazi7eela; oiddanttoi Yiqami7aama.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Uzziel; Micah the first, and Jesiah the second.
Wolaitta Sentences: Uzzi7eela na7ai bairai Mikiyaasa; naa77anttoi Yishiyaa.

English Sentences: The sons of Merari; Mahli, and Mushi. The sons of Mahli; Eleazar, and Kish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maraara naati Maahilanne Musha. Maahila naati El77aazaranne Qiisha.

English Sentences: And Eleazar died, and had no sons, but daughters: and their brethren the sons of Kish took them.
Wolaitta Sentences: El77aazari macca naatuppe attin, attuma naata yelennan haiqqiis. Hegaa gishshau, eta ishantti Qiisha naati eta machchidosona.

English Sentences: The sons of Mushi; Mahli, and Eder, and Jeremoth, three.
Wolaitta Sentences: Musha naati heezzati Maahila, Edeeranne Yiremoota.

English Sentences: These were the sons of Levi after the house of their fathers; even the chief of the fathers, as they were counted by number of names by their polls, that did the work for the service of the house of the LORD, from the age of twenty years and upward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewa yeletan bantta zariyaaninne keettan bantta sunttan mazggafettidaageeti hageeta; laatamu laittanne hegaappe bollaara de7iya Leewa zareti ubbai GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyan oottidosona.

English Sentences: For David said, The LORD God of Israel hath given rest unto his people, that they may dwell in Jerusalem for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti, "GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai ba asaa shemppissiis. GODAI Yerusalaamen merinau de7ana.

English Sentences: And also unto the Levites; they shall no more carry the tabernacle, nor any vessels of it for the service thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Dunkkaaniyaanne a giddon go7ettiyo miishshata hagaappe sinttanau Leewati tookkanau bessenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: For by the last words of David the Levites were numbered from twenty years old and above:
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti wurssettan azazido azazuwaadankka laatamu laittanne hegaappe bollaara de7iya Leewati qoodettidosona.

English Sentences: Because their office was to wait on the sons of Aaron for the service of the house of the LORD, in the courts, and in the chambers, and in the purifying of all holy things, and the work of the service of the house of God;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyan oottiya Aaroona zerettata maaddoosona. GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyan kareeranne soora oottoosona; geeshsha miishsha ubbaa tunennaadan naagoosona.

English Sentences: Both for the shewbread, and for the fine flour for meat offering, and for the unleavened cakes, and for that which is baked in the pan, and for that which is fried, and for all manner of measure and size;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi eti Xoossaa sinttan wottiyo oittaayyo, kattaa yarshshuwaayyo, shiishshiyo xiilliyaayyo, irshshoi gelibeenna oittaayyoonne zaitiyan munaqettiya xiilliyaayyo aawatoosona; eti makkiyoobaayyoonne likkiyoobau ubbau aawatoosona.

English Sentences: And to stand every morning to thank and praise the LORD, and likewise at even;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi eti ubba gallassi maalladonne omarssi,

English Sentences: And to offer all burnt sacrifices unto the LORD in the sabbaths, in the new moons, and on the set feasts, by number, according to the order commanded unto them, continually before the LORD:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI xuuggiyo yarshshoi yarshshettiyo Sambbata gallassi, aginai xeeriyo wodenne higgiyan xaafettida hara baala gallassati gakkiyo wode, GODAA galatanaunne bonchchanau sunttettidosona.

English Sentences: And that they should keep the charge of the tabernacle of the congregation, and the charge of the holy place, and the charge of the sons of Aaron their brethren, in the service of the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dunkkaaniyaanne GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa naaganaadaaninne Aaroona zerettata maaddanaadan aawatettai Leewatuyyo imettiis.

English Sentences: Now these are the divisions of the sons of Aaron. The sons of Aaron; Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aaroona zaretu citati hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Aaroona naati Nadaaba, Abiiha, El77aazaranne Itaamaara.

English Sentences: But Nadab and Abihu died before their father, and had no children: therefore Eleazar and Ithamar executed the priest's office.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Nadaabinne Abiihu na7a yelennan bantta aawaappe kase haiqqidosona. Hegaa gishshau, El77aazarinne Itaamaari qeese gididosona.

English Sentences: And David distributed them, both Zadok of the sons of Eleazar, and Ahimelech of the sons of Ithamar, according to their offices in their service.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Aaroona zareta eta oosuwaadan oosuwaadan citan shaakkiis. El77aazara yaraappe Xaadooqinne Itaamaara yaraappe Abimeleki Daawita maaddidosona.

English Sentences: And there were more chief men found of the sons of Eleazar than of the sons of Ithamar; and thus were they divided. Among the sons of Eleazar there were sixteen chief men of the house of their fathers, and eight among the sons of Ithamar according to the house of their fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: El77aazara yarati tammanne usuppun citan shaahettin, Itaamaara yarati qassi hosppun citan shaahettidosona. El77aazara yaratu halaqati Itaamaara yaratu halaqatuppe dari beettido gishshau, hegaadan haniis.

English Sentences: Thus were they divided by lot, one sort with another; for the governors of the sanctuary, and governors of the house of God, were of the sons of Eleazar, and of the sons of Ithamar.
Wolaitta Sentences: El77aazara yaratu giddooninne Itaamaara yaratu giddon Beeta Maqidasiyau halaqatinne Xoossaa oosuwau halaqati de7iyo gishshau, hageetinne hinkkootinne oosuwaa saaman shaakkidosona.

English Sentences: And Shemaiah the son of Nethaneel the scribe, one of the Levites, wrote them before the king, and the princes, and Zadok the priest, and Ahimelech the son of Abiathar, and before the chief of the fathers of the priests and Levites: one principal household being taken for Eleazar, and one taken for Ithamar.
Wolaitta Sentences: El77aazara yaratinne Itaamaara yarati bantta kayan kayan saamaa kessidosona. Kessin Leewa zare gidiya Nataani7eela na7ai xaafee SHamaa7ee eta mazggafiis. Kawoinne a halaqati, qeesiyaa Xaadooqinne Abiyaataara na7ai Abimeleki, qeesetu yaratu halaqatinne Leewatu yaratu halaqati ubbati ha yohuwau markka.

English Sentences: Now the first lot came forth to Jehoiarib, the second to Jedaiah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha asati saamaa kessin, koiro saamai Yihoyaariba gakkiis. Naa77anttoi Yadaaya gakkiis.

English Sentences: The third to Harim, the fourth to Seorim,
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzanttoi Hariima gakkiis. Oiddanttoi Sa7oorima gakkiis.

English Sentences: The fifth to Malchijah, the sixth to Mijamin,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ichchashanttoi Malkkiyaa gakkiis. Usuppunttoi Miyaamiina gakkiis.

English Sentences: The seventh to Hakkoz, the eighth to Abijah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Laappunttoi Haqqooxa gakkiis. Hosppunttoi Abiiya gakkiis.

English Sentences: The ninth to Jeshuah, the tenth to Shecaniah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Uddufunttoi Yaasa gakkiis. Tammanttoi SHakaaniyaa gakkiis.

English Sentences: The eleventh to Eliashib, the twelfth to Jakim,
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne isiininttoi Eliyaashiba gakkiis. Tammanne naa77anttoi Yaaqiima gakkiis.

English Sentences: The thirteenth to Huppah, the fourteenth to Jeshebeab,
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne heezzanttoi Huppa gakkiis. Tammanne oiddanttoi Yesheka7aaba gakkiis.

English Sentences: The fifteenth to Bilgah, the sixteenth to Immer,
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne ichchashanttoi Bilgga gakkiis. Tammanne usuppunttoi Imeera gakkiis.

English Sentences: The seventeenth to Hezir, the eighteenth to Aphses,
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne laappunttoi Heziira gakkiis. Tammanne hosppunttoi Happixeexa gakkiis.

English Sentences: The nineteenth to Pethahiah, the twentieth to Jehezekel,
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne uddufunttoi Pataahiyaa gakkiis. Laatamanttoi Yihezqqeela gakkiis.

English Sentences: The one and twentieth to Jachin, the two and twentieth to Gamul,
Wolaitta Sentences: Laatamanne isiininttoi Yaakiina gakkiis. Laatamanne naa77anttoi Gamuula gakkiis.

English Sentences: The three and twentieth to Delaiah, the four and twentieth to Maaziah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laatamanne heezzanttoi Dalaaya gakkiis. Laatamanne oiddanttoi Ma7aaziyaa gakkiis.

English Sentences: These were the orderings of them in their service to come into the house of the LORD, according to their manner, under Aaron their father, as the LORD God of Israel had commanded him.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai eta maizza aawaa Aaroona baggaara azazidoogaadan, eti GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelidi, kayan kayan oottanau xaafettidosona.

English Sentences: And the rest of the sons of Levi were these: Of the sons of Amram; Shubael: of the sons of Shubael; Jehdeiah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewa zaretu halaqati harati hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Yehidaayi SHabu7eela baggaara Amiraama zare.

English Sentences: Concerning Rehabiah: of the sons of Rehabiah, the first was Isshiah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yishee Rahaabiyaa zare.

English Sentences: Of the Izharites; Shelomoth: of the sons of Shelomoth; Jahath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yahaati SHalomiita baggaara Yixihaara zare.

English Sentences: And the sons of Hebron; Jeriah the first, Amariah the second, Jahaziel the third, Jekameam the fourth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiriiyi, Amaaree, Yahaazi7eelinne Yiqami7aami Kebroona zare; eti bantta yeletaa maaran xaafettidosona.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Uzziel; Michah: of the sons of Michah; Shamir.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHamiiri Mikiyaasa baggaara Uzzi7eela zare.

English Sentences: The brother of Michah was Isshiah: of the sons of Isshiah; Zechariah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zakkaariyaasi Mikiyaasa ishaa Yishiyaa baggaara Uzzi7eela zare.

English Sentences: The sons of Merari were Mahli and Mushi: the sons of Jaaziah; Beno.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maahili, Mushinne Yaa7izee Maraara zareta.

English Sentences: The sons of Merari by Jaaziah; Beno, and Shoham, and Zaccur, and Ibri.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaa7iziyaa naati heezzati SHohaama, Zakkuuranne Iibira.

English Sentences: Of Mahli came Eleazar, who had no sons.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maahila naati naa77ati El77aazaranne Qiisha. El77aazarayyo attuma na7i baawa.

English Sentences: Concerning Kish: the son of Kish was Jerahmeel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qiishayyo Yiraahima7eela giyo issi attuma na7ai de7ees.

English Sentences: The sons also of Mushi; Mahli, and Eder, and Jerimoth. These were the sons of the Levites after the house of their fathers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mushayyo Maahila, Edeeranne Yiremoota geetettiya heezzu attuma naati de7oosona. Hageeti Leewa zaretu halaqata.

English Sentences: These likewise cast lots over against their brethren the sons of Aaron in the presence of David the king, and Zadok, and Ahimelech, and the chief of the fathers of the priests and Levites, even the principal fathers over against their younger brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kase eta dabboti, Aaroona zare qeeseti oottidoogaadan, Leewa zaretu halaqatinne kaalotiya ishanttuppe issoi saamaa yeggees. Saamai kiyiyo wode Kawoi Daawiti, Xaadooqi, Abimeleki, qeesetu halaqatinne Leewatu halaqati markka.

English Sentences: Moreover David and the captains of the host separated to the service of the sons of Asaph, and of Heman, and of Jeduthun, who should prophesy with harps, with psalteries, and with cymbals: and the number of the workmen according to their service was:
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawitinne ola gadaawati Asaafa naatuppe, Hemaana naatuppenne Yidutuuna naatuppe maazinqqiyan diittaaninne daalan hananabaa yootiyaageetu oosuwaa oottanaadan dummayidosona. Banttau imettida oosuwaa oottin, sunttai mazggafettido asati hageeta.

English Sentences: Of the sons of Asaph; Zaccur, and Joseph, and Nethaniah, and Asarelah, the sons of Asaph under the hands of Asaph, which prophesied according to the order of the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaafa naati Zakkuura, Yooseefa, Nataaniyaanne Asaari7eela. Asaafa naati kawoi azazin, hananabaa yootiya Asaafappe garssaara azazettoosona.

English Sentences: Of Jeduthun: the sons of Jeduthun; Gedaliah, and Zeri, and Jeshaiah, Hashabiah, and Mattithiah, six, under the hands of their father Jeduthun, who prophesied with a harp, to give thanks and to praise the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yidutuuna naati Gadaaliyaa, Xara, Yishaa7iyaa, SHim77a, Hashaabiyaanne Matiitiyaa. Ha usuppunati maazinqqiyan hananabaa yootiiddi, GODAA galatiiddinne bonchchiiddi, bantta aawaa Yidutuunappe garssaara azazettidosona.

English Sentences: Of Heman: the sons of Heman: Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, and Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, and Romamtiezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir, and Mahazioth:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hemaana naati Buqqiyaa, Mataaniyaa, Uzzi7eela, SHabu7eela, Yaarimoota, Hanaaniyaa, Hanaana, Eli7aata, Giddaltta, Romamtti7eezera, Yoshibaqaasha, Malloota, Hotiiranne Maahizi7aata.

English Sentences: All these were the sons of Heman the king's seer in the words of God, to lift up the horn. And God gave to Heman fourteen sons and three daughters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti ubbai kawuwaayyo hananabaa yootiya Hemaana naata. Xoossai kase immana giidoogaadan, Hemaana xoqqu xoqqu oottana mala, ha tammanne oiddu attuma naatanne heezzu macca naata ayyo immiis.

English Sentences: All these were under the hands of their father for song in the house of the LORD, with cymbals, psalteries, and harps, for the service of the house of God, according to the king's order to Asaph, Jeduthun, and Heman.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti ubbai GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyan daalaa qaattanau, diittaanne maazinqqiyaa diixxiiddinne yexxiiddi goinnanau, bantta aawaappe garssaara de7oosona. Asaafi, Yidutuuninne Hemaani kawuwaa azazuwan de7oosona.

English Sentences: So the number of them, with their brethren that were instructed in the songs of the LORD, even all that were cunning, was two hundred fourscore and eight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti laatamanne oiddu asati daro erai de7iyo asata. Eta dabboti yettan loohidaageeta; eti muleera naa77u xeetanne hosppun tammanne hosppuna.

English Sentences: And they cast lots, ward against ward, as well the small as the great, the teacher as the scholar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta oosuwaa shaakki eranau gitai guuttai, asttamaaree tamaaree, ubbaikka lagge saamaa yeggidosona.

English Sentences: Now the first lot came forth for Asaph to Joseph: the second to Gedaliah, who with his brethren and sons were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yeggin koiro saamai Asaafa na7aa Yooseefa gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a. Naa77antto saamai Gadaaliyaa gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The third to Zaccur, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzantto saamai Zakkuura gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The fourth to Izri, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Oiddantto saamai Xara gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The fifth to Nethaniah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ichchashantto saamai Nataaniyaa gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The sixth to Bukkiah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Usuppuntta saamai Buqqiyaa gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The seventh to Jesharelah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Laappuntta saamai Asaari7eela gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The eighth to Jeshaiah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hosppuntta saamai Yishaa7iyaa gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The ninth to Mattaniah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Uddufuntta saamai Mataaniyaa gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The tenth to Shimei, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammantta saamai SHim77a gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The eleventh to Azareel, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne isiinintta saamai Uzzi7eela gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The twelfth to Hashabiah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne naa77antta saamai Hashaabiyaa gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The thirteenth to Shubael, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne heezzantta saamai SHabu7eela gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The fourteenth to Mattithiah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne oiddantta saamai Matiitiyaa gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The fifteenth to Jeremoth, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne ichchashantta saamai Yaarimoota gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The sixteenth to Hananiah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne usuppuntta saamai Hanaaniyaa gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The seventeenth to Joshbekashah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne laappuntta saamai Yoshibaqaasha gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The eighteenth to Hanani, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne hosppuntta saamai Hanaana gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The nineteenth to Mallothi, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne uddufuntta saamai Malloota gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The twentieth to Eliathah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Laatamantta saamai Eli7aata gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The one and twentieth to Hothir, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Laatamanne isiinintta saamai Hotiira gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The two and twentieth to Giddalti, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Laatamanne naa77antta saamai Giddaltta gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The three and twentieth to Mahazioth, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
Wolaitta Sentences: Laatamanne heezzantta saamai Maahizi7aata gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: The four and twentieth to Romamtiezer, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laatamanne oiddantta saamai Romamtti7eezera gakkiis; i, a naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: Concerning the divisions of the porters: Of the Korhites was Meshelemiah the son of Kore, of the sons of Asaph.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasiyaa penggiyaa naagiyaageeti hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Koiroi Qoraaha yaraappe Asaafa baggaara Qore na7aa Mashelemiyaa.

English Sentences: And the sons of Meshelemiah were, Zechariah the firstborn, Jediael the second, Zebadiah the third, Jathniel the fourth,
Wolaitta Sentences: Mashelemee laappun attuma naata yeliis; eti bantta yeletaa maaran Zakkaariyaasa, Yidi7eela, Zabaadiyaa, Yaatini7eela,

English Sentences: Elam the fifth, Jehohanan the sixth, Elioenai the seventh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Elaama, Yahohanaananne Eliyaho7enaaya.

English Sentences: Moreover the sons of Obededom were, Shemaiah the firstborn, Jehozabad the second, Joah the third, and Sacar the fourth, and Nethaneel the fifth,
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Obeedi-Eedoomakka anjjido gishshau, i hosppun attuma naata yeliis. Eti bantta yeletaa maaran SHamaa7iyaa, Yihozabaada, Yo7aaha, Sakaara, Nataani7eela,

English Sentences: Ammiel the sixth, Issachar the seventh, Peulthai the eighth: for God blessed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ami7eela, Yisaakooranne Pa7ulttaaya.

English Sentences: Also unto Shemaiah his son were sons born, that ruled throughout the house of their father: for they were mighty men of valour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Obeedi-Eedooma na7ai SHamaa7eekka usuppun attuma naata yeliis; eti mino asa gidido gishshau, bantta aawaa keettan halaqa gididosona.

English Sentences: The sons of Shemaiah; Othni, and Rephael, and Obed, Elzabad, whose brethren were strong men, Elihu, and Semachiah.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHamaa7iyaa naati Ootina, Rafaa7eela, Yobeedanne Elzzabaada; eta ishantti Eelihunne Samaakee aadhdhida mino asata.

English Sentences: All these of the sons of Obededom: they and their sons and their brethren, able men for strength for the service, were threescore and two of Obededom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti ubbati Obeedi-Eedooma zareta; eti, eta naatinne eta dabboti oosuwau mino. Obeedi-Eedooma zareti muleera usuppun tammanne naa77a.

English Sentences: And Meshelemiah had sons and brethren, strong men, eighteen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mashelemiyaayyo mino naatinne mino dabboti de7oosona; eti muleera tammanne hosppuna.

English Sentences: Also Hosah, of the children of Merari, had sons; Simri the chief, (for though he was not the firstborn, yet his father made him the chief;)
Wolaitta Sentences: Maraara yaraappe Hoosayyookka naati de7oosona. SHiimiri baira na7a gidenna; shin a aawai a halaqa oottiis.

English Sentences: Hilkiah the second, Tebaliah the third, Zechariah the fourth: all the sons and brethren of Hosah were thirteen.
Wolaitta Sentences: A ishantti Hilqqiyaa, Xabaaliyaanne Zakkaariyaasa. Hoosa naatinne a dabboti muleera tammanne heezza.

English Sentences: Among these were the divisions of the porters, even among the chief men, having wards one against another, to minister in the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasiyaa penggiyaa naagiyaageeti bantta keettaa asaa halaqatun, citan citan shaahettidosona. Hara Leewatudan etakka GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa oosoi shaahuwan gakkiis.

English Sentences: And they cast lots, as well the small as the great, according to the house of their fathers, for every gate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Penggiyaa ubbaa naaganau bantta keettan keettan guuttai gitai saamaa kessidosona.

English Sentences: And the lot eastward fell to Shelemiah. Then for Zechariah his son, a wise counsellor, they cast lots; and his lot came out northward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Arshsho Penggiyaa giyo penggiyaa naagiyo saamai SHeleemiyaa gakkiis. Lo77o zoriya a na7aa Zakkaariyaasa Huuphessa Penggiyaa giyo penggiyaa naagiyo saamai gakkiis.

English Sentences: To Obededom southward; and to his sons the house of Asuppim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Obeedi-Eedooma Tohossa Penggiyaa giyo penggiyaa naagiyo saamai gakkiis. A naata buquraa minjjiyo keettaa naagiyo saamai gakkiis.

English Sentences: To Shuppim and Hosah the lot came forth westward, with the gate Shallecheth, by the causeway of the going up, ward against ward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Arggo Penggiyaanne bolla ogiyaa baggaara de7iya SHalekoota Penggiyaa geetettiya penggeta naagiyo saamai SHufiimanne Hoosa gakkiis. Naagoi kayan kayan gakkees.

English Sentences: Eastward were six Levites, northward four a day, southward four a day, and toward Asuppim two and two.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gallassan gallassan arshsho baggaara usuppun Leewati naagoosona. Huuphessa baggaara oiddati naagoosona. Tohossa baggaara oiddati naagoosona. Qassi naa77ai naa77ai buquraa minjjiyo keettaa naagoosona.

English Sentences: At Parbar westward, four at the causeway, and two at Parbar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Arggo baggaara dabaabau efiya ogiyaa oiddati naagoosona. Qassi dabaabaa gidduwaa naa77ati naagoosona.

English Sentences: These are the divisions of the porters among the sons of Kore, and among the sons of Merari.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi Qoraaha yaratussinne Maraara yaratussi imettida pengge naago oosoi hagaa.

English Sentences: And of the Levites, Ahijah was over the treasures of the house of God, and over the treasures of the dedicated things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Akiiya giyo Leewee Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyan de7iya buquraanne Xoossaayyo dummayi wottido imota naaganau sunttettiis.

English Sentences: As concerning the sons of Laadan; the sons of the Gershonite Laadan, chief fathers, even of Laadan the Gershonite, were Jehieli.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gershshoona na7aa La7idaana yaraappe Yihi7eeli dumma dumma keettaa asau aawatees.

English Sentences: The sons of Jehieli; Zetham, and Joel his brother, which were over the treasures of the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihi7eela naati Zetaamanne a ishaa Yuu7eela; eti GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyan de7iya buquraa naaganau sunttettidosona.

English Sentences: Of the Amramites, and the Izharites, the Hebronites, and the Uzzielites:
Wolaitta Sentences: Amiraama yaratuyyo, Yixihaara yaratuyyo, Kebroona yaratuyyoonne Uzzi7eela yaratuyyo oosoi shaahetti imettiis.

English Sentences: And Shebuel the son of Gershom, the son of Moses, was ruler of the treasures.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muuse na7aa Gershshooma yara gidiya SHabu7eeli Beeta Maqidasiyan de7iya buquraa naagiyaageetu halaqatu bolli sunttettiis.

English Sentences: And his brethren by Eliezer; Rehabiah his son, and Jeshaiah his son, and Joram his son, and Zichri his son, and Shelomith his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: I Gershshooma ishaa El77eezara baggaara SHalomiitayyo dabbotees. El77eezari Rahaabiyaa yeliis; Rahaabee Yishaa7iyaa yeliis; Yishaa7ee Yoraama yeliis; Yoraami Ziikira yeliis; Ziikiri SHalomiita yeliis.

English Sentences: Which Shelomith and his brethren were over all the treasures of the dedicated things, which David the king, and the chief fathers, the captains over thousands and hundreds, and the captains of the host, had dedicated.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Daawiti, aawatu keettaa asaa halaqati, shaalaqati, mato halaqatinne ola gadaawati Xoossaayyo dummayi wottido miishsha ubbaa bolli SHalomiitinne a dabboti sunttettidosona.

English Sentences: Out of the spoils won in battles did they dedicate to maintain the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha miishshaa Beeta Maqidasiyaa bottokonanau dummayi wottida asati ha miishshaa kase olaappe omooddi wottidosona.

English Sentences: And all that Samuel the seer, and Saul the son of Kish, and Abner the son of Ner, and Joab the son of Zeruiah, had dedicated; and whosoever had dedicated any thing, it was under the hand of Shelomith, and of his brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi hananabaa yootiya Sameeli, Qiisa na7ai Saa7ooli, Neera na7ai Abaneerinne Xaruuyi na7ai Yoo7aabi kase dummayi wottido imota ubbaa SHalomiitinne a dabboti naagoosona.

English Sentences: Of the Izharites, Chenaniah and his sons were for the outward business over Israel, for officers and judges.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yixihaara yaratuppe Kanaaneenne a naati Beeta Maqidasiyaappe kareera de7iya oosuwan Israa7eela asaa aissanaunne daannatanau sunttettidosona.

English Sentences: And of the Hebronites, Hashabiah and his brethren, men of valour, a thousand and seven hundred, were officers among them of Israel on this side Jordan westward in all the business of the LORD, and in the service of the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kebroona yaratuppe Hashaabeenne a dabboti, issi sha7anne laappun xeetu mino asati, GODAA ooso ubbaunne kawuwaa ooso ubbau Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefinttan arggo baggaara de7iya Israa7eela asaa bolli sunttettidosona.

English Sentences: Among the Hebronites was Jerijah the chief, even among the Hebronites, according to the generations of his fathers. In the fortieth year of the reign of David they were sought for, and there were found among them mighty men of valour at Jazer of Gilead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kebroona yaratuppe halaqatiyaagee Yiriiya. Daawiti kawotido oitamantto laittan koyin, eta asaa giddoppe mino asati Gala7aade biittan Yaa7izeera giyo sohuwan beettidosona.

English Sentences: And his brethren, men of valour, were two thousand and seven hundred chief fathers, whom king David made rulers over the Reubenites, the Gadites, and the half tribe of Manasseh, for every matter pertaining to God, and affairs of the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aawatu keetta asau halaqatiya Yiriiya dabboti minoti naa77u sha7anne laappun xeeta. Kawoi Daawiti Xoossaa ooso ubbaunne kawuwaa ooso ubbau eta Roobeela zaretu biittaa bolli, Gaada zaretu biittaa bollinne Minaase zaretuppe baggatu biittaa bolli sunttiis.

English Sentences: Now the children of Israel after their number, to wit, the chief fathers and captains of thousands and hundreds, and their officers that served the king in any matter of the courses, which came in and went out month by month throughout all the months of the year, of every course were twenty and four thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta citan citan kawotettaa aissida Israa7eela keettaa asatu halaqati, shaalaqatinne mato halaqati hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Issi issi citan laatamanne oiddu sha7u asati de7oosona. Issi issi citai laittaa giddon issi issi aginau kayan kayan kawotettaa oosuwaa oottanau kiyees.

English Sentences: Over the first course for the first month was Jashobeam the son of Zabdiel: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koiro aginan kiyiya citaa kaalettiyaagee Zabddi7eela na7aa Yaashobi7aama; a citan laatamanne oiddu sha7u asai de7ees.

English Sentences: Of the children of Perez was the chief of all the captains of the host for the first month.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaashobi7aami Paareesa zeretta; i koiro aginau olanchchatu halaqatuyyo gadaawa.

English Sentences: And over the course of the second month was Dodai an Ahohite, and of his course was Mikloth also the ruler: in his course likewise were twenty and four thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77antto aginan kiyiya citaa kaalettiyaagee Ahoohiyaa Dodaaya; a citan laatamanne oiddu sha7u asai de7ees. Appe kaalliyaagee Miqiloota.

English Sentences: The third captain of the host for the third month was Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, a chief priest: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzantto aginan kiyiya citaa kaalettiyaagee qeesiyaa Yoodaahe na7aa Banaaya; a citan laatamanne oiddu sha7u asai de7ees.

English Sentences: This is that Benaiah, who was mighty among the thirty, and above the thirty: and in his course was Ammizabad his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Banaayi hasttamu erettida asatu giddon mino asa gididi, hasttamatuyyo halaqatiis. A sohuwan a na7ai Amizabaadi halaqatiis.

English Sentences: The fourth captain for the fourth month was Asahel the brother of Joab, and Zebadiah his son after him: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oiddantto aginan kiyiya citaa kaalettiyaagee Yoo7aaba ishaa Asaaheela; a citan laatamanne oiddu sha7u asai de7ees. A sohuwan a na7ai Zabaadee halaqatiis.

English Sentences: The fifth captain for the fifth month was Shamhuth the Izrahite: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ichchashantto aginan kiyiya citaa kaalettiyaagee Yixihaara yaraappe SHamihuuta; a citan laatamanne oiddu sha7u asai de7ees.

English Sentences: The sixth captain for the sixth month was Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Usuppuntta aginan kiyiya citaa kaalettiyaagee Taqo7appe yiida Iqqeesha na7aa Ira; a citan laatamanne oiddu sha7u asai de7ees.

English Sentences: The seventh captain for the seventh month was Helez the Pelonite, of the children of Ephraim: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laappuntta aginan kiyiya citaa kaalettiyaagee Efireema zariyaappe Piloonappe yiida Heleexa; a citan laatamanne oiddu sha7u asai de7ees.

English Sentences: The eighth captain for the eighth month was Sibbecai the Hushathite, of the Zarhites: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hosppuntta aginan kiyiya citaa kaalettiyaagee Huushappe yiida Sibbakaaya; a citan laatamanne oiddu sha7u asai de7ees. Sibbakaayi Yihudaa zarenne Zaraaha yara.

English Sentences: The ninth captain for the ninth month was Abiezer the Anetothite, of the Benjamites: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Uddufuntta aginan kiyiya citaa kaalettiyaagee Biniyaama zare gidida Anatootiyaa Abi7eezera; a citan laatamanne oiddu sha7u asai de7ees.

English Sentences: The tenth captain for the tenth month was Maharai the Netophathite, of the Zarhites: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammantta aginan kiyiya citaa kaalettiyaagee Naxoofappe yiida, Zaraaha yara gidiya Maahiraaya; a citan laatamanne oiddu sha7u asai de7ees.

English Sentences: The eleventh captain for the eleventh month was Benaiah the Pirathonite, of the children of Ephraim: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne isiinintta aginan kiyiya citaa kaalettiyaagee Pir77aatoonappe yiida, Efireema zare gidiya Banaaya; a citan laatamanne oiddu sha7u asai de7ees.

English Sentences: The twelfth captain for the twelfth month was Heldai the Netophathite, of Othniel: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammanne naa77antto aginan kiyiya citaa kaalettiyaagee Naxoofappe yiida, Otini7eela yara gidiya Helddaaya; a citan laatamanne oiddu sha7u asai de7ees.

English Sentences: Furthermore over the tribes of Israel: the ruler of the Reubenites was Eliezer the son of Zichri: of the Simeonites, Shephatiah the son of Maachah:
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela zareta aissanau sunttettidaageeti hagaappe kaallidi xaafettidaageeta. Roobeela zariyaa aissiyaagee Ziikira na7aa El77eezara. Simoona zariyaa aissiyaagee Maa7ika na7aa SHafaaxiyaa.

English Sentences: Of the Levites, Hashabiah the son of Kemuel: of the Aaronites, Zadok:
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewa zariyaa aissiyaagee Qamu7eela na7aa Hashaabiyaa. Aaroona zariyaa aissiyaagee Xaadooqa.

English Sentences: Of Judah, Elihu, one of the brethren of David: of Issachar, Omri the son of Michael:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa zariyaa aissiyaagee Daawita ishaa Eeliha. Yisaakoora zariyaa aissiyaagee Mikaa7eela na7aa Omira.

English Sentences: Of Zebulun, Ishmaiah the son of Obadiah: of Naphtali, Jerimoth the son of Azriel:
Wolaitta Sentences: Zaabiloona zariyaa aissiyaagee Obaadiyaa na7aa Yishimaa7iyaa. Nifttaaleema zariyaa aissiyaagee Aziri7eela na7aa Yaarimoota.

English Sentences: Of the children of Ephraim, Hoshea the son of Azaziah: of the half tribe of Manasseh, Joel the son of Pedaiah:
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema zariyaa aissiyaagee Azaaziyaa na7aa Hoshee7a. Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe arggo baggan de7iya Minaase zaretuppe baggaa aissiyaagee Padaaya na7aa Yuu7eela.

English Sentences: Of the half tribe of Manasseh in Gilead, Iddo the son of Zechariah: of Benjamin, Jaasiel the son of Abner:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe arshsho bagga Gala7aaden de7iya Minaase zaretuppe baggaa aissiyaagee Zakkaariyaasa na7aa Idda. Biniyaama zariyaa aissiyaagee Abaneera na7aa Ya7isi7eela.

English Sentences: Of Dan, Azareel the son of Jeroham. These were the princes of the tribes of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daana zariyaa aissiyaagee Yirohaama na7aa Azaari7eela. Hageeti Israa7eela zareta aissiyaageeta.

English Sentences: But David took not the number of them from twenty years old and under: because the LORD had said he would increase Israel like to the stars of the heavens.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela asaa saluwaa xoolinttiyaadan corayana giido gishshau, Daawiti laatamu laittanne laatamu laittaappe garssaara de7iyaageeta qoodan gelissibeenna.

English Sentences: Joab the son of Zeruiah began to number, but he finished not, because there fell wrath for it against Israel; neither was the number put in the account of the chronicles of king David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xaruuyi na7ai Yoo7aabi asaa qoodaa doommiis; shin qoodi wurssibeenna. Asaa qoodido gaasuwan GODAI Israa7eela asaa bolli hanqqettiis. Hegaa gishshau, eta qoodai Kawuwaa Daawita taarikiyaa mazggafan xaafettibeenna.

English Sentences: And over the king's treasures was Azmaveth the son of Adiel: and over the storehouses in the fields, in the cities, and in the villages, and in the castles, was Jehonathan the son of Uzziah:
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawo buquraa minjjiyoosau aawatiyaagee Adii7eela na7aa Azimaaweeta. Gaxariyan, katamatuuninne moottatun de7iya miishshaassi aawatiyaagee Ooziyaana na7aa Yonaataana.

English Sentences: And over them that did the work of the field for tillage of the ground was Ezri the son of Chelub:
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittaa goyiya goshshanchchatu bolli aawatiyaagee Kaluuba na7aa Eezira.

English Sentences: And over the vineyards was Shimei the Ramathite: over the increase of the vineyards for the wine cellars was Zabdi the Shiphmite:
Wolaitta Sentences: Woiniyaa turaa sohotuyyo aawatiyaagee Raamappe yiida SHim77a. Woiniyaa eessaa minjjiyoosau aawatiyaagee SHafaamappe yiida Zabdda.

English Sentences: And over the olive trees and the sycomore trees that were in the low plains was Baalhanan the Gederite: and over the cellars of oil was Joash:
Wolaitta Sentences: Bargguwan de7iya wogaraayyoonne ettaayyo aawatiyaagee Gedeerappe yiida Ba7aalihanaana. Zaitiyaa minjjiyoosau aawatiyaagee Yo7aasha.

English Sentences: And over the herds that fed in Sharon was Shitrai the Sharonite: and over the herds that were in the valleys was Shaphat the son of Adlai:
